text: good burgers, sandwiches with jamón, potatoes, local restaurant with owners serving, very spanish
the quality of their products is excellent. juan has a gift in his hands and his know-how, he cooks phenomenally well. unbeatable price quality and large portions
small but very cozy, i had breakfast on the terrace. the good-sized sandwich filled with sausage.

just as if you were at home.i was passing by here by chance and the door and the family atmosphere they had, the homemade 💯 food, generous portions and the very appropriate price caught my attention.the menu with drink and dessert €11i ordered seafood noodles first, which were delicious, and secondly, cod fritters, which were also very delicious.for dessert i recommend the cream cake.
price good, quantity good, quality good. their dishes lack a little flavor, i would recommend adding sauces.

exceptional galician restaurant in terms of quality-price.the owner has good suppliers from his land, so any dish of galician origin is delicious and at an appropriate price.all the sausages are cut in front of you, which is not seen much these days.highlights: octopus, galtas, knuckle, roast ham, tripe...highly recommended
a long-standing bar, one of those that you want to preserve. great pork sandwich, with drink and potatoes for €5.50. lovely place and super friendly staff. you feel at home.
bar of a lifetime, i had a very delicious potato omelet sandwich.
like at home... good galician food... and prices according to the new normal...
poblenou tavern. food correct menu. 11 euros with bread.drink.
fantastic tripe...and fantastic service...

i haven't even been able to drink my coffee because i'm disgusted by seeing that they don't take any care of hygiene at the bar. in one minute i have seen a lot of disgusting atrocities, the super dirty coffee maker, unsealed milk cartons, the coffee maker's steamer with milk from who knows when... fatal!
1/2 roasted ham sandwich with coffee with milk. very delicious and 2.90 (breakfast offer)... the place is authentic. they had spoken well to me. we will return to try the food.
be careful with the calluses, tremendous.good sandwiches, the best being roast ham.neighborhood bar, which is appreciated nowadays with so many sophisticated bars = great idea.
galician neighborhood bar-restaurant
galkega tavern economic menu. tapas, portions and succulent sandwiches.sunny terrace.friendly service.
the menu of the day is very good and complete, with the price, it is more than irresistible to eat here for €9. i recommend it 100%
a very good option near the beach and accessible, without having to pay exaggerated costs.

the best bcn sandwiches, lacon with brie, cooked ham... authentic wonders, at a price without competition, special mention to the homemade hot sauce, something similar to red mojo but with the touch of the house, good coffee and fast service , friendly and close, the local antagonist of large chains, a small but cozy place.
i've been going back a long time. simple and cheap menu. now i don't go as much, i cook more at home.
i have 30 minutes to have lunch, 10 minutes to score, and another 10 to serve, very slow and unfriendly, especially the girl at the bar who is when you have to give a good image.
average food, staff with very little desire to smile, on the lunch menu they almost urge you to leave.
they make a very good octopus and some delicious tripe, very delicious faults.
close to the workplace, few tables, better book for the terrace or you risk not having a seat
it is the best bar in the area and one of the oldest
very good food and sandwiches and cheap tripe, great
the menu is cheap, but not worth it. mediocre.
excellent price quality, very friendly service and attention.
homemade food bar, very delicious and exceptional service
very good sandwiches and good beer
good quality and correct price.
very delicious sandwiches
acceptable price quality
regular sandwich and worse treatment
great place to get cheap and delicious drinks
cool bar! full of young people and the drinks are cheap.

near to discos and other famous bars like this, it has a lot to offer - table football, low sitting and young ambience. unfortunately, the alcohol is one of the cheapest, unhealthiest kind. it has reasonable prices for a night out in barcelona, though, so it is worth checking out despite its mild lack of hygiene
cheaper place to go before razzmatazz, but there is only 1 air conditioner... so, be ready to sweat like a pig.
if you like surprisingly cheap drinks and a rowdy cheerful athmosphere, this is your place. healthy mix of locals and foreigners.
small place, always crowded. we're uncomfortably seated in boxes and had to wait on the bar for our drinks.
very cheap alcohol and good music. but i would appreciate some chairs (you have plastic beer boxes instead).
saw a cockroach on the ceiling, but the music and decor is nice. can't give a bad rating for cheap shots.
really good bar, really big inside, cheap prices.
typical teenagers' bar with awful sound and awful drinks but very cheap ones.
cheap drinks but the staff are pretty rude
cheap shots and drinks, fun with a group to talk

one of the many bars in the marina area, perfect for an early evening before going dancing.airbar offers cocktails and shots at really low prices, shots starting from €1 and one-litre cocktails for €5!obviously you shouldn't expect either quality or too much attention to the interior. in fact, the place has two floors (with a mezzanine) with many tables and beer crates instead of chairs.i recommend it to people without too many expectations.good
good place to have some beers and a wide variety of shots

they say that you can't speak too loudly and that you can't put tables together. there was no music. it's a good place to go for a drink and leave in the shortest time possible. smell of bathroom freshener hahahaha. €4 for a 500 ml cuban and €7 for a liter.

it's not bad, it has good prices like the cubalitro at €5 and the shots at €1. the problem is that it gets very crowded and ordering becomes an ordeal since it is very small and a large mass of people gather in front of the bar. also, in my opinion, it would lack a little music to give the atmosphere.
without a doubt the best bar in the marina to do the preview, apart from the fact that it is economical, all the employees are great 🫶🏻💕the shots are 1 euro
let cubaliliters return to €5!!! the price was the only good thing, to pay €7 i'd go to another one with music and decent seats. thank you for what you were, i look forward to your return.
really great! nice bar to pregame before going to the club.it's not expensive and the people are nice. tip: drink a lot because then you will have a more fun evening!
comfortable prices, i came on a saturday night and it was with normal service and all the drinks 💯👍 recommended in barcelona
they have increased the liter of estrella from €5 to €7. there's no point in going anymore. nothing justifies sitting on broken beer boxes anymore.

i have been there many times and had many good times. they have very good prices, there is an atmosphere and the workers do their job very well, but that's where it ends. always and there are a lot of people (too many), few places to sit due to the large number of people, the toilets are disgusting because people misuse them but not much is done about it either and in the case of the women's toilet, they should enable more toilets as they always form giant queues and waste a lot of time waiting
it is a place that has good dishes, with great flavors, good quality in the products they use and good prices, i will return, thank you

10 minutes after arriving they kicked us out because it was time to close, but they didn't let us stay to finish the drink or take it with us in a plastic cup. when we complained, they told us that when there are 20 minutes left before closing they stop serving drinks. we have repeated to them several times that it is not true, because we had literally just arrived and got to the table, and they have limited themselves to repeating that it was not like that, that they will notify us soon and th

price cut, €5 a cubalitro, yes, of the worst quality, and most times they charge you too little, you're drinking 1l of cola without noticing where the rum is left. there is no music. very young atmosphere.good place to do the preview at a very good price.

it is a bar with a good atmosphere but sometimes too much, it gets very crowded. the cubatas are not bad but i think they add a lot of mixture and very little alcohol (€5). to spend some time before going out to party it's fine.
trusted bar in marina the problem is that the vats of bad alcohol are well priced but the ones of more normal alcohol cost a lot of money.
the cubatas don't charge you anything, there is no music, i don't recommend it
one of my favorite bars ever but today i decided not to go in because the guard hesitated and it's not cool

shot of the day at €0.50, shot list of €1,2 and €3. half a liter at €3 and a liter at €5.it is a place to get drunk quickly before entering the clubs where the drink will cost you much more.there is music in the background, but it's always so low that you can't hear anything.if you want to grab a table, you have to go early to be able to sit (or be lucky).the place has a geek atmosphere of films and series from the 90s onwards, with a couple of arcade machines with retro games.

hard to find a place after midnight. the alcohol is not of quality but because the price is high. to warm up engines before going to a disco in the area is ideal. cubliters at €5 and shots at €1 and €2. we didn't like that towards the end of the night they didn't serve shots and only cuballiters. he looked after him very well.

the prices are really very good, but in a 5 euro cubaliliter they put alcohol from a bottle that cost them 6 euros at most, i don't know what to say, they have the expensive bottles displayed behind the bar and the cheap ones under the bar, so if you order, you must specify the brand of alcohol you want. apart from that i will say that it is a very good place, i will continue going, the shots for 1 euro are 🔝.
cubaliters at €5 and shots at €1, the price alone is worth it and the atmosphere is also very good. great place to go with friends to drink.
good vats at a super good price
it's okay if you are 18-20 years old, if you are outside this range, don't come thursday/friday/saturday night. for razz previews it is perfect. many shots at 1/2/3 euros and liter vats at 5_
perfect place to go have a few drinks before entering the club. it is quite large, affordable prices. after 12 there is usually not much room to sit.

i couldn't take a photo of the place because i didn't even think about it. it's pretty good for a drink, everything is pretty cheap and it looks like the alcohol wasn't too high quality. quite interesting atmosphere
it's a small place and it's always buzzing, but the music is good and especially the price of the drinks is the best.

a good place to have some cubatas/shots on a saturday night. its proximity to other bars and clubs in the area make it ideal. the price of the drink is acceptable considering the area. if i had to fault it, it would be the toilets, which are dirty. it is usually very full and it is difficult to find a place at a table.

you don't have to be the nicest person in the universe when you work serving drinks at a bar, you just have to be a little polite, pretend that you care about what your customer orders and then serve it to them. i understand that it is hard work to have to put up with the nonsense of drunks, but it does not justify paying for it with the rest of the clients.

good place and affordable price, the only drawback would be the waitress in charge, no matter if she is in charge or boss, super arrogant and speaking badly, by the way, thank you for putting ice in my glass, the rest of the friendly waitresses were even going to offer it to me . anyway, i hope they don't take that ice off your payroll.

before (about 10 years ago) it was better, honestly. just because of the music they played back then, which was all rock... the alcohol they serve is bad, my worst hangovers have been in the airbar, but if you ask for it, they give you whatever brand you want, paying.

a great experience, highly recommended, you can pay by card and the drinks are €4 for cubatas and €2 for shots, jugs are €6.5 and they have unbeatable valencia water. the location is very good, there is a lot of accessibility both by public transport and by car. the place is wide and has two areas, it has table football, billiards and toilets. this is a place so good that you have to go early to get a table.

a great thinking mind has devised a master plan to attract customers: either you spend €5 at once at the bar or you don't go out.it's not worth asking your friends for it, it's not worth ordering a drink and coming back later... either 5 or you stay the night. before entering the bar, if you are driving, think about this photo and judge for yourself:

the new waitress with the pink highlights and cheap rosalia look is the worst person who has ever served me in this bar. he told us, without any kind of politeness, that we had sneaked in (i still don't know who, since we were the only customers at that time), he asked us for explanations as to why we were ordering so many drinks (expressions like: another fucking time? ). and finally, he didn't let me pay by card since the minimum was 6 euros, and he told us that that was the minimum because i

a cheap bar that allows you to socialize and drink like a dog, however they put cases of beer instead of simple chairs.positive points:-good atmosphere to meet new and young people.-alcohol is cheap.-the foosball tables.bad points:-there are no chairs as god intended (unfortunate).-the alcohol is of low quality.

it's a place i've been to millions of times, cheap alcohol and fun shots. but last night i went with a group of people and one of the girls at the bar didn't want to serve us (one with a necklace in the shape of catalonia, to give a description). but she did it because she didn't feel like it, she was super rude. his companions much better. i doubt i'll come again if i see that girl at the bar.

too full and not very spacious, good prices and quality, because just like the mercadona alcohol, they basically use mercadona alcohol and soft drinks, the place has a pretty cool underground vibe and the service is as fast and efficient as it can be. taking into account the number of people ordering (as if they were spongebob's anchovies) and that only one person fits behind the bar and they cannot move freely. for the rest, very nice people and if you go early and grab a spot, a good place to

good atmosphere. lots of people talking and background music (typical in a bar), and very cheap alcohol. of course, if you go with a large group of people you have to go early to get a place as it fills up easily.

oh my goodness what a scam. if you're 12 years old, it's okay because you haven't tried alcohol yet. but if you're not subnormal you're going to see how they scam you. the treatment is very embarrassing.

one of the most emblematic bars in the marina area. drinks at good prices, variety and very good service. highly recommended to go with large groups, but early if it is friday or weekend, to be able to have a table.🤘🏽🤘🏽
there is no music (only ambient). it would be nice if they played loud music so we could have a better time.
good atmosphere and good variety of drinks, very good value for money, the drinks are large and affordable. if you don't leave soon you have to wait in line to get in.

a lot of people, we go in first to have a seat and they don't play music, you can only hear screams, the cigars are cheap but they don't give you any alcohol and the worst thing is that two of us go out to smoke and then they don't let you in even though you have the table with your friends inside and the cubata, tell you that you have to wait in line with all the people there, that in a bar seems pathetic to me, everyone smokes inside when they can't because it is a closed space and now i unde

my experience here has been more than regrettable in relation to the treatment by one of the waitresses, when we arrived everything was fine, the guy at the bar on the second floor was very friendly, but the girl... seemed like she wanted us all out, she was very rude to us. i certainly won't go again.
not good, not bad... why haven't i been... what do i think on maps?... well, local owners, complain to google for asking for false opinions

there is a good atmosphere and a fairly large space. good control by security and good price. there is not much of a line, i don't give it a 5 because the cubatas are not loaded at all and you will get "drunk" and return home more serene than a fish. it sounds like you drink actimel or danonino.
very cheap bar for drinks, the atmosphere is very youthful. they don't play music but there is a lot of atmosphere of people talking.very close to razz to be able to go out after partying.
perfect place to stop by before going to razz. normal cubata €2, large €3. shots €1-2 and the one on the day 50c! spacious and pleasant music, always great on wednesdays. correct staff.

bar in the marina area where they play more alternative and rock music. the price of the drink is low (4€ a bucket, 1 or 2€ per shot) and they give you a card on which they stamp you when you see a shot. at 10 pecks they give you a free airbar t-shirt (which are really cool). there are two floors although it is not very big. you have to go a little early if you want to get a place
it's cool to go with friends, the drink is at a very good price but they should take more care of the cleanliness of the place
carafe at a good price. they exceed the capacity limit excessively but the atmosphere is not bad.
excellent place, good ambient musicand very cheap cigarshalf a liter 3 euros
tremendous place. very good atmosphere with a wide variety of drinks at good prices

a great place with a lot of variety of shots. ps: if you vomit, they will make you clean it up and if you are not standing or someone has done it to you, your friend will do it and if you do not have friends, the person closest to the vomit will do it.

one of the best bars in the marina area, very cheap drinks, special drink games that are rewarded, air conditioning, two floors each with its respective table football, and always very pleasant whether you go with a few people or in a large group. the service at the bar is very good, accompanied by assortments of very economical types of shots that will not leave you dissatisfied.
this place used to be cool. now if you sing happy birthday or scream too much they will shoot you. they seem to forget that this is a bar...
the atmosphere is one of the best i have seen in a bar, the large and cheap drinks, one of my favorites.

the prices are the best, the atmosphere is no longer what it was before... what does not change is the disgusting nature of the bathrooms and that they are separated by gender: 3 for boys and only 1 for girls, nothing is equitable, on top of that the staff has to do use of these, they should have their own.
a bar with good music and beautiful people! very good for making pre-party friends
cheap (cubata €5, shots 1-2), plenty of seating, good atmosphere. they have foosball tables.

it's a place that i like to go, but i don't go that much because when i go with friends i want to sit, but i can't, it's always full and there's little space. the prices are pretty good, the bathrooms are shit.

in this bar you have shots to choose from, all of them delicious and at a very good price. the waiters are very friendly and attentive to you. the goalkeeper...incredible, the best. in short, good bar.
good treatment from the waiters and others but i take away a star because they don't have pacharan.place to get a little blind with cheap jugs

i love it, the prices are very good, along with the atmosphere. the bad thing is when they don't have the lights off and they turn off the music, i don't understand why they do it but it takes away the whole atmosphere.
good bar. very cheap cubatas and good atmosphere. it's always packed, which shows that people like it. about the fact that the sink is very dirty... well... think about who is to blame...
perfect for drinking with friends. it has two floors with a bar on each floor. there is a lot of atmosphere and the prices are very good. close to razzmatazz and other establishments.
very cheap place to drink and with a very good atmosphere, although on fridays and saturdays it gets very crowded and a bit overwhelming. ideal for thursdays or less frequented days.
there aren't even chairs, it's packed on weekends and looks very shabby. the only notable thing is that they have cheap private label alcohol.
the place is good for cheap drinks but it is impossible to find a place
great bar in the marina area, with good drink offers and they also keep a close eye on the issue of capacity and have adapted great to the pandemic
good atmosphere, a lot of variety of shots and at a good price.
very professional people who serve quality drinks. always attentive and eager to make you have a good time, accompanied by brilliant music.happy and grateful for the service.
don't try the €2 shot of absinthe unless you're sick in the head. it is one of the best places to go out and i have 8 t-shirts
very full and the lemon vodka tasted like valleta with a taste of rancid bleach. the jaggermeister was the kind that gives you hangovers and indigestion. not recommended.

i have never seen something so cool and special, probably there is no other one like this in the whole spain, a real must if you are into gaming
great gear and equipment, amazing owners, really good vibe
congratulations, avantgarde places like this one make the city grow up bigger

great place! my friends and i were lucky to find this place, and we were coming to play old school half-life and quake 3 arena every week ever since.

the venue is huge with a modern sports zone, that even has massage pistols, an interactive projector for football-like games, a billiard table, and lots of retro consoles.

the host is welcoming and friendly, prices are low, and you can get yourself drinks and snacks at the bar.

5 out of 5!

so glad i found this place something for everyone super friendly open every day except sunday 😂great idea guys and gals you deseve all the success
thank you 👏👏👏😊👌the coffee is amazing and the girl who served it was a credit to this company and deserves a pay rise😂✌️
what a cool space! full sized tech advanced gym with all the equipment and a dedicated recovery area!

amazing place! i spend such a good time as never friday night!!! an awesome techno legal party was organized. i really recommend to people to go to this place when they do parties.

thanks a lot for this moment.

regards.
i have been training there for a while, the team is amazing. the place has a lot to offer for gamers. recommand it 100%
great exhibition about space. very interesting

premises dedicated to the world of video games, with a stage where competitions and events are held, an area for playing computer games, classic video games, a gym, foosball tables and a bar. a little hot in the middle of summer. they are conditioning several ships to host exhibitions and other events.
a very special place!

we enjoyed the final of the catalan simracing league. large space, hi repaired, with bar service. maybe we would need good air conditioning (we spend a lot of time here) and bigger toilets, but well, we liked the space

good combination to go with public transport, since they recommend traveling by transport within barcelona.we got off in llacuna and it is less than 2 minutes away!!we had a drink while watching the semi-final and final of league of legend, catalan spring summer split league!!!looking forward to the next split in september!!!they let us in with food and we bought drinks there. a super positive and very good point for the venue.
damn, i'm sorry, i don't remember being here. anyway, congratulations for the work done and to come.
they don't pay the providers, i don't recommend them
i don't recommend at all. they do not pay suppliers, nor workers. horrible treatment.
it's great for esports events, you could even celebrate a birthday game there. they rent space and the truth is that the space is great, i would return to another event without a doubt!!
i thought it was spectacular

don't waste your money guys. i tell you total. everything is a lie, from the classes to the very mistreated staff by the bosses (owners), you are going to be amazed by the lies, everything is a farce.
the children had a good time and the grandparents learned something 👍

excellent organization and treatment. we celebrated my 10-year-old son's birthday and the children were delighted, they took great care of the details.claudia, adrià and roman: thank you very much! we recommend any event and we will surely repeat it.
i went to a cosplay convention and i had a lot of fun, cool place and easy to find
a good experience that we had this saturday playing in person in the catalan league, good organization of big c
i was there 2 weeks ago for a techno party (completely legal) and it was really great, great place and organization! thank you
very friendly place, top staff, efficient boxing teachersa place that i recommend!
very bad treatment from the bosses, the sports schedules are a lienobody does classes there. everything they publish on instagram is a farce, i do not recommend anyone to go to that establishment…
i like big c! the managers are very friendly. a place to discover if you like video games and new technologies.
disastrous customer treatment. i don't plan to go back again. it's not worth it, really. save you money. also very rude owners. i will not be coming again!!!!!!!!
brutal experience, video games on another level. they treated and welcomed us fantastically, the children delighted to enjoy each and every one of the technologies of this game center.
good place with pleasant atmosphere and attention
good place to have a good time playing with friends, having a drink, watching a live event in the arena and many more things.
the managers and staff are respectful, it is a satisfying place for children to discover video games and fun activities :)
scam company towards its workers and its environment. be very careful with this site, it is not a trustworthy place.
a spectacular place! they take great care of the details, perfect for organizing an esports event.
if you plan to work with them in any way, i advise you to ask for 100% in advance.
interesting place for gaming and retrogaming
a great place to spend the day with colleagues, the wizards kids are super friendly <3
a bit tacky place for conferences
everything is great. excellent facilities !
it is not a trustworthy site. they throw illegal parties.
good value basic food. nice and local. i enjoyed a lot.
excellent food. try the onion soup or the salad first and then get the codillo.
perfect for breakfast, the sandwiches are very good. for meals also very good, simple and homemade menu.

i share the worst possible experience in hospitality.while at the funeral home, we went in to order some coffees and cocoa lats for the children and take them to the terrace ourselves, then in very bad ways (speaking badly and gesticulating) they made us understand that they had a lot of work to do... which was not true due to the low volume of clients there were.logically, in order not to come to blows with such an individual (and with the owner, who is both out of school) we go and take a pho

i have never seen such disastrous treatment in my life. we left the room watching over our family member to eat something. 5 adults and 2 children, we order 6 menus and the discussion begins because children “cannot share” according to their rules. we tell her that the girl eats very little and the waitress confronts us. the older lady comes and goes and instead of fixing it she makes us face even more because she tells us that if we don't like the deal we should leave.that is if they start tak
affordable prices, food was good and staff very friendly
we came from the funeral home a little late (3:45 p.m.). they served us quickly and very correctly. homemade and good food.

i don't know what brand the coffee will be, or how they make it, or how they clean the coffee maker, but it's terrible. order a soda or beer for your intestinal health. pure dynamite. the sandwiches, better. but for what they offer, it is expensive.
pedro's attention is wonderful. their salt roast and tripe, wonderful!!!
a good restaurant, with a good product and service, very friendly people, the place is very well located.

bad experience. little flexibility for vegetarians, there was no option to eat anything and when asking for an alternative they were not proactive. they understand tuna as if it were a vegetable. they didn't even want to make me a french omelette 😢

it's good for lunch. it is not very pretty nor does it have the best service but the food is very delicious and the dishes are abundant, they usually have paella or meat dishes that are very good. the starter, main and dessert menu with a drink at 9.90. (the flan is very delicious)

quality homemade menu at a very reasonable price. very good sandwiches. very friendly treatment. the place is very crowded and there is usually quite a lot of noise, but despite this it is quite good.
it has a varied lunch menu for about €10, suitable for vegetarians. the portion is generous and they serve very quickly even though it was full.

the traditional bar with traditional workers, breakfast and lunch, economical, very good quality-price ratio, they are fast and friendly. spectacular sandwiches. the menu is simple but correct, and they buy quality. very familiar and homely.

what is worth highlighting about this place, apart from the super accessible and tasty menu, is particularly the service and the detailed treatment and care of the customer. my experience in this regard was unbeatable. how satisfying to know that there are still places like this
it's scary to eat, it's completely homemade and mr. josé has 10 hands when cooking 👍

an old neighborhood bar, one of the old, attentive and fast staff. well made sandwiches, tapas and drinks. they also serve fast even though it is always full since it is very close to a nightlife area. ideal for having a drink and replenishing energy. the only thing is that with so many people sometimes it becomes too small.
real homemade daily menu. there is a good quality price relation. the tremendous rice!!! and tortillas raise passions. whoever tries it, comes back.
affordable weekday lunch menu with half menu option. homemade food for life, there are not many other options in the area but i find that vegan dishes are lacking. it's time to upgrade!
menu of the day with very good and homemade food, i felt like at homethe managers of the premises and the waitersvery friendly!we will be back!
once i came and the sandwich was inedible, and i was not well served, out of respect i left without any complaints and paying.
good, homemade food at a good price. they do half a menu and also take away even cheaper. for local workers or not!
a great restaurant that has been in the area for 20 years or more, a place where you can eat a delicious menu or simply something fresh alone or in company, the service is very familiar.
small neighborhood restaurant. menu del día at 9.60 euros. unpretentious home cooking, simple but generous. nice waitresses. open for lunch only.
homemade breakfasts, lunches and menus, traditional cuisine and excellent service at an unbeatable price. it's nice to come
very good option for breakfast.
very economical menu but only for people passing through. tasty food
fabulous food as if your mother made it on a weekday. without excess salt and very natural. very good deal
homemade dishes, very good and economical. first course, second course, dessert or coffee menus for €10 with something.
good food on the menu. very friendly treatment, fast service. good price.
homemade food and friendly and attentive waitresses. to eat during the week i recommend it
very good professionals attentive to the clientele and very good product, very well prepared and served
good homemade food. my usual place at lunch time.
good place and very cheap, good service, good homemade food
i ate very well. affordable menu and good food.
good place to eat from the menu. fast, pretty and cheap...
food good service good price good is the typical 3 b good nice and cheap
in this bar you eat real homemade food. one of the best in the area.
family restaurant, market cuisine, i ate like at home, i will definitely repeat
authentic homemade food at a very reasonable price
typical neighborhood bar with tourist area prices
good cuisine, very varied.
fair menu
normal
typical bar

absolute gem! even if you do not speak catalan, you are still welcomed to try and enjoy the food. i just want to disclaim some reviews i saw - everybody is super friendly and the food is as authentic as it can be.

thanks for great couple of hours!

amazing experience dining there, all the waiters have been very welcoming and friendly!
jamon iberico is one of the best we’ve had. meatballs were dense but the sauce it comes in with peas was the best part. the snails were nice in a sauce made with morcilla and pork, but the sauce was muddled. i would recommend the artichoke omelette and croquettes as the highlights.

price is also very reasonable!

unfortunately the food here is just very meh, long standing restaurant for sure but lacks execut
i’m sorry but this is the worst tapas i had. the potatas bravas was redeemable but everything else was 🤢🤮. i would not give this another try. tourists, please avoid this place at all cost.

amazing experience dining there, all the waiters have been very welcoming and friendly! they even treated us to a little something after our meal.
jamon iberico is one of the best we’ve had. price is also very reasonable!
really good tapas, reasonable prices and friendly service

very tasty tapas. lovely and welcoming service. with 5 girls, we had a great meal.

had a great waiter taking care of us from the start. all of the crew was very friendly.

we couldn't stop ordering more of their selection of tapas!!
tasty tapas and fish. i ordered pasta with tomatoes and olives, fish, and cheese cake. all for 16 euro. the staff is really helpful and friendly.
authentic & delicious tapas bar with the most value for money food i tried in barcelona!!! taste as many things as possible, it's so worth it!!!
nice tapas restaurant and it’s affordable 👍🏻

terrible place if you're not catalan. the service was awful and disrespectful in all ways even though all of us were 100% polite all the time. washed off the vibe of being the last day in barcelona. not worth your time at all if you value a good friendly atmosphere. the table next to us though, since they were catalans were treated like royalty. terrible xen0phobic place all around.
very authentic place, the food is classic. you have to speak a bit of spanish, it is absolutly not a touristic place but you will get an unique experience.
speechless! friendly staff reasonable price and portion. food is unexpectedly delicious!! i can't see much tourists, it's really a local bar. they got english menu, so don't worry about the order!

the empanadas like our curry puffs are so sumptuous. there are at least 8-10 different kinds of fillings to choose from. the pastry melts in the mouth. they are so reasonably priced. you must try them.
autentic catalan tapas! the real tapas!!! barato!! 1 big menu around 15€!!! beautiful!!
only downside is that hot sandwich isn't even warm. other than that great sandwiches and coffee at affordable prices. sandwich with tortilla de patatas and jamón ibérico was perfect 👌
food is quite good, although they're not that clean and, most of all, rough crew.
have the meatballs and tomato bread. you will not be sorry.

4 star for the fact that you can't have a normal omelette. they serve it only in sandwich.

other than that they were very friendly and the experience for a small familial restaurant filled with locals was nice.

the lunch menu was absolutely worth the price. food was amazing, generous portion and nice desserts. the paella was super tasty with fresh ingredients. alcohol is included and the serving was generous too! 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a great value lunch
there is a waiter named xavier who speaks english. nicest guy - explained the menu del dia and super helpful. they have menus in english as well. delicious meal!

delicious tapas and friendly service even though they were very busy. octopus, cap y lengua a la vinagreta, xistorra, truita, pan con tomate all had excellent flavors and were served at proper temperature.
such a tasty tapas bar! the beer is so nice and cold! the food is amazing and the servís is very warm and fast.
tried the sangria but nothing special.
best tapas place in barcelona

it's typical local bar. come to have a drink and feel the local people. not recommended for food and with children - we ordered some hot snacs and... all were just warmed in microwaves at the bar and served... the taste was also bad. 0 stars for gourmet experience. 4 stars as a typical local bar.

we went for lunch and it was busy, not packed. there seemed to be a lot of regulars seated in back, for whom the staff knew their orders already. most of the staff spoke little english but our waiter spoke enough that we felt comfortable ordering. the waiters seemed very friendly with the spanish clientele and were polite for us with our minimal spanish. the menu del dia was delicious, we had the beef (bistec) and cuttlefish (sepia) as main dishes. their stewed beans starter was probably my pers
watched an fcb game here and the food was solid. good local spot

we ordered off the daily special.  they were out of most items and we took what they had.  unfortunately, what they had was unfit for consumption and we both ended up violently ill from food poisoning.   so ill in fact that we were not sure we were going to be able to leave barcellona.  and neither one of us has eaten in 24+ hours.
best tortilla de patatas, confirmed by the local friends :) also very good octopus, salads. normal, non-tourist, cheerful and busy atmosphere, local people, i loved it!

11 pm and open, locals eating and having great time. tapas excellent and service superlative.  get potato pie, meatballs, octopus and tomato bread. wash it down with vermut. the people here will understand some english. half the price of places on las ramblass. and better by a mile.

good customer services with nice food !!
highly recommend the fried pork ear with garlic and parsley !! ^^ sangria is nice too
the tapas is unexpectedly delicious and of high quality !
update : english menu available

in case you have a new baby and you need to go somewhere with a changing station... they were kind enough to offer to hold my stroller so it could be out of the way.

this place is owned and run by a bunch of brothers and is family oriented and lovely.

by the way, the food is delicious!

try their russian potato salad, chistorra sausage, meatballs, pan con tomate and their tortilla is nice here too.

este restaurante es bueno para las familias con bebés porque es fácil cambiar pañales en el bañ
great tapas: bravas, croquetas, tortillas, etc. do not miss the "bomba". accompany it all with bread with tomato. the have good vermouth, but go for red wine or beer. great ambience. cheap.

excellent . im from nyc and didn't know what to expect. service is a little cold ( not as smiley as we are in the states).

get the pulpo ala gallega is very good octopus with olive oil and paprika.

this place is wayyy less packed than bar pinxto which  is way too packed and feel like you have t o fight for a space.

take the train to the joanic stop and this place feels so much more local !!!

im sure the food at other places is good too but this place is less hectic which you can enjoy the am
authentic tapas and quick service. the food was great! if you‘re looking for an authentic and non-touristic place to eat, bar can ros is the place for you.
excellent authentic food, excellent service at a very good price. highly recommended.
love this place! family run restaurant since 1971. friendly staff, delicious food, lovely relaxed place. went twice in 5 days. kid friendly.
friendly staff, delicious food, amazing atmosphere and great prices!

really nice and cosy tapas bar. large variety of tapas. quality and quantity for a really decent price.
i would come back for sure.
great local tapas resraurant. quick and cheap eats with a good selection of food. service could be better
they have incorrect open time here on maps. came to eat at 15-50 on sunday, they refused to accept us due to closure. i was very angry.
loved it. very tasty food, fantastic beer, friendly staff and fast service. would recommend/10
best place for tortilla de patatas or other home-made flavour like alcachofa or chorizo.
typical tapas bar, medium quality, everything ok. price-quality is good.
traditional food, excellent
really good traditional tapas. i advise it! service ok.
amazing environment and food!!! the meatballs entrepans was sublime
loved it! great staff
my favorite tapas in barcelona since many years
waiters were fantastic..do try the morcilla and the tripe
great local food and ambient
awesome tapas ,great low price
traditional bar. the quality is good but the attention is not the best.
good place for tapas and a cold beer!
friendly, fast service, had a nice meal.
waiters do everything except a work
good service but bad quality
average food and very very slow service on the evenings
my favorite spot in barcelona for tapas.
very bad service. don,t waste you're time here.
perfect sandwich bar!
pleasant typical local bar.
small bar with nice atmosphere
good tapas & bocatas
brutal!!!
amazing authentic place
bon ambient, bones tapes
tapes bones
good tapas.
good and cheap
tapas y bocatas
bones tapes

very authentic taverna/tapas bar. large selection, with many options available and visible at the barra. we tried a big selection, including several beers and wine. very good price/quantity value for the 25€ we ended up paying

bar highly recommended both for its tapas and its daily menus, which are very varied. there is one thing i don't like and that is that on thursdays there is paella but you pay extra. i think that at the price of the menu (about 16 euros) there is no need for that extra fee for the paella. by the way, if you want to look at your cell phone, they give you some handmade things with wine corks that are luxurious.

the best place in barcelona to go to lunch, dinner, have some tapas... the quality of the food and drinks is incredible, the staff's attention is perfect as well as the speed of service... everything is a 10. we have been coming for years and we couldn't be more satisfied. happy, plus they already know us and know exactly what we want, they are the best! thank you!
a discovery on my part invited by my children. local with more than 50 years, without great pretensions but ideal for tapas or tasting their daily menuscongratulations

the bar bodega can ros is a small, rustic restaurant with a great price-performance ratio. we chose one of the menus. the food tasted great and was more than plentiful. furthermore, all dishes were freshly prepared. the service was super friendly and helpful, and she gave simple and clear answers to questions.

large selection of tapas. the lunch menu has a very good price. the staff are very friendly and strive to fulfill all of their guests' wishes. and above all: the shop is full of locals. for me it is always a sign of quality.

nice winery where they serve traditional tapas and where their forte is rice dishes.in my case, the experience was not entirely pleasant, since i had somewhat high expectations, especially for trying the black rice (supposedly the best in the place) and it did not measure up, quite bland, with hardly any flavor, apart from the alloli wine cut…for the rest of the things requested, no complaints, everything very good, in line with the expectations...as a detail, the restaurant invited us to the p

old bar, with pedestrians, well-preserved and frequented.they do a daily menu (you can also order half) with properly prepared dishes and a lot of variation.the service from all the staff is excellent and fast. the place in front has a terrace and it is a bit noisy inside.

it is a traditional bar with tapas and also a menu. perfect for a bite or a vermouth at the bar or a menu at the tables. it is well priced and offers typical food such as sausage, chorizo, croquettes, bravas, etc.there is quite a smell of frying from the kitchen.

excellent output of dishes for making fork and knife breakfasts. it is not a luxurious space, but the friendliness and efficiency of the service is very good.they also do menu lunches at a good price of €16.at breakfast time it's full but you don't have to wait long.

excellent for lovers of breakfasts with a spoon (esmorzars de forquilla).wide variety of hot and cold tapas.specialties of the day.great selection of tortillas, almost always freshly made.reasonable prices.

an ideal place for tapas. i wouldn't know what to recommend 🙆 since everything is very tasty 😛their tortillas are great, both the potato and artichoke ones, their delicious bombs, the croquettes, bravas potatoes, etc, etc.🙋data to keep in mind: saturday closed and sundays 3 new tapas: tuna with mayonnaise, roman-style squid and cod fritters.😝a plus: the attention is fast and the guys are very friendly!

how good we have always eaten at can ros!!!!! spectacular food, a traditional place away from the center with tapas and a menu at a very good price. special mention to pablo, who was super attentive to us :)

what a lovely find. we 1st had lunch there - bocadillo and the noodles. it was amazing. i went back for noodles everyday after. the one woman cook is a joy to enter act with - even though i can’t speak spanish

best food, best price and service with a spicy smile.

one chef lady is all it takes.  pretty awesome bocodillos, yes probably nicest toasted crunchy baguette i’ve had so far and i mean i’ve had a jamon iberico bocodillo everyday in spain.

chow mein, super tasty with perfectly textured cabbage and good amount of eggs.

friendly service all around.  will be back!

i stopped by for a sandwich and a beer and i was not disappointed. staff was polite and quick to serve. sandwich was delicious and beer served in an ice cold glass. i got the chicken sandwich with everything which includes persian pickles i like very much  for 6 euros the sandwich was a steal and would definitely go back. some outside seating as well which added nicely to the experience.  good for anyone on a budget or looking for tasty sandwiches and cold beers.

update: added picture (sorry i
delicious food! noodles and bocadillo francesca. also very friendly! ...and a good opportunity for every foreigner to practice spanish with the owner 😊 will return for sure! 🙏

this is the sandwich spot in poblenou. the staff are incredible and the food is always great, especially the chorizo sandwich. there are only two people who work there, so it can get busy in the early afternoon, but it’s worth the wait.
veeeery good sandwich with chicken! it was fresh, jucy and delicious!

this little unasumming bar makes great warm sandwiches that take the regular spanish bocadillo to the next level, nothing fancy but very yummy and lovely service. if you are in the area check them out. another bonus, bocadillos are cheap for what you get ... try the tortilla frencesa (egg) with cheese, onion and arugula (tortilla francesa con cebolla, queso y arucula).

the most amazing sandwiches! the environment is cozy and the place always smells amazing. i took my family here while they were visiting, and they said it was the thing they will miss most about barcelona. 100% recommend!
its the best sandwich in barcelona, try the one with chicken!! the owner and chef are amazing people. my favorite sandwich shop in barcelona

this place is my favorite lunch place ever! i eat here everyday! yan, the owner, is the sweetest lady ever and makes the experience lively as well as delicious. every sandwich is great, you can’t go wrong! best bocadillo in town!
amazing bocadillos ! litteraly the best i’ve tried in barcelona, cheap price and staff very nice !
tasty sandwiches at a competitive price
amazing little gem of bar with fantastic service and the best sandwiches in barcelona!
best sandwiches in poblenou and the staff is always super nice!

best sandwiches in the area, best value for money. i always order the delicious vegan sandwich. the coffee is also great and the woman in charge is super efficient, friendly and professional. it also has a great terrace. i recommend it ☺️
excellent service, so it is a pleasure to place orders over the phone. for the sandwiches, another 10!
she is authentic dynamite! super efficient, friendly and attentive. plus, i had the best bacon cheese sandwich of my life. and i have eaten many.

very good bar for an unexpected stop, a snack or a good sandwich with a beer. well above average in intentions and flavor. try the secreto sandwich with arugula, onion and cheese: amazing. and the others will be that good! i'm already thinking about coming back to continue tasting!

i went because i read good reviews about the sandwiches and the truth is that they are very good. the person who serves him is quite nice and good people. the only thing to improve is the order, since there were many plates and glasses accumulated that needed cleaning.
very considerable and good portions, in addition to good treatment and a decent place. definitely a place to return to.
the best sandwiches in barcelona! the girl who serves is super nice. if you want a delicious sandwich this is the place 😉

i think the cheapest wines and beers in gracia, always some alternative music... i think it's a good place for all tastes if you don't want to spend a lot

the place is good, although the noise is unbearable and not because of the music, but because of the people. i have never been in a place where people scream so much. the food is more or less good, although the patatas bravas are not bravas. normal prices. i have been there 3 or 4 times and each time i have had to wait a long time for the food, although the waiters have always been very friendly.

the bar that you don't want to ever close! i hope there is black cat for life!its atmosphere, for me, is the key: the decoration, the dim lighting, the music (rock and variants). for those of us who shy away from pop, reggaeton, trapera, etc. musical trends, it is the ideal place!in addition, the food is very delicious and at a good price.and last but not least, the staff that works there are loving people! they are very nice!!!i hope they never change! <3
it's a bit of a dive. they play rock music. but the cubatas are €5 in the gracia neighborhood.to have a few drinks with friends it's fine.the bathroom was disgusting.
nice place. it has a wide variety of drinks. i was able to have a fernet with coca
great personal treatment ole

great transitional place for one night. it is well decorated even though it is a small place. very correct treatment and reasonable price for the area. also good night time. what they should keep an eye on, and even more so having a doorman at the entrance, is the drunk and/or out-of-touch people inside the venue who annoy and annoy both the girls inside the bar and the people around them.

it's a good place to have beers with friends. there is no other place nearby with the quality/price ratio. the sandwich menu is extensive and the tapas and sandwiches are excellent. although there are some other inconveniences since it is usually filled with young people who shout a lot. not suitable for people looking for comfort depending on the time they leave.

one of my quintessential places in the neighborhood!! the cocktails are great, the prices are very affordable and the food is good for a snack. but the best: the music they play, the atmosphere, and the football games they broadcast. furthermore, the attention is excellent; the waiters are great. recommended
quiet atmosphere and good prices, thank you, we will return
excellent bar.good music, good prices, and an excellent waiter! i recommend 100%

the place is good, but there is only one person at the bar who is responsible for collecting and preparing the drinks, which is not enough for the amount of people.they should put one more person at the bar to help you.
good vibes, good bars, there were few people, the bathrooms were very dirty... but it is a good bar for simple things, beer, mixed drinks and that's it.

a neighborhood classic. good beer at a good price. and in general good atmosphere and good music. the waitress was very good, the waiter not so much (the typical one who seems to be bothered by the clients. the other day, he was smoking a cigarette at the door with his colleagues, the clients came in and not only did he not come in but also when he did does not even approach us to see what we want)

the best thing about this place is the extensive menu of combinations they have (there are practically all existing brands of spirits) and the price of the beer! a pleasure to find a place to grace with an appropriate price. good pre-party atmosphere on weekends. there are always people. it's a fun place..

very noisy, very loud with tons of smokers at the door. kids play in front of the bar too, and it’s inconvenient because the ball makes too much noise (there is a town square right next to the bar, kids should go there to play). the inside is very loud too and there is always people smoking and talking loudly outside. i don’t recommend this place. it’s uncomfortably loud and the smell of smoke is annoying, the worst part is that the people in charge don’t do anything about it.
good service, still crowded with locals. not expensive and quiet.
great authentic local! croquetas!!
a place to return to every day....the years go by and you feel like home every time i go there 🥰

quite an old place, that is its charm, i love the columns and the marble and wrought iron tables they have, it is quite spacious and they have quite a few tables. access is not adapted for wheelchairs or strollers, the good thing is that the bathroom has a baby changing table. the bad thing is that it is a fairly busy place and it is quite noisy. the staff is friendly and attentive and they make delicious sandwiches, my favorite is the figatova (fig jam, brie cheese and caramelized onion), they
one of the best bars in gràcia. the sandwiches are delicious. the place is emblematic. the atmosphere is fantastic.
the violet! an authentic center of popular culture with more than 130 years of history, now municipally owned and managed by the gracia culture gang coordinator.

i have ordered some dumplings and they have a rotten taste and smell, the meat was terribly soggy. they said it was the wine they use but it smelled very very very bad. they didn't give me any solution... they yelled at me that it's homemade and it's not their problem, it's a matter of taste. i do not recommend this site at all…
the space is very beautiful and very warm. very good variety of sandwiches with very original names. very good attention.
unfortunately when i arrived there were no croissants but the latte coffee was good
another place that does not show the prices, i have passed by and not even in the cards that you have outside with what you have there is no price. damn where the cucumbers turn bitter 😉😉😉

the truth is that it is a very nice place, good product and better service! there is an area for children with toys, games and books, it is very good and they are extremely attentive. i have to eat again, we only ordered drinks and sandwiches very well.
i have attended a conference and are forced to do so. the bar has a good atmosphere.
dirty place, disastrous service with bad manners that if you are not a customer they do everything possible to throw you out.bad and expensive food, a nonsense place.
homely, festive and lifelong atmosphere. friendly and efficient service. in the heart of gràcia. 😍😍😍

traditional and charming place, ideal for spending a pleasant time tasting their hot or cold sandwiches, croquettes, dumplings, various pastries... at affordable prices. the best of all is the treatment and service of the staff who serve you there. there is a room specially set up for small children to play without "disturbing" the rest of the users...
family bar, inclusive and with a very good atmosphere
la violeta is a space in the neighborhood of gracia, very pleasant, spacious and with history. breakfast is very good. you can also make a very tasty aperitif.
pleasant space and exceptional cuisine. very good value for money, although the quantities are small.
mid-20th century cafe with children's area. good tapas. brilliant.

in general, we barcelona people know that all of this used to be villas, and if that's not the case, someone has to keep reminding us. violeta takes care of it and succeeds in the concept of the hygienic and social neighborhood/village task. the atmosphere is familiar but allows for kisses and secrets, and the waitress has been very kind after a strict and standing start, which is exactly how things should be done in this country. the price of beer makes you think of an idyllic socialism. i'm n
very bad customer service, they don't serve you, the food is terrible. we went to hang out with some friends and we had to leave.
the best place in the neighborhood for breakfast! don't forget to ask about the pachuca offer, it is well worth it. we love it and especially xavi vallés.

center of the associative movement and deeply rooted in the neighborhood; good prices and better sandwiches, coffees for the modernettes, vegetable milks and the usual ones... depending on the time you can work there or rest from the city... empowered women who run it and take care of us every day and who are worth getting to know.
very bad food, very poor quality and cold. the service leaves a lot to be desired. and on top of that, dear.

classic bar, typical of the neighborhood, friendly, correct service and proportionate prices. some place in the area should take note of how to manage a place of an entity for all audiences and tastes.
a good place to go with kids .. they have a separate atmosphere where they can play. friendly and cordial treatment.
a spectacular place with very good sandwiches and very good argentinian ridges. it is spacious and there is almost always a table. the prices are cheap and the service is very good.

they don't ask you for the bill right away, otherwise you can wait up to half an hour and hopefully they'll have served you, there's usually one or two girls depending on the day they're there for customers, meanwhile there's one outside smoking with her calm down, another one who is at the bar doing nothing alone when there is a customer who asks her if but because of her will she won't go.
emblematic place in the gracia neighborhood.
lifetime neighborhood bar. house of culture gangs. very friendly and approachable people.

good place for simple group dinners. very cheap menu but of better quality, although when it comes to paying, bearing in mind that you are in the heart of gràcia, you can forgive it. the wine list should be taken care of.
neighborhood bar of a lifetime...quiet in the middle of grace!! ideal for chatting with friends for a while!nice waitress!!good sandwiches for breakfast
the truth is that the atmosphere, the service and the prices are the strong point of the place. maybe the food is not the best you will try in the area, but the experience makes up for it!
there are no more of those, village type, very good prices

a disaster, they don't have verdejo, they don't have aquariums, they don't have mineral water, they serve you water from a machine in an open bottle that has a bad taste. expensive and few bravas potatoes. very expensive, bad service and poor quality
endearing place in the neighborhood of gracia, good sandwiches and very friendly and familiar treatment.
lifetime meeting bar in gracia my grandparents used to go and the family doesn't seem to pass the time very nice warm they make delicious sandwiches it brings back a lot of memories!
i found it good, but i find the foam inconsistent, it disappears too quickly. it's practically 0.0, they've managed to do that.

before the reform there were young people, billiards and atmosphere, now only parents with children and older people. the croquettes are soft because they are reheated and the bravas are very oily. before it was very cool and now not so much.

the two waitresses were disrespectful. they have treated us very badly from start to finish. i don't recommend the place either for the food (which is nothing remarkable) or for the service. i hope these types of sites disappear soon.
we were walking through the streets of gràcia and stopped to have a drink. economic site. it's pretty good.

la violeta is a cultural center that offers infinite cultural activities.it has a theater and conference room, a room for exhibitions.a nice bar, popular prices.all very familiar.special space for the youngest members of the family.
a very pleasant place, a space of popular culture. with space for children away from the hustle and bustle of the bar and without glass. highly recommended!
fantastic meeting place in vila de gràcia. pleasant space and good treatment. bar located in the la violeta popular culture center in gràcia, managed by the culture groups of gràcia.

it is an old bar that has preserved its charm. the service is good and they are flexible if you bring something to eat from somewhere else they let you consume it. the only thing i haven't seen as very positive is that you can only pay in cash.
excellent and cheap tapas and sandwiches
good place to have your beer. pleasant atmosphere . collection point for packs to good to go
they are very attentive. very affordable price and good quality. family atmosphere
space with charisma in the middle of gràcia. reasonable prices and very good service.
everything is super good and the workers are the cane...
good place to eat, good sandwiches, and village atmosphere
it is an old place, marble tables, with a lot of character. family atmosphere, couples with children, seniors. very reasonable prices.
a classic of grace! perfect for going with a group
the food was great, and there was an area for the children to play. ideal when the grace squares are crowded. i loved the classic tapas.
great food especially the fabulous sandwiches and the wonderful dependence
very good products, from produce from their gardens to shellfish which come directly from the auction 100m away. not to be missed 👏👏👏
wonderful neighborhood bar that invites you to do many things..., especially to go with friends and have a drink and chat......
the washing when i came in i almost drowned from the mosquito spray and because of that comment the owners themselves answered me badly or inappropriately
gràcia neighborhood. very warm and to spend a good time.
incredible homemade food, amazing croquettes. super friendly people. i will return without a doubt
a place that transports you to the village houses of your whole life in the neighborhood of gràcia. highly recommended.
good and good price for what is in the area. good people
fabulous
bad attention. the waitresses have a total lack of respect. it is not a place to go with children.
good dishes, great quality
emblematic place of all life.quite a reference from gràcis
a lifelong neighborhood place. pleasant. good price and good treatment.
a very quiet space, very varied breakfasts and great service.
historical good of barcelona and that tells the story in photos on the wall and the owner's video of the classic place
it's a nice place where you feel very comfortable
great quality/price tapas. good atmosphere with many children (children's playroom)
a neighborhood bar of a lifetime, formidable. unbeatable in its style
they are very good in the afternoons
a place that preserves the warmth of the old village bars. they make tapas, sandwiches. it is not economical.
it has space for children and that gives it something that is missing in the neighborhood. the croquettes are very good!
traditional establishment. quality food and drink. very good selection of beers.
a very good bar and center of the gracia neighborhood
the bar is no longer what it was, you can't pay with a card and they tell you after dinner...very stressed waitress and the sandwiches didn't look very good.
super authentic! a bar from before. great find!
a bar full of grace
nice old casino in vila de gràcia where you can have coffees, sandwiches, pastries...
it's a charming and cozy place that transports you to a village bar...
i haven't eaten
neighborhood bar with atmosphere. somewhat noisy but with a play area for children.the brave ones are quite regular
magnificent as always, too bad we won't be able to enter tomorrow due to covid
very good, one hundred percent recommended in the heart of gràcia
a traditional bar, in a place that is the historic center of several cultural and recreational associations of villa de gràcia
a neighborhood bar with a very good atmosphere, very nice staff and good food at a very good price
a place like a lifetime. with tradition, good attention.
a very pleasant and friendly social space.
good sandwiches and good beers!! very good attention!
very good attention and good breakfasts
recovering an atmosphere of complicity with good tastes and companionship
great to go with kids, the games room is great for them
we're just hanging out to resolve a work issue.
it is a nice place, they provide good service, attention to the moment and they have a varied menu, we will return and we will recommend it, thank you
perfect unmatched authentic
lack of cleanliness on the tables, cold food. good sink.

absolutely loved it!
we asked for the server's recommendation and were absolutely satisfied with everything. seafood was fresh and perfectly cooked, calamari was so creamy.  the anchovy toast was amazing!  we were sorry that we found this place on the last day of our trip. it deserves the repeat visit.

bar mut in barcelona presents an engaging dining experience that is as delightful as it is intriguing. on a bustling afternoon, my family and i were greeted by the attentive staff, who navigated us through our meal with an observant eye, ensuring our needs were promptly met despite the lively atmosphere.

diving into the menu was an adventure in itself, as it is exclusively in catalan – this added an element of surprise with each dish we ordered. yet, each reveal was a pleasant one; the local cu

we were recommended bar mut by a local and we can see why - it was an amazing little bar with loads of fresh fish, expertly cooked in a genuinely local style. there was a fantastic selection on the menu to choose from as well as an abundant wine selection. the staff were attentive, friendly, spoke perfect english (which is good, because i don’t speak any spanish!). an absolute must visit if in barcelona. it was higher end priced but worth every cent! spoil yourself, there are few other places as

we arrived around 2:30pm on a lovely friday afternoon and were given the option of eating inside or outside.  we picked outside since it was such a pretty day.  the service was prompt and they helped us with the menu and made excellent suggestions.  the steak tartare was top tier and the grilled octopus was such a delight we considered re-ordering it!. the reason for the 4 vs. a 5 would be the prices.  we had two beers and our dinner for €130 which was the most expensive meal on our 10 day excur

the best seafood paella i had in our barcelona trip. overall food was really good. one thing i need to point out is no english menu. they have a menu chalk board that written by local language but the service spoke english and came to us to introducers what seafood they had that day. so i found some photos to show the service to see if they had it or not. i will say that prepare some photos before visiting the restaurant helped!

an exceptional experience and wonderful staff - we put ourselves in the kitchen and front of house/sommelier’s hands to choose tapas and a few courses for our party of 5. it just as good if not better in 2023, as it was on our last visits 10 & 12 years ago. and they were very accommodating for a surprise announcement by one of our party ;-)

a cool wine bar in barca. it's not huge so definitely book if you are keen to go. there is only one big menu in spanish inside but the staff do a great job of walking you through it. we didn't order any of the seafood from the cabinet but everything else on the menu was all really good. highlights were the steak, octopus and mash, and the baked cheesecake. top notch wine selection as well. service was professional but could be slow. the atmosphere was pretty good.

lovely food and great wines.  i did end up unexpectedly spending >€100 on paella, though perhaps that was my own fault. we were not warned about the cost of the seafood we chose to put in the paella, and charging >€60 for 4 king prawns alone is appalling.

i've been there twice now during my trip due to the incredible flavor, attention to detail and warmth i felt from the staff. 'staff' really  misses the mark as i felt cared for and about. thank you so much for making my vacation that much better. i asked both times for the waitress to order on my behalf and was blown away.

small, but very fresh menu. sounds like menu changes frequently in order to accommodate for the availability of fresh seafood and other items. we started with their summer cocktail. i believe it was a red wine sangria with some champagne. i highly recommend the steak, chaleta de baca (probably at bone), the potatoes were served french fry style with roasted green padrone peppers, and leeks on the side.

the place is classy but informal. it's a tapas bar so you can accept to have a relatively confortable table. but still, you can book and have a place reserved for you and your campany. the service is very good: informal, welcoming and competent. the food too is very good: i would suggest in particular the pulpollio (octopus on a toast made of chicken skin). you have also a choice of fresh fish and seafood. i think that overall the prices are a bit too high in relation to the quality of the food

came here on a recommendation from someone else. struggled at first with the menu, hard to translate for our terrible spanish skills, but the wait staff were very gracious and gave us some recommendations. we got the asparagus risotto and leeks with sauce and cheese (both vegetarian) that were completely amazing. we also got cod cheeks on pork that were almost like a soft boiled egg on pork belly, so good, and a bowl of spicy mussels with an amazing broth that we got bread to sop up. vermouth al

amazing tapas and bar! while on the move stopped there for a quick bite light lunch and some drinks. they had a variety of dishes and are famously known for their fish from the croquettes, mussels and paella to the octupus and grilled leak. note: we ordered 3 orders of the octupus as it was that good!

everything was spot on great and service was on top! we had someone join us explain what their options were, their recommendations and was super speedy!

beautiful interior decor, huge selection o

excellent place for authentic tapas. go early or make a reservation because it get full pretty quickly (also the place is small). i recommend sitting down inside as the terrasse outside is next to a very busy corner.
they have an excellent wine selection and they are happy to make you try if your are unsure about what to pick.
down side: the menu is only in catalan. guys, i understand it’s a catalan restaurant but looking at the number of tourist, you can make an effort. maybe have a qr code wit

the food itself was delicious and most definitely made with a high level of attention as the wine list as well was amazing, however, the service at times was questionable. we did not speak great spanish/catalan and struggled with not having a written menu and for that we were not treated extremely well by a few staff members. however, our waitress was extremely helpful and made the experience wonderful overall.

incredible introduction to barcelona food.
the croquettes were fantastic, and you must get the beautiful leeks. dessert of french toast is honestly one of the best plates i've eaten.
great wine options too.

wait staff are friendly, accommodating and professional.
a must visit if you are in the city!

the place is okay, the food is not bad, overpriced compared to the quality and the quantity , the order is by piece, no menu,  even the board only lists the appetizers that is not understood for non locals, the waitress lists the options of raw food but ull never know how much ull end up paying for what you are ordering,

she noticed that i dont want raw food, she suggested chicken with potato dish, the taste was okay, but we were charged 50 euros for this platter which is full of chicken bone l

bar mut is a good example of one of the small wine and tapas bars that can be found in barcelona. the house wines are good and the staff are young polite and friendly. relax over a glass of beer or wine and enjoy chatting with friends. ps the olives here are particularly good.

the food is ridiculously over priced, everything is so small and expensive, even for barcelona let alone rest of spain. for example a tiny portion of cockles they charge 20 euro each, they said it’s 150g but you can basically count.

i left disappointed. the menu does not offer you anything special compared with other restaurants in town with the same price range. i consider it expensive for the plates we ordered and the quantities served. the quality of the ingredientes is good but does not match the quantities & price you pay for each plate.

good bottled wine menu.

average service. for 60€/ person you expect a more detailed service.

it was my second time at this restaurant and  won't come back again.
amazing food and good service, probably the best meal we had at barcelona

i loved this place! food was so good, i would love to come back. it was a bit messy situation with the menu. it was not clear what they have. we should wait for a special person who will explain a menu, it took some time… but in general team was very sympathetic.

an afternoon snack of seafood and an assortment of other tapas was a great option to be had here. a wide selection of drinks to go along with your food offers a colorful culinary experience on a long hot day. the only downside to this fantastic establishment is that you may be waiting quite a while for service… to the point that by the time you order the seafood bar and several dishes might have suddenly become off menu. if you have time and are not picky with your food options this is a wonderf

i've eaten at michelin restaurants that don't hold a candle to this place. the food is delicious, modern and fresh. the staff is very friendly and accommodating. i highly recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting barcelona would be heartfelt not to visit this restaurant. bravo!

after numerous recommendations, we decided to finally give bar mut a try. we'll unfortunately the experience was mostly ruined due to the very poor service and kitchen synchronization. don't get me wrong, the staff was friendly, but not so organized and possibly under staffed. the food took at least an hour to reach our table!
do not expect any english menu, although  one of the waiters was kind enough to explain the house specialities. all in all i personally think such a place deserves better

excellent food, service and i really loved the atmosphere. the quality of ingredients is top notch with some interesting variations of seafood, sauces, various meats, etc. definitely a highlight in this area.
our first meal in barcelona and it was the best paella style rice we had the entire trip. customer service was awesome and the food was solid.

this used to be a great spot. now is just a tourist trap (no locals, most people sent by hotel concierges) we were kicked out because we had spent to much time having dinner, they were not polite, we had asked for another drink and they came with the drink and  then told us we needed to leave because other people where coming 😏first time they charge extra for putting sea food in the paella, very expensive, it used to be a great place. it is a tourist trap. 4 people/ 1 paella for two/ croquetas a

an amazing lunch at bar mut today with a display of tapas from the land and sea, including one of the best plates of pulpo that i've ever had and a, melt in your mouth, perfectly seasoned turdo. i have not a single bad thing to say about this down to earth and cozy location. great service as well, with a team of attentive and helpful staff. bravo!

a great place in barcelona, closed to la pedrera on of the most beautiful house built by gaudi! the staff is really great, a special thank you to the sommelier who proposed perfect wine with your meal and what you want to try. the kitchen is amazing! don't hesitate to go there, an advance booking is a good option.

outstanding food, great selection of wine and very nice ambiance. easily my favourite restaurant in barcelona. too bad the service was a bit whimsical and slow on our visit, but i’ll still come back to bar mut whenever i’m in town.

one of my new favourite places. the food is gorgeous. the team so personable and they recommended an awesome wine which i can't remember the name of (white dry). scallops and foie gras to start (shared). black rice for main. best to book.
pretty decent catalan food on a higher price end with delicate small portions that worth trying .
amazing place. excellent food, great wines, delivered by nice, happy and friendly team members.
great food, awesome service. unfortunately located at the corner of a main street, it‘s a bit loud outside. but the great food is well worth it! of course one can always sit inside 🤓
super friendly and knowledgable staff. we had an absolute amazing evening with delicious food and good wine. the place is cozy, not too loud and the staff is very helpful.
small and authentic place with friendly waiters. food is delicious but quite expensive.

an amazing authentic experience is a v cool environment. the team are super well informed, helpful with the menu and advised us on the amount to order. all in all it was all thriller, no filler. can't wait to go back!

we had a dinner for four. the restaurant has very limited space which is quite typical for bcn . we were seated in the terrace. the tapas are served by piece and even though the size of the tapa is small we liked it. especially beef tartar and oysters. the main dish was a deception however, as we ordered paella and it came in a size of what you would normally get for one person in any other decent restaurant in barcelona. to my kind question whether it was a normal portion for 4 people the waite
small and authentic place with friendly waiters. food is delicious. we had a great evening.
