tapas, brie toast, sausage with mushrooms, vegetable lasagna, cannelloni... long drinks... ideal space for an informal dinner, and chatting and listening to good music...

bar viu is an ordinary bar located in the gracia neighborhood. the music can be a bit random and without a defined genre, which may not be to everyone's taste. despite this, the atmosphere is cozy and the staff is friendly. however, there is nothing special to highlight about this particular bar. overall, it's a normal place to have a drink with friends.
beautiful vermouth in the heart of gràcia, where there are good tapas, fresh beer and a good atmosphere. ah! and good music!
the coolest bar in the universe if you want to throw a party because you're going around the world!
we went for the grace festivities. good atmosphere and attention!
very nice atmosphere in gràcia. the young and very pleasant staff make you feel like you are among colleagues. ideal for a few drinks and tasting some tapas and snacks. place to return!
perfect to go for a drink, to eat dishes or to spend a night out, it all depends on the day you go there, the living is chameleon haha
if you are for grace, you have to go. good people, good music and good vibes. it's a must!

very good value for money for the tapas that have been a delicacy. the service was incredible, the waiter who served us (gerardo) was very charming and very wise and also knew how to speak the spanish language very well because he was catalan. i would repeat!!

as a lifelong resident of the gracia neighborhood, i have to say that we are delighted with bar viu. it is a charming place ideal for having a beer in the mid-afternoon, or for the more party-goers a drink at night. from time to time they schedule very interesting talks and debates with prestigious journalists.

i went with three friends on a tuesday night. from what we ordered from the menu there was nothing. they suggested cannelloni (plural). when they bring the dish, it was only one unit (€7.7 for a supermarket cannelloni). a fraud.furthermore, the closing time indicates 2 and at 12 the lights and blinds were already lowered, inviting us to leave the place.zero recommended.

in this bar everything goes with diminutives. more than a bar, it's a hat. live bar? alive but in a coma. toasts are toasts. everything small except the price. i'm sure they're good people, they always say hello.

good music and an unbeatable atmosphere. the service is a charm! they have very interesting temporary exhibitions and also do live performances. the premises can be rented for private events. i recommend!
poorly ventilated place, the atmosphere was very charged, i didn't last five nights there. i went back there to give it a second chance and they didn't let me in in a bad way. i don't plan to go back

very expensive. €20 for 2 cannelloni at 7.7 each and two galicia stars. i have never felt so cheated by a cover.the main dishes are tapa size too, in the case of the “chicken cannelloni” which costs 7.7, only one comes!! if he had asked me for some patatas bravas, i would surely eat more.the attention and atmosphere very good.but it is not to go to dinner and eat fairly well to satisfy your hunger.
when you can get in, it's a great cocktail bar!!
the croquettes are the best i've tried in barcelona. incredible deal, i recommend it, pleasant atmosphere, intelligent and artistic. youthful
i loved it! the owner is great, the beer is great and the place is super nice. one of the best gracias bars in barcelona. i love music! i will definitely return :)))
unbelievable you feel at home. gerard and enric are great, between the tapas, the beer and the music it's quite a show. highly recommended!!

i went on a saturday for the first time around 12:30 at night and i didn't love the atmosphere. they had a hip hop dj and current music that made our night happy. we were having drinks and dancing until late. but we returned on a friday around the same time and the atmosphere was very different. there was no dj, the music was low and the tables were still set up. is the dj thing only on saturdays or how do you set it up? i would love to go back and find the atmosphere of the first night...
good place to have a drink and dance a little. although it is quite small, you soon get used to it and have a good time.

the place is good, the atmosphere is pleasant, without the modern template of gracia and the waiters are friendly, but the prices are a little excessive for what they offer (€1.90 for a croquette, €4.50 for a glass of ipa, etc.) and the very small portions.

the offer of this bar is not only culinary, it offers an atmosphere framed by a well-chosen musical score, with a well-insulated ceiling so as not to disturb the neighbors. the braves are very good. it also offers its walls for graphic artists, painters, etc. it is also very interesting that they can offer belgian siphon beer.
10 stars for enric and gerard because they always know how to make you smile and let me dance!!! handsome!
a very welcoming bar in vila de gràcia. both cocktails and very good tapas. very friendly, approachable and professional staff. totally recommended

active bar, with shows a couple of days a week, plus regular changes of some "mini" exhibition on the wall. in addition, from 6 to 8 p.m., they have offers that get you beer for 1 euro. perhaps the only drawback is the darkness inside the premises (especially noticeable now in the summer).
very good range of tapas and toasts, and unbeatable service. small entrance with two outdoor tables, much sought after by smokers. closes late (1-2 am)
a very pleasant atmosphere and delicious food. to repeat in the neighborhood of gràcia!!
very good, always a very good atmosphere, and the tapas and empanadillas are very good.space is crowded and sometimes fills up very quickly.the staff is very friendly
without a doubt, the best bar in gràcia. it has a careful quality gastronomic menu, in addition they program live music and djs very often.
guillem and enric what a great duo! exceptional waiters, great variety of tapas, they treated us phenomenally…. don't forget to try the micu...we will repeat!
the atmosphere is spectacular, the staff is very friendly and the food is delicious.
great food, great atmosphere and best service! the quiet thursdays hit it big and hard!
the treatment at the door of the one who controls the access is very bad, i will not return.i could not find any full capacity poster, nor did i enter, nor was it as you say in the answer….
nice place to go for a drink.good vibes and good music.very nice waiters.
place with a very bad smell and poorly ventilated! the owner at the door acting as a doorman, very rude and with very bad manners, i won't come back even if they give me free drinks...

eat everything.it is a place to make tapas. stop by after the theater. before starting the week. a very nice place. enter to see it. super friendly staff. excellent music. one more gem in grace. come.
very good salad, more croquettes, myam cannelloni, top waiter. some 'buts'... that they don't serve coffee.we will definitely be back!!!
super attentive, it is a place where you can have a great time
the tapas are very good, small but very good for my taste.
very cool place with a good atmosphere and an excellent selection of cocktails other than the usual mojito and caipirinha (although they also prepare them). tasty options for tapas too.
great music and better people. the coolest bar in gracia without a doubt!

the best patatas bravas i've ever had, great service and a very nice place. best potatoes i have ever tried tje location in gracia the best one the beer is craft beer so awesome and the hosts are super nice love it 😍😍😍😍
new, authentic proposals in the neighborhood are always appreciated. good vermouth and good people. long live viu!!
a place to find and talk with friends and pasar.lo good afternoon and night very good atmosphere
small bar in the gràcia neighborhood where you'll find a little bit of everything (beer tapas, exhibitions, good music...,). pleasant atmosphere.
a very well laid out bar... decoration, good and cheap drinks, exceptional sound, super correct treatment!! live bar for many years
good music, good food, great waiters with patience and sense of humor! i like ;)
we found it by chance while walking and having a few beers, we had an excellent night. good music and attention, and cheap prices.
the treatment is incredible, the space too. do not hesitate to come! joveuuuuuuuuut
the patatas bravas are delicious and the dj is even better. super nice waiters ❤️
from 6pm to 8pm cane for €1. cozy place. sometimes they play live music. good environment
i leave a review after having been here dozens of times, my fault. top bar of all gracia and more. among the three favorites.
perfect for having a beer quietly, simple but very correct, although the heating is a little high. recommended
the atmosphere, the music, the food and of course the good beer are super cool. don't hesitate to visit this place if you visit the gracia neighborhood.
super nice place, lovely service and great food. the quality is incredible for the prices. without a doubt a place to repeat!
a place with delicious, homemade tapas, there are craft beers.the staff is very friendly and attentive
a very pleasant bar, cool and quiet, with the best gin and tonics in the neighborhood.
the few times i have gone it has not disappointed, and the draft beer, 1906, is very good. i recommend.
incredible place! the atmosphere and staff are unbeatable! highly recommended!
very nice waiters and family atmosphere. good mojitos and menorcan pomade.
the best bar in gràcia where you can have some good beers or have a good party before going around the world!
super nice waiters, good music and lgbt friendly atmosphere
very good atmosphere. the waiters are super friendly. quality covers.
cane for one euro from 6 to 8, very good atmosphere, good music and tapas de puta mare
very good atmosphere, well-drafted beers, various options, the best acoustics, live music.
they have private parties there! great
good place for a drink and also for dinner. they have several beers and the food is quite good.
they make a great rice casserole, without a doubt the best in gracia!
a very nice place to go for a drink. very friendly service and everything very clean
a few drinks at the lively bar equals a good time
very good atmosphere. the food is very good to snack on.
from the third visit to viu you become part of the family. good atmosphere and very good music. :-)
a very cozy bar where you can drink chouffe beer on tap 😊... crazy dwarfs.... dj's nights and good atmosphere.
bar de barrio. a precios buenos
sencillo pero efectivo: buenos bocadillos y personal muy majo.
pequeño bar de barrio.

i do not recommend, me and some friends were expelled from the terrace for being "too long to drink a coffee", rude employees, always on the phone, horrible food and expensive! zero stars for this shack!!!

disgusting experience. had an impression there was an earthquake 2 days ago. the interior sucks. was told there is no bread for sandwiches, ordered entrecote - was served smth totally different. ordered mint tea - was served bt herbal tea with milk... the prices are cheap, but they have the worst service. do not understand english at all. never ever back again.
appreciable food, but the waiter's service was terrible. he leaned on the table asking for payment and even changed when asking for separate payment. horrible service. i do not recommend

me and my classmates have been coming to have a drink for years since we study next door and for a couple of months suddenly there is a lack of beers to pay for, or suddenly there is a lack of food to pay for that we have not ordered and they treat us terribly. the service was terrible and we have even been refused service simply for going to the bar next door. it makes us very sad because it was our trusted bar. we will definitely not return again.
delicious loin and cheese sandwich. very good quality price and good service
typical place in barceloneta, since 1921, a little crowded in the interior dining room, the waiter very helpful and pleasant
frozen food, but excellent atmosphere. the service was friendly and attentive. i would come again for dinner.

the employees are very rude. we were sitting on the terrace, we drank and after an hour the owner of the bar came to kick us out of the table. they never told us that there was a time limit to consume a coffee. also, he just took our cups from the table without even asking if we had finished our drinks. the lady is also always on her cell phone talking very loudly, which bothers those who are eating there.the conditions of the bar are terrible, everything is dirty, the bathroom looks like it ha
the waitress is very unpleasant, she speaks rudely to the customer. asparagus salad is the most horrible thing i've ever been served.

rude people. dirty and disorganized environment.some friends and i were kicked out of a table for spending a while having coffee, and they hadn't told us there was a time limit. i will never go back to this place again. i do not recommend it.

if i could give it 0 i would give them. more or less 10 friends went to eat at that place on 11/27/2021, 4 of whom have been vomiting since the morning of the 28th. they will tell you the dishes look good but it almost left more than half of the diners dead. i recommend it if you want to spend a day in which you feel like you are going to die.
quiet environment, good quality and good prices, thank you

the boss has a very bad temper, they look good with whoever they are interested in and even when they consume they treat them with bad manners. i have seen her buy pots and paellas from a moroccan scrap dealer who had found them in the trash without a seal or anything for the restaurant and the kitchen is not there. clean is very small and there is a lot of dirt
spoiled foodwith acute gastroenteritis. me and many colleagues went to eat on 10/27/2021 and today we are all sick.legal measures will be taken.
honest restaurant. the food is very simple but not expensive so the contract is fulfilled.we went there on a monday evening, it was one of the only restaurants open in the area, that helps!
don't order white wine, it's horrible.otherwise well. a normal bar with a terrace to have a drink.

merce's home cooking is excellent on all fish. the quality of the food is very high and the price is reasonable. we love them especially the very helpful, professional and affectionate monica... a dignissim neighborhood menu bar
great marina bar good sandwiches
good quality and good prices, to return
good place to eat and has a good atmosphere
because it is next to my house and they are good people, there is a spanish cook
simple and economical, daily menu, good sandwiches
a place with a good musical atmosphere, i love it and very well attended.
since the change of cook, the warm and good food at a very good price has increased
homemade food.. the best.. the paellas are impressive.. very good quality and price..
incredible place that i could enjoy in good company.
good place to have some tapas after a day in the mountains
very good sandwichgood attention
spectacular bacon and cheese sandwich
it's fine and calm
typical neighborhood bar
las malas lenguas dicen que el pollo está seco pero nadie dice nada de las salsas! imprescindible!!
el pollo estaba sequisimo, es hasta complicado que esté tan seco. gracias a la salsa picante por destrozarme la lengua para darle algo de ritmo a la vida.
las peores patatas fritas de mi vida!

good service from all the staffs here, they are so friendly and for the entry price+ drinks prices for me are ok. the first time i been here on friday night ( 28 of july 2023 ) and was brilliant for experience there 😊
i would like to recommend this place, much better than sutton bar in barcelona.

worst nightlife experience in my life. very overpriced and very rude staff. i was standing in the line i was supposed to be and the bouncer pushed me because i was very close to the rope between the sidewalk and the entrance. i told him not to touch me and he got defensive and told us we don’t respect him. they didn’t want to let me and two of my friends in, even though there were 10 friends of us already there waiting for us, standing at the entrance telling the bouncers we were in the same gro

my past experiences at bling bling in barcelona as a vip were always fantastic, but my recent visit was a complete nightmare. despite having had great times in the club before, last week was a shocking disappointment. my friends and i opted for a normal entry and ended up being attacked by an aggressive individual who appeared to be from a different background. what infuriated me most was that the club seemed to allow these kinds of people inside.

as we tried to defend ourselves and protect eac

!!! do not go !!!!

madness!!! especially as a tourist i wouldn’t go there.
we paid over 1.200€ for a table. we were celebrating a birthday and we’re enough girls for the size of the group.
first we had to discuss to get into the club, because we didn’t seem spanish enough for them.
we got in.

after around 2 hours, security came running up to the boys in the group, without any context and started throwing us out. mad aggressively and physical. thrower one friend over 2 tables, ripped his shirt

i'm well travelled. i've hardly seen a club as racist as this one.
two days in a row we were denied entry into the club, even when we had reservation, second day, i asked the manager the reason why and he then let us in.
don’t go here, they’re racist. they put latin american/reggaeton music but don’t let people from latin american countries in because of their skin color. be for real.

a club for people with no personality to meet fellow people with no personality. if you’re interested in spending time with people who don’t know how to have a good time then this is the place for you.

worst experience ever!!!
we got a table paid 1100€ and the service was terrible and rude.
after the 3l greygoose bottle was empty they just throw us out violently.

i’m often in clubs all over europe and never had an experience as terrible as this!!

i used to love this club a lot! me and my girlfriend, we kept on going there every saturday with no problems since we are locals... but, yesterday was a huge no. we were there with our 3 friends (guys) from turkey. they systematically rejected my friends based on how they look.  fully suited up guys, but, yes we are sorry... turkish guys mostly have beards and black hair....

worst clubbing experience i‘ve ever had. we got harassed by a weird guy that touched all the ladies in the club and the security that was standing right next to us did absolutely nothing. music is horrible and atmosphere terrible.

it's one of the nasty club ever. their security guards always demand for 50 euros or more to get you enter alone. i didn't pay €50 and i got entered alone with a guestlist, after one hour, a guard came to me and dragged me out for no reason and said why did you fight inside? i said when and with whom, another guard came to me and said why did you robb, i said what ? even their own statements were mismatched. this was unprecedented issue of my life. never recommended, but be careful with these sc

incredibly rude bouncers/staff. we live in barcelona and have never experienced something like this. they demand men pay “tips” (bribes) to the bouncers to get in on top of a 20€ entrance fee. it’s ridiculous and not worth it - so many other better places to go where they won’t treat you terribly and make you pay laughable amounts of money to get in. don’t even bother if you are not spanish and look european. things are also not-surprisingly expensive once you get in too.

really good atmosphere, the crowd is overall a bit more high end than at sutton for example. the music is overall better: the dj lets the songs play out and doesnt cut every 30 seconds, and he also plays music which would be known outside of france. they also have other side rooms on top of the main central stage.

these guys discriminate, they give entry to only fair skinned people. denied entry to many of my dark skinned friends and allowed fair skinned people even when they didn’t have a valid id proof. also, after 15 mins of opening they’ll say only vips are allowed. better to avoid this place

we booked a table for 25 people and were treated terribly. the staff was absolutely dreadful, rude, and refused to even give us tap water at the end of the night. do not recommend. (also my jacket got stolen inside the vip)

suitable for an international crowd as they play good popular english pop music along with commercial spanish music. it's a pretty huge club but it can still get very crowded. drink quantities are very small relatively. bathrooms are well maintained and clean.

the most racist club i’ve ever seen. the bouncers are openly racist and wont let us in because we’re not european. they get physically violent if you express the fact that they’re being racist. worst experience of my life and i recommend that no one ever goes there.

this night club was such a great experience for my friends and i.

there was a good dj and the mood was enjoyable🥰🥳

we had the chance to enjoy the vip section, where they treated us very well, we did not had to do the queue at the entrance and we did not have to wait for anything.

it is recommended to book a table to be sure to get in as it is a very popular club.

the dress code is not severe, but they do require well dressed girls and boys. girls had high eels and boys couldn’t go with sport

very strict on entry requirements, they didn’t let my male friends in because they didn’t have the correct fit. also the guards were very mean, we got stuck in line ( people were pushing to get in and we were struggling to go out) and we were politely asking them to help us make out way out and they kept interrupting and screaming to our faces to leave… i get that there is low tolerance in nightclub environments, but this was a little too much

they were so rude with me and my friend at the entrance. two girls. we are always traveling all around the world and i’ve never seen such a thing. asking if we were okay, and then if she wanted is my mother? age? she is just 5 years older than me in a night 25+? such a shame for a famous club. i hope it closes soon. we have more and lots of good people waiting to make some better stuff.

if i could, i'd give zero stars, i read the reviews on google maps and i know it’s possible discrimination but i don’t expect it happened on my own. the security guard at the gate let 20 of my friends in, but made me back in line because i was a girl and didn't wear shorts. thanks for my friends to help in.

the guards were rude. they were choosing who goes in who don't, with no policies and only based on their own perception. many nice and good people could not get in just because the guards didn't like them.
i had a really good time! it was a nice club with a big open space and vip area.

honestly, worst club of my life. i feel insulted and robbed after entering the place. music is horrible as well. please to anyone reading this, don‘t go there. also drinks of mine got stolen from the smoking area.

(group of friends 4 males and 6 females) didn't make a previous reservation, 3 of our friends were able to go in. after that, the security man asked for 50€ as a tip to let us enter in addition to the entrance fees and didn't accept to make a refund for the 3 that already paid
too overcrowded on saturday night. you cannot totally enjoy it with so many people but the music was really good and it is considered as one of the best discos in the town.

very unsafe. the bouncer hit me in the face inside the club and then 2 bouncers kicked me out. i did nothing to deserve that. i was on my way to the bathroom and someone very drunk was pushing me on opposite direction, i just moved him away and the bouncer came and hit me right away without any justification. very unsafe and unprofessional behavior. do not go to that place...

this guy pushed me out of the line... im a girl!!! i was just standing there and he said your sandals?!?! thwy are 150€ michael kors. i had to call the police after he pushed me brother as well. this place is a scam. do not go here

probably the worst experience of my life in barcelona.
the barmaids are extremely rude, the club has no security. we had men harassed us through out the night. at some point they followed us inside the club and had drink poured all over us. we even got stalked after we left. this is the first time i genuinely feared for my life as a woman in barcelona. we paid 60 euros and had the worst nights of our lives here. i won’t recommend at all

i don’t know how this place is inside or the music in it, but i can say that you must be from spain to enter it or you have to tip these guys at the entrace, the one who is called the boss(a tall bouncer and bald) and the other one who was short and with color (this one asked for tip because in the name of his boss)

completely racist experience in this entire club.

the bouncer didn’t let us in because he said they are only going by reservations, however two white girls and a white guy were in front of us and were let in without a reservation ( we asked them if they had one and they said no) so this is blatant racism. we were dressed appropriately so this has nothing to do with not dressing well i was asking why one group got in and not us and and they asked one of the bouncer to touch me without cause. i s

we were 100+ people in front of the club. at some point they opened the doors but first they pushed aggressively around the people in the front line. hurting people in a crowd when these people can't move anywhere is the dumpest thing doormans can do.

good music and company, especially the cleaning girls on the toilet entrances… or cheedleaders i should say?
to be improved: symmetry on the layout of the dancing gogos. they are not distributed equally in the space, only 270•, and it may result painful for the people. if you go and gogos appear, get prepared for your toc

we were here for my friends bachelorette. first they asked her to take off her bride costume at the entrance then they asked us at the booked vip table to take off our sashes to celebrate our friends bachelorette. terrible experience for a very high price.

have to pay a ridiculous amount to even get in. if you are a general/normal citizen, you will not be allowed in. most people have to pay at least $100 to purchase a table in order to be let in. if they tell you it is full, it is not- you just have to spend a lot of money to enter. do not recommend.

this is not a place for blacks or 'people of colour'. my friend and i waited in line and when we got to security, one guy said, "guest list only!"
then i said, "the guys before us (all white men), i did not hear you ask them if they were on the guest list. he then looked at my firend and said, " your distressed jeans is not allowed." meanwhile, i am wearimg shorts and another white guy before us was wearing distressedbjeans of some sort.

i have heard racist stories about nightclubs in barcelona
they stop you at the door asking if you are drunk or not and don’t even have communication or good drinks. they make aperol sprits with soda. better stay in a bar.. just saying

miserable experience. pay for tickets 3 weeks in advance, wait in queue 2+ hours, being pushed from all sides. in the end still not able to enter the club

go to other options, much better!

i didn't have the same experience as the reviews. they weren't as strict as it appears for getting inside. you need to be dressed for a club but not really elegant. people were are a mix to be honest, not a high end club. entry is 20 eur w/a good reasonably sized drink. the music was real fun.

they think they have the right to take advantage of everyone. they changed the time we could get in with a discount at the entrance door without any reason or explanation and with the worst manners. i don't think (after having been a client for a long) they deserve any especial consideration when they treat people as they would absolutely not care about them. there are many other clubs in the surroundings that are way better and have lower entrance fees.

don't go here if you're not white, the bouncers were really racist and told us there was a guestlist however there weren't. especially if you're asian! do not go even if youre a girl you'll get shoved out of line.

absolutely disrespectful people working there. rude, uninterested personnel, that could not care less about costumers. we were a group of holiday travelers and in face of such lack of education and astonishing observations on people’s clothes and looks, decided to go somewhere else. these “in” spots are way too overrated, and workers should be properly taught how to behave.
i was robbed inside in a vip table with absolute no help from staff. in fact, was threatened by a member saying that would be worse if i kept asking for security images. worst of barcelona in action

do not wear thin-soled shoes.

great music, awesome venue. the only problem was picking all the glass out of my shoes at the end of the night. heard no less than 6 glasses break and saw glass on the ground from many more (they do not do a good job of cleaning up the glass during the night).

nice club for having a good time with friends. spacious and bright. i reccomend to book a table -private space. please take care of your drinks as my friend suffered her drink was contaminated with drops of drugs when she toke off an eye from her tequila. security staff helped us and they were great.

the staff is very unpleasant, they just let get in people with money for paying their overpriced drinks. music is pretty bad, if you're looking for quality music just do not go there, brunch-in the park is way better than teenager songs!

good disco with pop and commercial songs. be aware with your clothes, mainly in saturday, because it is only allowed to enter really well dressed people. the security guys are not friendly at all, so take care about that also.

worst club and overall treatment i've ever witnessed in all my clubbing experience around the globe.
in short, they make you feel robbed and taken advantage off. it is managed by miserable childish 'people' without any ethical sense, under zero professionalism plus they treat people as garbage to start with.
you've been warned

in appearance it seems like a nice club with good music. however the service is below standards and the crowd is way too young. plus some people (kids) smoke indoors. not recommended if you are looking for quality clubbing experience.

security of this club doesn’t behave appropriately, if not to say worse. while we were standing in the line they started pushing me and some other men and women. when i asked them not to apply physical contact, they replied in a rude way that if i « don’t like anything i can go away ». me and some other people immediately refused to enter the club and went to another place. not a fan of places, which treat their visitors like animals and would never suggest anyone to visit this place, until gett
music was too loud, but the atmosphere was great. fancy club, so look for minimum age and dresscode online.

they were not ready to take anyone inside. the staff were telling us to book the tickets online and when we checked there as well but there was nothing available. the way the staff were behaving was very strange. first time in my life i have seen something like this. in my home town london it's never like this. if the club is full the staff will inform on the gate but in bling bling the staff were very strange and not giving us the right information.
i am very disappointed with bling bling (sham
not worth a visit, music is very average and staff is particularly rude.
the line wasn´t to long , the doorman was rather rude but i guess that´s the norm nowadays. the music was great , the infraestructure impressive , it is a solid 4/5.
awful you can wait forever to get in the crowed is young and the place is super packed if you’re above 25 forget to go

stay away if you are a foreign person! they are racist and the staff is very rude!
a friend of my and me have been to te club and we couldn’t get inside.we were both well dressed and not drunk. the explanation was: “you are not the kind of people we expect inside”. i saw it happens with another girls also from different countries. extremaly desrespectfull!
i have been partying around the world and that was the worst experience ever. very desappointed about that.
no good, bad music, bad people, we went home after 1h, small club, but vip you can sneak inside thats noice, rating 0,5/10

while a bit too local, it's the place to go if you wanna hang out where people from barcelona goes, and not to the touristic places by the sea. always good environment and quite crowded so you know what to expect. it is not the place to chill if you know what i mean... 💪

stay away!

one of the worst party experiences of my life. the staff is very rude and disrespectful. there are plenty of other places (ex: soho the club) that treat their clients better. partygoers save your time and money and go somewhere else.
it used to be a great night club with great dj performances with more international music. yesterday’s experience was very disappointing…

like a lousy cocktail event where you can’t talk to anyone thanks to too loud music and everyone is just wondering around.  you get pushed occanionally by rude people and stuff. go somewhere else, this is no fun. and the beer costs 7 euros.
great music and big dance floor. but gets too crowded leaving you with no place to move and the air conditioning doesn't really help. it gets really hot and sweaty as the night proceeds.
rude staff working at perhaps one of the worst clubs in the city. save yourself some time and find literally any other place with a speaker — you’ll thank me later.

they are rasict and sexist. the security is the most rasict people i have ever met. they give you no reason and can reject you based on skin color. never ever go there. i am giving it one star because i can't give them anything lower.

hate that i even have to give them 1 star. terrible establishment. told mi amiga y yo that they were full as they proceeded to let in others. extremely classist environment. you are not getting in unless you pay $200 minimum!!!
sorry but they are racists for asian ppl,the securities. after 10 min if i book vip table, they are like ok 1000 euros lol 一群傻逼
perfect place to enjoy a good night out, the vip service is amazing! the atmosphere is incredible, a lot of locals and the music is very danceable, they play a lot of reggaeton which is nice.

bling bling is undoubtedly one of the best clubs in barcelona, for over 25s and locals. i used the isaac list to get in for free and i wasn't disappointed. the decor is very classy, there are two rooms (one regggeaton and one more generalist) and people are all well dressed, and no kids/young people.
bouncers are rude/agressive and age policy is down-right discriminatory. don't expect to get in if your not 25 (males) or 23 (females). also music is extremely generic and drinks super expensive.

i used to love this place. previously it was a  night club for 30+.  it is not what it use to be, now there are a lot of very young people. commercial music. still, it is one of the best options if you like to dress up and dance
they treat customers like goats. the entrance costs disproportionate to be sardines inside it. public frequency of 23 to 30 years with medium-high economic level. the atmosphere is kind of false.
worst organization ever, we could not get in even if we had tickets, the club was too full and we had to wait outside for hours. people were acting crazy, pushing!! never back

unpolite stuff, they pretend that they can not speak english. and if you don't have a freepass or vip card you can't go inside. it's a waste of time and the stuff sucks. zero stars but for the review i have to choose one.

every time i’ve been to this club, i’ve had a really good time. however, i find it overpriced and bouncers can be rude sometimes to their soon-to-be clients (who pay their monthly salaries) while waiting in line.

fance nightclub, good music, drinks with fair price, but the some bartenders don't do a good job, not attending properly the clients, they chat a lot between them, letting the clients waiting to long. mainly in the bar close the toilets

rude, discriminating and poor educated guards at the entrance, would not let us in even if we had the right clothing, vip-list and  id. when i asked what the problem was in spanish, they just pushed us away. worst place in the world! stay away!!!

watch out. the bouncer told my son to leave the club. since my son's spanish is not great, he did not understand the reason for the ejection. outside, near the club, he was approached by two guys who pick-pocketed his i-phone. when he started chasing them, someone threatened him with a knife, after which he backed off and went home. apparently the area around the club is open season for pickpockets. beware.

stupid people with absolutely no sense of fashion pretend that boys don't wear body piercings.

you can seriously enter with zara or h&m knockoffs, but watch out if your style is more advantgarde.

basically it's just a pretentious club. make yourself a fashion culture before you decide what's in and what's out, ignorants.
my favourite club !every room has its different music!!
i especially like the interior design of the club, very elegant and well thought through. yet this is a place to "see and be seen", so bring your best looks to get past the rude bouncers.
this club is super racist. the bouncers are incredibly discriminatory and have no morals. they do not let anyone in besides spaniards. do not bother coming to this club. it is a waste of time.
most ridiculous write up ever in the vueling magazine. this club is everything that is wrong with our world today...
racist bouncers, terrible prices, rude staff. don’t recommend at all
i don’t get the bad reviews???? literally best club ever , such good vibes , i want  to die in this club
the club and music was okay in general, nothing special. if you are older than 25, i would not go :)

relatively expensive. too crowded. there is a latin dance floor but there are so many people you can barely move.
long queue to get in.
racist and homophobic bouncers and staff.
bad service vip woman charge us for bottle of champagne and didn’t bring to the table
loved bling bling. large club with room for all. the hooka was delicious and the service was excellent. if you are visiting barcelona it is a great club to check out!
rude staff, impossible to get in, you will get the run around from staff and random promoters. my friend was rejected entry because she had tattoos. all around bad experience.

came in from london with my partner and such a nice experience,cocktails were extremely delicious and innovative! we love the attention and care to all little details,is a must if you visit barcelona and you love a true cocktail bar! not to be missed

exceptional cocktail bar catered towards gin lovers but a good choice for all those who fancy a cocktail. the bartenders are very knowledgeable and can craft a cocktail for you based solely on personality. i tried the natsu yume and it was a great twist on a white negroni. top shelf cocktail bar for sure!
review #1000, wahoo!  fantastic spot for a proper cocktail. el chingón is easily the best cocktail i've had in years.

phenomenally skilled bartender who was a joy to watch work. i disagree with previous reviews related to price. anyone who has had cocktails in new york, los angeles or london will see these prices as about 50% of equivalent cocktails in one of those cities. one of the best bar experiences i’ve ever had (and, trust me,
i’ve been to more than a few bars😉).

a fun little place! the staff knows plenty of english to get you a drink and recommend certain find. found this place by looking up best gin bars in barcelona. well they weren't wrong, the list of gin and the quality of the cocktails is amazing!

the only reason that the review is 4 out of 5 is that the price seems a bit high. for a gin in tonic i spent €11. either way, a great must visit for gin!

they also play leon bridges. so you kinda need to go!

great bar with great energy! the bartenders were super friendly and the drinks are big and delicious. they make their own “ginfolk” infused gin that they use in their g&ts i tried the dehydrated pineapple version which gave t just a hint of sweetness. other patrons were friendly and we got a great restaurant rec while there too (la pepita.) definitely stop by for one of barcelona’s favorite drinks! gin and tonic!

absolutely fantastic staff. incredibly knowledgeable about each and every bottle on the shelf. friendly, good conversation in english, and wonderful recommendations. the guacamole was a nice addition to the top notch gin and tonics. two thumbs way way up!!!
fantastic place with special coctails and very  funny bartender 😀
very few bars sell an experience, this is one of the few. the bartender federico knows his stuff and prepared some amazing gin tonics. 5 stars all the way!

i recently visited this bar with high hopes for a pleasant evening but was left thoroughly disappointed by the overall experience. the cocktails were overpriced, and to make matters worse, the staff exhibited a horrible attitude throughout my visit. the most distressing aspect, however, was the behavior of one particular waiter, who had a mustache and tattoos. this individual was unnecessarily aggressive and condescending, seemingly finding pleasure in being ironic with customers. i was taken ab
amazing bar in gracia. love the drinks, food and service. def one of the best bars in barcelona. good for groups also. staff speak spanish and english and very friendly.

bobby gin more than lived up to its reputation - i sat at the bar for more than an hour, sipping an exquisitely balanced gin cocktail and discussing everything from the history of gin to avante-garde gin blends with ants and moon rocks!

it’s great as a straight up cocktail bar, but also something of an interactive museum of gin! highly recommended!!

i had an extremely disappointing experience at . the service was horrible, and the staff's attitude was incredibly arrogant. it felt like they were doing us a favor by serving the drinks we gonna  pay for.

from the moment we walked in, the staff's demeanor was unwelcoming. we were met with disinterested faces and felt like an inconvenience to them. throughout our entire visit, they never once made us feel valued as customers.

what added to the frustration was their refusal to split the bill, e

the cocktails had a lot of thought put into them, but not unique. the food was good, but again didn't have that something special to them. i think that summed up my feelings. everything, even the decor is good to very good, but just with something special missing (a usp)
they have very nice gins here, also for other drinks still you can choose. staff is friendly, place is warm / cozy.

chill bar with music in gracia.
you can have the classic cocktails or try their own specialities (pic). they are nicely presented and well prepared.

extensive gin list—the bartender was helpful and gave us samples as we decided which gins to have—mombasa gin tasted of cardamom and was terrific with their recommended tonic. a bit pricey but well worth it. we also enjoyed a couple of their small bites as well.
very nice cocktail bar! focus on gin, but there is also a large selection of other drinks. chilled atmosphere and very courteous staff!
great gin bar with a very wide selection of gins  from all over the world. bar tenders were knowledgeable when it came to what gin to drink for each taste.  good atmosphere and well  worth a visit.
innovative cocktails in a cosy setting. highly recommend!
great cocktails!  although the bar mainly focuses on gin cocktails, bartender daniel takes you on a taste tour with totally different cocktails.
wonderful experience. taking the artform to a great level, complete sensory experience.
waiters are only interested in women, if you are a guy you won't be served or allowed to seat so better spend your money somewhere else
super bar for gin lovers, with nice a help full ppl. thank you and hope to see you soon. david & lenka

we went to this place tonight and the guy who looks like he is in charge(tattoos on his both arms) was super aggressive with us for no reason. since we arrived he was extremely rude and the attitude wasn’t nice at all. as residents of barcelona, we will never go back to this place. i will also tell all my friends living here or visiting the city as tourist about this attitude. there are a lot of nice cocktail bars in barcelona where you are welcomed with kindness and a warm smile. i definitely d

honestly the best bar experience i've had so far. the bartenders are so experienced and will share with you all the details and history about the gins. the drinks themselves are incredible. it's a little more expensive than an average bar, but worth every penny and more, because of the attention they put into every drink. rather than spending 11 euros for a bad watered down drink in the club, let these guys absolutely impress you with their amazing creations. also the music and overall vibe... i
perfect cocktails in a cozy place with a bartender that puts in the extra effort

great place, excellent bartenders, i was very new to gin and i am super stoked this was the first place i've really tried it, very good selection of gins and cocktails, differently give the ginfonk ones a go!

great staff and an impressive selection of different types of alcohol. also the barkeepers have been very helpful for the decision. if you are into gin or a damn good cocktail, you need to have a stop at bobby gin!
great drinks.  the 'ginfonk' gin and tonics are quite special. the food is also very good. i had the brooklyn sandwich, which is a pulled pork sandwich, and it was very well made
absolutely amazing spot to stumble upon on the way back to the hotel.

wow...... such a treatment. such a special place.
i was craving a martini.... i never ask it with gin (i've never tasted a good one) so i decided to take a risk and was not disappointed at all. so so good 10/10.
also the guy who prepared it (so sad i couldn't ask for a name because of being so distracted but i went a sunday night) was the kindest of them all. 10/10
i also had the opportunity to taste the gin and tonic and it was wonderful. also the best one i've tasted so far 10/10.
really this
great place. the staff is friendly and the gin cocktails are perfect! highly recommend it!

we spent 5 days in barcelona and came to bobby gin 4 times because it was so good. andrew, robert & the other staff were very friendly & helpful and super knowledgable in their craft. great drinks, each cocktail coming in its own distinctive glass. very chilled atmosphere too. one of the best bars we've been to!
a very cool & nice place. the cocktails are perfect! they know what they do.
had an absolutely fantastic valentines set menu here. food was stunning. was not expecting the quality of food in a place predominantly a bar.
lovely place and cute waiters
amazing atmosphere, great drinks and the best guy behind the bar! 🙌
definitely a great bar to visit, from experience to cocktails🫶🏻 also the environment it’s amazing suge a recommended place 🖤

very cozy bar with an amazing gin cocktail selection. we also got the guacamole for a snack and it was delicious, along with the complimentary patates bravas! great spot for a drink and snack before dinner
the cocktails were amazing!! highly recommended
delicious drinks and friendly. if you are interested in a spin on a gin and tonic, this is your spot tucked away in gracia.

i’ve been bobby gin twice so far, and am definitely planning on going back! the cocktails were immaculate and the staff were very friendly, especially andrew! he recommended and made the perfect cocktail :) if you’re in bcn, you should definitely pass by!
had the best white negroni i have ever had, i couldn’t leave without ordering another. great bar in a quieter part of the city.

i am not keen on giving one star reviews, but tonight i am definitely giving one. i went there with two friends and we were seated at the entrance. we ordered and my friends started playing a game with some drink coasters. we were not bothering anyone and behaving properly, but the waiter got very angry at us. when we asked what the problem was he got more angry and we decided to cancel the drinks and leave. we were escorted outside by someone and the whole bar was looking at us like we did some

if you're a gin lover then it's definitely a place you should visit! the cocktails are really nice. i am actually not super fan of gin, but really enjoyed in there; i think you can actually learn new way to drink gin and taste it differently. also the atmosphere is quite nice and dynamic inside.

absolutely great bar for excellent drinks - especially gin cocktails. it’s been  a delight watching the bartender mix the drinks (and of course drink them). when coming back to barcelona i will definitely come back. i highly recommend bobby gin for excellent drinks & nice atmosphere

we had the *most incredible* time here - we were only in barcelona a few nights and had to bring mom back the second night!! daniel and roberto andres were unbelievable - amazing hosts, bartenders, quick homies, the whole lot. the first night we went was super quiet, had the most amazing service and conversation. the second night was poppin' and still the same all-star service from our new friends! my husband and i travelled from australia but can't wait to be back (we met my parents, from san f
the gin was delicious, good service and nice waitress - a shame that they are not serving any food. would go back for a drink!
great bar, nice selection of gins. cosy atmosphere.
this place was packed at 11 on a saturday. i loved the william chase (?) seville orange and the santa maria. hipster-esque ambiance inside, pretty good service.
very tasty and balanced cocktails

amazing !
just amazing !
bartender is kind and passionate ! surprise cocktails that i never tried and it's the best ever !
highly recommend!! this place was a wonderful start to the night in sitges. there was live music and great ambiance. the bartenders are very nice and overall great vibes.

walked in wearing a tank top and i was asked to leave…no one else was in the bar…don’t go to this bar…i saw your response which has now not available…i understand you have a dress policy (which applies only to men because women can wear tank tops or hardly anything at all)…so, put your dress code on the door so that people know what is expected…make it clear before a customer walks in. you should always put the customer’s needs before your own!

the drinks were average but i guess better served than other places in barcelona and this is why they get there high reviews. in addition, they told us a different price for a premium gin and then we ended paying a higher price. perhaps that was a mistake however it didn't seem nice.

went on a tuesday night - fun and casual atmosphere.
great service from friendly staff.. very knowledgeable about the drinks and different gin flavor pairings (but not snoody)

i accidentally broke my glass 90% of the way through my drink and the bartender started making me a new one before i realized what happened.

must-go for any gin and tonic enthusiast.

great find and lots of gin and fun cocktails.  we ate dinner and it was very good but casual seating.  6 of us  showed up about 7pm on a sat and got seated quickly. it's a little off the beaten track so it wasn't so crowded but worth finding.

we were looking for a place for a drink and we found this gem. it has amazing coctails and many many different gin. we took 2 coctails and 2 gin and all was excellent. also the stuff is very helpful and the atmosphere cozy. nice music and lights, the best for relaxing with your drink.
federico and alberto were great bartenders!! they walked us through some of the greatest gin cocktails ever devised. overall we had an amazing experience and would love to go back!!! highly recommend

very fun space, a long narrow bar and passageway that opens in the back part to allow more tables and chairs. the themed gin drinks were very fun and the vibe was laid back, especially in the back area. it may seem a little pricy, but the quality and ambience are probably worth it.

these guys love their gin, the array of gins is remarkable and the guys are happy to discuss and make recommendations based on your tastes. they'll pair gins with tonics and garnishes or try one of their signature"gin fonks", a g&t on 'royds..
cocktails, i stuck firmly with the classic, and not gin based i'm afraid, the old fashioned, simple, perfect and very easy to mess up, here it was everything i could have asked for, strange twist or "enhancement" that some barmen seem to think make it perf
great atmosphere in a stylish bar with heavenly made drinks. loved the snacks and all the little details. ... not to forget: these guys really know how to serve a good gin tonic!
great staff and great drinks!
great ambiance. nice bar staff. wide variety of cocktails; but also very good simple gin tonics or martinis. a bit on the pricier side but would definitely come back for a well made martini :)

the place is really small, so if you don’t get there really early you are probably going to have to wait on the line. it took us almost 30 minutes to get in, but the doorman was really nice. the drinks are amazing and worth the price.

personally gin is not my go to drink but here the gt´s go down like water.. excelent service! great location! highly recommend this bar, being in gracia makes it that much more special! bravo! cheers!
best gin bar in barcelone. extremly friendly bartenders and all gin you ever want.
great knowledge of gins and joy to watch professionals creating great cocktails.  no irish gins?

best gin tonics in town. impressive cocktails. let bartender recommend you based on your preferred tastes

place is classical flavored with renewed and fancy style. it worthwhile a visit

lovely cocktails, decent prices and the perfect atmosphere!

for roku lovers and the ones who love gin but have become bored of a simple g&t!
if your looking for some amazing gin based cocktails and some incredibly knowledgeable bartenders, this is the place for you! it has been an amazing experience, you won't miss with these guys!!
good drinks (pricey but worth it), staff was polite

i came here three times in my week in barcelona. the staff is very knowledgeable about their spirits. after i talked to them for a bit about my tastes, they made sure i tried something fantastic every night.
very nice place. but 22 euro for 2 drinks? looks like they can spot the tourists. don't order brandy. 18 bloody euros? total rip off merchants.
my favourite gin tonic bar. amazing selection of worldwide gins. great bartenders english speaking. cool and easy atmosphere right in the center of gracia.

one of the best old fashioned i ever had. my bartender lucas took his time with every cocktail and used only fresh ingredients.
bobby's gin is a cocktail bar for my liking.

no bs only straight up hardcore mixology!
very nice place. but 22 euro for 2 drinks? looks like they can spot the tourists. don't order brandy. 18 bloody euros? total rip off merchants.
my favourite gin tonic bar. amazing selection of worldwide gins. great bartenders english speaking. cool and easy atmosphere right in the center of gracia.

one of the best old fashioned i ever had. my bartender lucas took his time with every cocktail and used only fresh ingredients.
bobby's gin is a cocktail bar for my liking.

no bs only straight up hardcore mixology!
quite expensive, but awesome! i recommend it!
excelent experience, a whole new world open for us, andrew our bartender and the rest of the stuff was so welcoming and professional, we for sure would be back.

hidden just outside the walking tourist street you will find this cool oasis to quench your gin thirst. great bar tenders/mixologists and a cosy ambience. its a place catch up with your friends or romance in the corner.
an awesome bar with very professional bartending. great evening, top notch drinks! (tip! the window is actually the door)
place is very nice and staff very friendly. drinks are amazing!

to start with their menu really put me off- very pretentious. the drinks we had were nothing special. my cocktail tasted like a mix of fernet branca and campari... it was bitter and i couldn't really taste the gin, which i thought the place was supposed to be about the gin.  we ordered the thinly sliced beef. the beef itself was bland, smothered in a "fusion" sauce - a cross between hoisin and brown sauce. covered in grated cheese. not "harmonious", it came with a small brown bread roll that was
love this place! great variety of gins and ginfonks... i knew the drinks were going to be good but i never expected the tapas to be amazing and cool. definitely will return.

i was disappointed i was the only client yet the bartender didn’t bother explaining or recommending.

i think they make the gt like 1:4 which is too much for me - make it 1:2 and give the bottle of tonic on the side or ask the client?
nice place for a gin tonic. they have a great variety of gins.
amazing place good price's and very good services, highly recommended

amazing variety of spirits. delicious drinks. very knowledgeable and accommodating staff. stylish place and moderate pricing.
would definitely recommend!
the dark side of the sour was an amazing flavor of whiskey sour. it was the most well made drink i have ever tried. this place is great! totally recomend this place!
as it says they know a lot about gin! we had some food too, it was good, a little pretencious, but i would still recommend for a date or catch up with a few friends.
lovely staff and friendly atmosphere
nice place to have a gin. very professional and prices are ok.
i had the lunch menu. the service was super nice, the food delicious, the price fair and the atmosphere really relaxing with local people.

we found this place by accident and were not disappointed. the food was really nice. however i felt like the hostess or the main waitress was a bit racist towards us. we asked for 2 tables, she said no. then we asked can we sit upstairs, she again said no. then we suggested to sit outside and she again said no. she kept saying no instead of making a little bit of effort and help us. then we suggested to split and sit on 3 tables outside, and finally she agreed as if it was her own house. then la

the quality of food was amazing, it tasted delicious. however, the quality of service was rather puzzling - confused reservation, missing cutlery on the table, not delivered food (they forgot some of our orders, but put it on the bill at the end anyway). furthermore, some prices on the internet (their own website) and the menu were different. and then at the end, also some prices on the bill were different than on the menu.
the prices themselves were too high. i am happy to pay higher prices if

we had a great meal here for lunch off the menu del dia - plenty of choices to keep everyone happy and you can’t go wrong for $14. was disappointed they only offered water for the drink for kids - it seems reasonless to not allow refrescos if a child is ordering when they obviously can’t drink wine. the fish aren’t deboned either. otherwise i cant complain. the presentations were good, the waiter was attentive and everything tasted great.

the cafe was pretty cool, a two storey place with very nice lighting and decorations. the food was well organized, beautifully served and delicious! we enjoyed ourselves there. the prices are a bit high though.
amazing through and through: the food, the atmosphere and the service. facundo and cristian were both super nice, attentive and professional. will come back for sure.

lovely place for a quality dinner and drinks! facundo is a lovely server and made the experience extra special! they treated my dog very kindly as well providing water and snacks!

ps: the espresso martini is one of the best i’ve had!

local and authentic- delicious tapas!

we had a lovely tapas dinner at this friendly restaurant. the food is authentic and made with love. the service is quick, attentive and friendly. we wanted to sit outside but it was full but the staff arranged a table for us inside until there was a free table on the cozy street. after dinner we got a delicious shot from "the house"
thank you for making one of our nights in barcelona a great one!

by recommendation of our host, we tried cafè salambó for dinner, and it was incredibly delicious! our server, javier, was very nice, welcoming, and his recommendations were top tier. would highly recommend!
the food was really good and the service amazing!!! really kind people!!! the price is a little bit high but totally worth it!! the lamb was amazing!!! and the tatin tart was delicious

decent food at reasonable prices. ceviche, salad and cheese were all good.
can’t recommend the croquettes mind you!
amazing food. lovely staff ! specially facu is the best.

really bad food, bad service and they forgot everything and also to cook the entrecôte that they forgot to bring. unfriendly service and zero professional. they charged us everything and we not were able to eat it.
just bad restaurant.

the place itself is good and well managed but the 5 stars definitely go to the beers. they are made in the proper way. location is also very nice, central gracia with a great terrace to see people passing by.
good price, excellent food and friendly staff! totally recommended.
passed by for a beer. its a nice place with a nice, chilled vibe. mixed crowd. staff are nice as well
one of my favorite places in gràcia. have the bravas. you won’t regret it!
the staff was very nice (facu is the best) and helped a lot throughout the meal. we we’re a lot of people so it’s not easy to handle and they did a great job.
came here with 14 people without reservation and they made everything possible to make us have the best time. there was a waiter called facu that was especially kind. 100% recommend
best cocktails ever! facu is a lovely waiter with great recommendations and the atmosphere was great!
it was a really nice restaurant and really good food. the service was really nice, facu our waiter were super nice and helped us a lot during the evening :)
this is one of the best meals ever for us. food very well prepared and presented. staff absolutely fabulous.
loved the welcome, dog inclusion and facu explained the menus in great detail 🙏🏼 local and welcoming of tourists
love the atmosphere and the delicious food here. both for lunch and dinner. they also have a nice selection of spanish wines.
attractive lunch and dining place with small terrace. good service and excellent food. more luxury than the classic tapas.
delicious ham croquettes and crispy potatos bravos. 4 stars only because i didn't try their entrees to know if it's a 5 star.

we enjoyed it! the whole neighborhood is so colorful and vibrant that this place just perfectly fits in. the service could be better, but i suppose these guys are so tired of tourists that thay just can't help it. we've had mostly everything from the tapas menu, and it was delicious. not to mention the cava!

everything was very tasty! i took lunch which included gazpacho, burrata salad, glass of wine and pudding (17€)
my friend took pasta, tataki from tuna, wine and coffee ( 17€)
highly recommend!
fast, delicious and very nice service!

we booked for 5. when we arrived, we were presented with a tiny table for 4. the staff were seriously suggesting one chair would fit in a hole for a street tree. another suggestion was to move the table in front of a fire exit!
when we complained, both the waiter and manager were dismissive and rude, effectively said "not my problem, what can i do?"
maybe don't take a booking if you have no space. we went instead to el cafe de teatru and it was so different, welcoming and friendly!
avoid cafe sa

love it. pool table upstairs, excellent food and friendly staff. great selection of beers,wines and cocktails in a nice relaxed setting. busy at lunch time for the menu del día. if you make it to gracia, i recommend.
excellent sea food and vegetable based fresh tapas. good organic cava! the service was weird at times, but we got seated without reservation on a sunday evening. order “crazy tomatoes”!!

pleasant local. wine bar eatery attentive friendly service.
do not recomend the house wine red.
do recomend the montsant and rioja by glass.
had the oven pork rib with fries. meat was perfect.
inside is not a place for a quiet romantic meet as the volume did get a little loud . outside on terrace is a lot quieter.
handy for after film get togethers as is next door to verdi cines.

this is wonderful restaurant. the food is fantastic and the service is great too. this is definitely an upmarket yet relaxed place. we enjoyed a large selection of foods all cooked in their own style. this is a place to try if you are in the area

always the best quality dishes in a nice ambiance, with nice music. tables are separated enough that gives you good space. tapas are amazing, croquetas, huevos estrellados ... but certainly do not miss the specials ... those are always the star of the show. book before if you want to get in too!

unkind employees and it was also a bit suspicious what happened to us. we were a group of 7 people. they did not permit to go upstairs :(,  and one of us paid for his drink to leave earlier. but when he has left the ticket, it still remained 7 drinks on the "new" one. the waiter assured us that he had already removed his beverage. we had all put more money and there were still a few euros pending. unfortunately our coleague had already gone and despite we saw how he paid, we never saw a new tick
the lunch special was soooo good and such a great value

we had a great evening in café salambó after a rainy afternoon in bcn. we kind of accidentally ended up here, but the ambiance is very nice and the food they serve is delicious!

we enjoyed three kinds of tapas, the croquetes, smoked salmon, and tomatoes filled with creamy goat's cheese... what a surprise. perfect. also the main courses were well done and tasty!

a good bottle of wine and very friendly service of course adds to the atmosphere.
we absolutely would recommend!

it's not a very chea
spacey and good for groups. the food is good and portions are generous, even for tapas. the verdi cinema is literally next door, which makes this cafe an ideal pre-movie eating place.
fantastic food, friendly staff who are willing to go the extra mile- speaking good english and making recommendations. we had a selection of tapas between 8 of us which was all polished off :)
perfect place to share some tapas with friends. staff are very friendly and mini burgers are the best i never eat in my life. just taste them!
good for drinks, and to chat. did not try any food. the place is not a hit inside, but is ok

overpriced 3.80 euros for vermouth. must be that the three olives that come with the stick are from an expensive tin. but it's gràcia, and the locals are getting used to not enjoy our place anymore. help streets neighbors that work hard for decorations purchasing at the stand streets during festa major
drinks and food is good but unfortunately the service is really bad for tourists. seems that they do not want them to be here..

казалось бы самое обычное кафе, на самой обычной (если есть такие) барселонской улочке, но очень вкусно! подтверждение -  полностью забитый местными жителями.

(translated by google)
it would seem like the most ordinary cafe, on the most ordinary (if there are such) barcelona street, but very tasty! confirmation - completely packed with locals.
good wines and nice decoractions. food too expensive,bad quality and small portions. just grab a glass of wine or champagne :)
probably one of the best stops in barcelona for my trip. the mussels vapour were so subtle and well cooked. a must visit

nice staff,  good service, lovely food but the portions are super small for the price they charge.
it is sort of barcelona style.
wow! no other modern words or abbreviations can describe it better.
a cool café in a coll part of barcelona. friendly service and interesting food options. lots of locals - always a good sign

certainly the best lunch in barcelona!!
top service, english speaking staff, tasty food, good wine, air conditioning, top experience!
amazing food, great service. the inside has 2 floors and a pool table upstairs.

great location.
a bit pricy but still good.
good selection in food and beverages.
it was a nice place and the food was good, we went to celebrate the birthday of a friend and it was a good experience.
thank you facu for an amazing evening
good coffee.  good anchovy salad.  lamb chops good but polenta side mediocre. bit expensive.
solo traveller, they were really kind and helpful. good atmoshphere, good selecion of yummy food plus specials. really enjoyed it.
starters were super delicious, main dishes were kinda disappointing. staff is ok and prices are acceptable.
so good!  great food, great service!  first great meal in gracia in 5 days.
prices are high and food is bad for this money. i felt really sick after i ate beef there...
a pleasant atmosphere with a selection of traditional avid more unique spanish inspired dishes.
awesome atmosphere, wonderful steak. highly recommend it
the ambience, the service, the decor, the food, the wine - everything comes together for a fantastic dining experience
very accommodating. excellent food at a great price.
usually busy but beautiful place, located perfectly in gracia, nice service.

great location in middle of busyness gracia. romantic road.

great foods, friendly staff
fabulous food, amazing value. the specials of the day are really special!
good tapas. average mains. slow service. moderate prices.
fabulous food, amazing value. the specials of the day are really special!
good tapas. average mains. slow service. moderate prices.
good meal, good service, nice location. will visit again
great food. good staff. super mojitos.
thanks to facu for the comida!!!
excellent mojitos and tapas. delicious! and not expensive.
nice and historical place in gracia, friendly baristas.
quality place . awesome food  . perfect service!   vale ;)
some of the best tapas.
very traditional location, very kind staff but unfortunately they don't speak english.
a bit pricey but food is fantastic! 😍
my favourite place for menu del dia in gracia!
in gracia ...very nice tapas place..
thank u facu!!
thank you facu
nice food,  relaxed and proper service

we were three people staying for a few days and it was a great experience. lady at the reception, gabi, was incredible and went out of her way to help us with planning our day trip to montserrat. any complaints were immediately tended to. the location is pretty great, with super accessible public transport. and the place is really beautiful, has an old charm. just one problem. our group had to be split up into two rooms (our own fault, not the hostel's), and one of the rooms was way smaller and

friendly price. very good service and all staffs are super helpful. the room is very clean. good breakfast.
...just one thing that all of us feeling disappointed is the actual room doesn't same as picture and description. we have allocated to the other building and have no views at all.

other than that, we are happy to recommend casa gracia to all of you.

avoid this place if you want to sleep at all. the three stars are because the place is nice, but personally when i go stay down here i want to be able to sleep.

i stayed there 2 nights and it was a nightmare. the place is nice but it’s the noisiest place i’ve ever stayed. the girl at reception when i arrived was really rude. she couldn’t wait to get back to her phone when i was checking in. there is no vibe, no communication about the activities or anything.

it was noisy until 2am. there was a

decent location close to the events i wanted to go to.

one of the best breakfast buffets i've ever had, a large selection of meats, cereals, coffees, fruits, etc (breakfast is between 8am and 11am)

my hostal room was clean, towels were provided and shower gel and shampoo were also provided free of charge.

30 euros per night is reasonable. i would consider staying at casa gracia again if i were in barcelona again.

the location is very nice and within walking distance from a central metro station and key touristic areas of barcelona. the staff are very friendly, and shoutout to diane that gave us the best restaurant recommendation  (la pepita). the only downside is that they have a threshold on ac/heating temperatures, which didn’t allow us to be able to use it; but we opened the window and were just fine with it. their breakfast was amazing, with lots of different options. and if you like luxury brand sho

rooms is old but gold. its some thing between modernity and civilization.  an outstanding location par excellence.  in the bustling city center and close to everything.  the staff is very nice and very helpful.  i think he deserves a higher rating than we do.  i will definitely repeat the experience.
there is something very important: they have an receptionist "alia" who speaks arabic. she is very nice and helpful and provides useful advice for visiting tourist places in barcelona, ​​and this is

don’t get me wrong, the place is nice and absolutely value for money. but it seems like when they were building the space up, they’ve decided to make it as loud as possible: seriously, you can’t use a door without slamming it, and every couple of minutes you can hear some door slams somewhere around, and considering that the walls are made of cardboard — this brings no comfort.
it was like this back in 2018, it’s still like that today, and it doesn’t seem like something is going to change anytim

the gracia neighborhood is a gem, glad we stayed here instead of downtown like in the gothic quarter, the neighborhood was quieter and less touristy, and all of the bars and businesses we went to were extremely genuine.

the rooms were very nice, the beds were comfortable and clean, to be nitpicky the bathroom was a tad small.

the staff was very friendly, there were no unexpected fees, and we even messed up and booked incorrectly, we stayed an extra night that wasn't on our reservation and it c

for a hostel this place isn’t bad. though the price is a bit higher than what you would usually expect but this is bcn. i got a single room and i paid close to $150 for it which is high. the room is outdated and cleanliness is not the greatest. you can also hear others. internet is not great. this hostel is great for socializing and joining events with other travellers. you also can stay alone

the location is amazing with lots of restaurants and tourist spots nearby. my friends and i were able to have 6 beds in one room and stay together. the staff were really nice and the breakfast in the morning was lovely with a lot of options. there were lots of places to hang out in the hotel and it was a very beautiful place.

inspiring hotel located close to the lovely gracia neighborhood. the building is old and has its charm and the staff were friendly. free breakfast if you book through their own website! |we stayed in a standard double room in the 5th floor which was clean and spacious. the only minus was the window facing inner yard, we used ac to cool down our room at night. |hotel has mixed guests from families to couples and groups of friends. the atmosphere was relaxed, at night you could hear some noises ou

had a lovely time at casa gracía. partner and i booked a private room with a balcony which overlooked the main street. the room was cute with high ceilings, loved the french doors. the bed was really comfy as well though there is sometimes a gap between the matresses. the bathroom was really nice, very modern. shower only, very clean, lots of storage area for all your toiletries. only complaint about the bathroom is that sometimes the shower overflows easily due to the shower design. we just put
our stay in this hotel was incredible. we had an issue with noisy neighbors, but alia from reception fixed it in no time. she is exceptional.

do not recommend! do not book.

1. first of all the rooms stink, the bathroom has a horrible smell that fills the room with a disgusting smell and the water also smell so bad you dont even want to wash yourself.

2. second they are full of "kids" that scream the whole day and night, slamming doors smoking in the hallways. its impossible to sleep or even be in the room. i feel like i am in a zoo not a hotel.

even the hotel stuff did not do anything to fix it.

3. the king bed is actually two ver

a lovely stay. we stayed here for 2 nights, it’s in a lovely location. the staff were all so helpful and friendly! the air conditioning in the room is amazing and the balcony in our room was so cute. the toilet and the rooms were all very clean. would highly recommend this place it was very nice visitng here for a few nights.

the staff were very welcoming and understanding! the room was a good size and the bathroom was very clean. the common area was a cool place to sit around and even had a record player :d the breakfast was my favourite part and was very good- thank you for making our trip to barcelona even better!

the rooms are as pictured and in good condition.
the staff can be somewhat slow (long wait at the reception) and at one point our cards (to open the doors) stopped working for no reason.
other than that they were still very kind.
i can also strongly recommend eating breakfast there, since there is a lot to choose from.

booked a room through agoda for 2 nights. arrived at the hotel early, like around 10am. wanted to check if they would allow us to check-in cause we just want to rest from a loooong flight.  also willing to pay any extra charges if ever. the receptionist told us to come back at 3pm and they stored our luggages in a room.

at exactly 3pm, there are already queues at the check-in counter. i just observed that their staff is slow. they told us to get our luggages at 3pm so imagine we had to line up

hey we stayed 5 days in the hostel which is well located, pretty nice and very clean to be honest. and food was very good too.
in the rooms light are too strong so even if every bed have his own light it might need some curtain for every bed if you don't want to disturb others.
the breakfast buffet was allright but nothing like announced on their website "avocado toast, and food from around the world" is very well exagerated..
then concerning the staff, and i really don't want to put everibody i

casa gracia is a fantastic place to stay. it was a pleasant surprise with its lovely atmosphere, beautiful garden, and sitting areas. dani in reception was really helpful, friendly and had great tips for us during our time in barcelona. the breakfast was amazing and make sure to include it in your stay. i highly recommend this place and will be staying here again.
