i’d definitely stay here again and would recommend it even though there were a few minor inconveniences. nice clean rooms with comfy beds, amazing breakfast, lovely outdoor seating for breakfast. they offer a free walking tour and free yoga tuesday and thursday mornings. a little noisy from the busy street but the excellent location is well worth it. i think the cleaning staff took a kit kat bar i had put on the headboard shelf on the first night so i hid my snacks the next day. the fire alarm w

booked a private room while on a week vacation in barcelona. the room was exactly what i needed. felt very safe and comfortable while staying here.

my flight to barcelona was delayed so i checked in much later than expected but the concierge desk is open 24 hours and they accommodated me right away when i arrived. i would stay here again next visit because the value and location is great.

my only complaint would be that because breakfast is served downstairs each morning, you’ll hear a lot of

visited casa cracia october ’23. a few pro’s en con’s.

pro’s:
•	i was able to use the voucher we received in 2020 due to a cancelled booking because of covid-19 which we really appreciated.
•	we really enjoyed breakfast.
•	well situated in barcelona and nearby metro. rooms a properly.

con’s:
•	communication by mail goes very slowly, it sometimes took a week before we get an useable answer, there is little information transfer to colleagues.
•	on our last day we couldn’t enjoy breakfast because

hostel is really good.
beautiful view of the road from the balcony. only suggestion i can give to the visitors willing to stay in sharing is to bring a lock for the wardrobe.

could be the best coliving i’ve ever been. friendly and still professional; beautiful exteriors and even nicer interior, this place will make you feel like you are staying at a palace. the location is simply spot on, gracia is one of the most vibrant area in the city. on the ground floor there is a restaurant open to the public, and very good too. while from the first floor upward is reserved for the guests. on the first floor you will find a spacious studio, living room if you need to work or s

we stayed at casa gracia for a few days to discover barcelona and it was a perfect stay to help discover the city, it’s culture, do some shopping and be only a short commute away from the city’s night life. clean room and bathroom, great staff at the reception and had a good range for vegetarian breakfast. casa garcia had an outdoors area for breakfast and a lovely bar at the entrance which was really nice. a great stay for young people wanting to discover the city :)

so i stayed here 4 nights. my tour agent had booked this place as part of a package deal. at first glance, it's quite charming. it has like a 1920s art deco vibe. its super cute, clean, and comfortable. we stayed in our of their apartments with a fully equipped kitchenette. we actually checked in the first night at 3 am and maca was super helpful. she immediately helped us and understood we were tired from our flight. everything was great, but then it wasn't. our agent had upgraded our room for

i stayed in the hotel 16-17th of november. after check out i left my bag there 17th of november 11am to 5 pm. i got my bag and went to airport. when i checked my bag in the airport, there was no my airpod pro. i checked “find my”. my airpod was in city centre. i had a flight that’s why i couldn’t go back. when i check sometimes, it’s in casa gracia. some staff might take it. i tried to contact with them but they don’t respond back.
better to not leave your baggage or lock your baggage if you hav

lovely stay, very friendly and helpful staff, fabulous facilities and gorgeous rooms. great location in the middle of barcelona with amazing views from the balcony. easy access to public transport, can't wait to return.

i stayed here during a group tour i was on. i stayed in a room for 6, but with only 3 other girls besides myself. the room and the bathroom was very spacious. the bunks were nice because they had their own light and little shelf that i used to hold my glasses at night and to set things there that i was charging. i don't remember any space in the room or bunk to put your stuff where you could lock it up because i was rooming with people i knew and trusted so i wasn't really looking for this. the

good location, and if you have a room on the high floor with balcony, great view. this is a hotel, but also has a hostel side. so the staff treats everyone as if they’re a hostel guest.

if you book a normal hotel room, the rooms are small. good for solo traveler or two people. the room does not have any tv, small refrigerator, etc. in that case, if you are planning to book the hotel side, depending on how often you plan on spending on the inside, i truly think the value doesn’t not meet the sta

one of the biggest scam hotel in barcelona. i never recommend any family to stay here. this is hotel not a hotel. in case you visit this place you meet their receptionist lady with boy hair cut who is super rude. you will spoil you trip by staying here.
great hospitality and location. rooms are clean and spacious. beautiful interior. a good variety of options at breakfast.

a great hostel- they went above and beyond, especially macarena en reservations, and i will definitely stay again in the future.  location is excellent and the vibe fantastic. best hostal in barcelona!

this is a beautiful hostel with great amenities and facilities for guests. it is in a prime location and holds a lot of great history. it is definitely one of the better hostels i’ve stayed in with great rooms and clean spaces however the early closure of all the communal areas including the kitchen and the terrace limit its appeal and vibe, essentially making you feel like the bad kids on a school camp. these spaces should be available later especially for a city like barcelona that comes to li

positive: great location , great room and friendly staff. negative: the â¿check inâ¿ process was confusing. i was sent a half dozen emails from the hotel asking to click a broken link. i was worried that something was wrong with our reservation.  i responded to the emails but got nowhere -it wasnâ¿t resolved until w
the location is perfect, the building and entrance are elegant, breakfast good but triple rooms are very old with bad view

everything is ok, but the breakfast service.

if you leave before the breakfast time but you want something to eat as well, you have to make a reservation before 4pm one day before. no one told me that and there is no information at their website.

when i was there about 30 mins before the breakfast time (sorry early flight), the staff didn't even allow me to take away just two slices of bread. he locked the door, left me alone, no explanation.

fortunately the girl at the reception saved me, sh

highly recommended as soon as i came in i loved the building. it combines the old with the modern, the rooms were very clean. the breakfast was very nicely served and had a nice area to eat. i also want to highlight the kindness of the argentine security guy since he helped us get around the city to where we were going and was on the lookout for whatever we needed

exceptional accommodation... excellent team ... wonderful attitude... loved the food at the restaurant |the rooms were very clean,  great view, great vibes ...|this is a clear winner amongst all ... |excellent value for money||
casa gràcia has a stylish lounge, an outdoor terrace, a well-equipped kitchen, a cozy underground yoga studio, and more... great facilities, i really enjoyed my stay

extremely helpful friendly staff.||fantastic location, beautiful view from the balcony. lovely rooms, very tidy.||the breakfast buffet is delicious, with a lovely outdoor seating area.||can't wait to come again!♥️||such a great way to experience barcelona.
the amenities are okay and so are the staff. great location within barcelona. rooms have a thermostat but only 1 shower & sink.
beautiful building but a bit more of a  corporate/chain hotel style...didn't quite have the laid back hostel vibe that i expected from images. it was a great location though

positive: wonderful views of ocean and town. peaceful location. perfect place for our stay for 3 nights. negative: steep drive to the location. the directions said to go up the road, but there were do not enter signs the whole way up as it seems it was a one way road. we ended up driving down from the top of the road.

i did not stay at the hotel but the economics department seems messy. they charged my credit card 3 days before my stay. i had to cancel my booking due to covid and i had a free cancellation option from booking.com. they returned my money after 1 month only after i contacted them many times, which caused me a lot of money because of the currency changes. this means i had to spend around 600 turkish liras for a hotel that i did not even stay at.

very pleasant stay. the building and furnitures are well-picked and the terrace at the back is good to enjoy a relaxing breakfast. prices are slightly higher but it's worth it if you're looking for a chiller vibe.
perfect location.  very close to the metro station. but the breakfast is not worth the price. elevator is wow!

please change the mattresses!!!!!
the house is very nice, location is great but you cannot have these beds!! stayed in a standard double room, instead of a king size mats there were 2 mats (old and soft) together and of top of those 2 mats a really thin king size mats…. what are you doing????? cheap and weird 👎 ah and they didn’t have shower gel, they said that they just have shampoo😂 i had to buy at the shop which is fine but again weird

our one week stay in barcelona was great. the hotel has an excellent location in the south parts of gracia just above the avenida diagonal, very close to metro and train stations. rooms are very nicely done. the personell were always helpful and present, cleaning was good. the elevator is a bit of an authentic old days barcelona.

beautiful old building and great location. i booked a private room/bathroom (there are dorms and fun common areas, but also private rooms for older people) and it was quite comfortable. special thanks to the friendly staff, particularly alfredo, who made my stay special by upgrading my room to a beautiful suite overlooking paseo de gracia. thanks alfredo :)

this place is just amazing. we had a warm welcome and although our room wasn't quite ready we given some drinks tokens and enjoyed a couple of beers in the bar whilst we waited.
our room was beautiful, with a balcony overlooking the main street. the room was clean, spacious and the decor was tasteful.
the decor in the main communal areas was eclectic and full of charm. something different and made this stand out from other places we have stayed.

we loved the breakfast, lots of choice and great

we stayed here in a hostel-style room and reservation. price was cheap, room looks stunning, only details were off. employees seemed a bit up-tight. they fit the hotel part of their business better than the hostel vibe i am used to.

probably on of the worst big city hotels i've been in, calling it a hotel instead of a hostel is an overstatement. terrible wi-fi, it seems they have 3 different routers, none of which work reliably. the double room was tiny and you could hear it every time someone used the bathroom in an adjacent room. the room was sometimes not cleaned and even when it was it happened at seemingly random times with the cleaning staff forgetting to replace shampoo or towels. would definitely not recommend, you'

intially was super excited to stay here! the common areas are beautiful and it has a great location. we had booked 2 beds in an all female 4 bed dorm on hostelworld and paid together. when myself and friend (2 young females) came to check in we were informed that we wouldn’t be in the same room because there wasn’t a bed available and that it was our fault because we didn’t book a private room and when booking, it’s 2 beds anywhere not 2 beds together (this is not said anywhere and the reception
great ho(s)tel, absolutely stunning interiors, old and cosy. love especially the great-looking elevators. very clean, many places to just sit down with friends and chill out. heartily recommend.

this place is exactly what i innitially hoped it to be. when i was it was very clean and the service was excellent and friendly. the shared kitchen is top notch, the balcony is really nice. this is perfect for tourists who are looking for a more budget stay, a bit communal, yet still very cool, safe and friendly. located in the very heart of barcelona on the famous passeo de gracia.

we stayed in one of the apartments and it was a great experience
also the breakfast area is beautiful

service, chaos and lack of information.

we were guests of the hostel, unfortunately, when registering at the hostel, it turned out that a system error canceled the reservation and we can't stay in the hostel for the 12 nights we booked. we were allowed to stay for one night at twice the amount. the next day the manager was supposed to take care of us and explain the matter. as it turned out, the manager was on vacation at the time and the next day we had to explain the matter from the beginning

i was on vacation for a few day with my daughter and was a fantastic experience. nice and clean room, wonderful decorated and spacious place. very good location near the metro and the neighborhood of gracia. we loved the breakfast on the terrace. and share a wine with a good conversation in the living room. we would love to come back.

really nice staff,
really nice location,
breakfast was delicious,
and the food in the restaurant was great too!!
they also had yoga

if hostel, go there

stayed for 5 nights. really liked the balcony, it was bigger than i though it would be. they staffs are very nice. great location, only 7 minutes walk to casa mila. they provided shampoo, body wash, soup, hair dryer, towels, hangers in the room, but do not have kettle. there is only one bedside table for 2 beds, i think it would be better if they included a small table in the room.

very good location and decent prices! breakfast is a must try for me and very vfm! our room wasn't the best one i guess but i saw there were some better ones. it's just like at hostels some times i guess!

communal areas (bar, chill out zone, breakfast floor) were all great, staff were welcoming and very accomodating. rooms were clean, beds were comfy, and showers were good - even though not a super high standard they were good value for money. hotel location was great too.

nice place and good location. but due to construction work we had no access to the balcony for which we payed a surcharge. we couldn’t even open the window te let in some fresh air. i totally understand that the balcony has to be closed during construction work. however, we did not get any discount or restitution for the unfair charging. hope you manage that better next time. saludos m

prime location, able to walk everywhere.

room was clean and compact.

service was not over or under standard.
honestly worst bed i have ever slept one. and receptionist are not customer centeric at all! very difficult to communicate with them and had a very frustrating time. not worth the high price…….

the location is really good. some little things might be negative but it depends on the type of traveler you are. the rooms are small, if you are the type of person that takes out everything out of your bag when traveling there is no space for placing them. also, if you like reading a book before sleeping the light is not good. aside from that, the rooms are good enough for a good night sleep. we didn't have any kind of inconvenience.

we were surprised when receptionist didn’t tell us we can’t arrive at midnight even after i had asked before if it’s problem… organised very badly. so we spent night outside and came next morning which was booked correctly. casa gràcia did apologise in the end. due to organisational issues i have to put down one star.
place was wonderful, breakfasts nicely done and our room was oasis of sleep❤️
thank you for experience,
aneta a.

nice rooms for a fair price. but absolutely horrible and disorganized reception. the person who assisted us was incompetent and rude (an argentinian girl) and they messed up the bookings for the 4 reservations we did. the management should consider better training of the reception employees.

i had a terrible experience staying with this hotel. first we booked a double room. pictures were very deceiving cause the room was extremely small. after we laid our 2 luggages there were no more space left to walk. i tripped on my luggage twice. we went for an upgrade immediately the next day, and paid 50 euro extra for each night.

with the price we were paying (150euro per night) there was literally no drinking water. we were asked to refill our bottles with the staffs at the counter which w

amazing experience. the hotel's beautifully designed was a highlight of my stay, but what really stood out to me was the exceptional customer service i received from yeila and cristina.

during check-in, there was a misunderstanding, and we were given a small room that was not suitable for our stroller and crib. however, yeila and cristina went above and beyond to help us find a more suitable room, despite the hotel being fully booked at the time. they were incredibly helpful and patient, and i'

i'm not sure why people are rating this as a good hotel, it is not.

i booked a room that has an air conditioner, upon arrival, the ac was not working at all, in any room, complained a lot, and hotel workers play dumb and pretend they don't speak english, the temperature in barcelona was 35c for the whole week, the room felt like an oven, not having an running ac is not ok at all. especially when the price we paid was for a 5-star hotel, and in return we got 1-star hotel room.
the lobby ac was w
great bar great service and accommodation.  great location.  close to metro and airport

there was no lock in the toilet.
i asked the receptionists and one of them said due to security reason there won't be any lock in all rooms. ridiculous.
i asked another receptionist the other day and he said never heard of it. i got to change to a new room because the room door was damaged too lol
room was nice and comfy. facility seems a bit old and some of the receptionist was not doing her job. i hope it is just a special case.

scammers.  usually they try to charge twice for the same service.  they scammed me  700eur.   i had to call the police.
still waiting for the money  back.  also complaint to omic - city hall consumers service.  roger manager agresive and useless.
excellent location for a comfortable and clean hostel. aside from spotty wi-fi it was an ideal location for a work from vacation

the most awful experience i have ever had. we spend the weekend in the hotel with a big group of friends. we have been victim of robbery in the hotel. external people have been to enter in the hotel, access to the rooms, break down the door of one of our room and steal money, phone, bags…
the hotel initially started to help us and finally let us without any compensation or explanation whereas it was on their responsibility.
i do not recommend this hotel! no security!
excellent location for a comfortable and clean hostel. aside from spotty wi-fi it was an ideal location for a work from vacation

the most awful experience i have ever had. we spend the weekend in the hotel with a big group of friends. we have been victim of robbery in the hotel. external people have been to enter in the hotel, access to the rooms, break down the door of one of our room and steal money, phone, bags…
the hotel initially started to help us and finally let us without any compensation or explanation whereas it was on their responsibility.
i do not recommend this hotel! no security!

- our first room smelt like a sewer which is sub ideal
- in our second room, the lockers were broken which is not great when staying in a hostel
- overall the place is in a great location, clean, with friendly staff who are more than willing to help you out if you need anything.

we stayed in a 3-bed apartment
pros:
-location was amazing. it is on the main shopping area and close to a lot of public transit and restaurants.
-terrace was beautiful and gave a nice view of the area
-friendly staff
-affordable and good space for 3 people

cons:
-this place was not cleaned well. there were ants in the bathroom, stains and hairs in the bed, and marks/cobwebs up the walls. they definitely need to clean better
-the room is separate from the actual hotel; you have to enter another
this is probably the best place i have stayed in barcelona! it is worth way more stars - excellent service, pristine clean, super interesting decor, great breakfast and the list goes on..

i booked this hostel due to everywhere affordable were booked up in the week of formula one. the best thing about this place is the location. it is so central to everything. the worst thing is the breakfast. it is not worth it! one of the 3 days booked was without internet the entire day and night but the receptionists were really helpful. there was no peace and quiet during my stay, next door was undergoing a massive renovation during the day drilling and hammering noise. one of the nights ther

lovedddd my stay! i stayed in the female four bed dorm and i gotta say it's one of the nicer hostels i have stayed in. the staff is super friendly and helpful. they even arranged an alternative room for the night when the ac in our room broke down. and the problem was solved in the morning when maintenance staff came in. the neighborhood of gracia is lovely and away from the hustle and bustle of more touristy part of barcelona. the hostel is right near the diagonal metro line which gets you pret

wi- fi  was weak, sometimes didn't work  ,  for 4 days twice lift was out of order. it was hot and stuffy in the room and we couldn't open the window,the  door to the balkony was locked, so we could't breath.  there was not even a glass to drink water , the only thing i liked was lication and breakfast .

great location, room, bed and balcony, we upgraded to supreme room for around €10 more which was totally worth it, might even sound exaggerating to say i’ve had the best sleep for a long time. it was quiet, the only downside was the shower that leaks water from the side but nothing a towel couldn’t solve. we reported some minor issues to the friendly hotel staff and they were swiftly solved. we stayed during the week so there was no noise issues from the street and i literally didn’t hear anyone

after reading some of the recent reviews i was a bit skeptical but we had an excellent stay. the check in - check out was super easy, the room was spotless with ac. there is barely any natural light but that didnt bother us since we didnt spend much time in the room. the location is unbeatable, in the middle of gracia. would stay here again :-)
the hostel is very nice and cozy, the staff is super friendly and kind. well located. variety of free coffees. would recommend to others and would come back.

(may 2022, female solo traveler) looks amazing, but a hostel has never disappointed more before. the website says that the people staying there are young, when they were actually families or 35+, it says that they organize activities when they actually don't, the staff were impatient and unfriendly, no one in my room talked to me (hotel vibe, not hostel vibe), i paid for a locker and they told me there were none available for me... when the wifi crashed for 24h, i decided to leave the hostel for

pros: the location of this hotel cannot be beat. it is just a couple minutes walk from a metro stop and is in the heart of barcelona. the balcony is nice and the view is beautiful.
cons: the apartment was not as described at all. it was much smaller than the pictures, with two twin-size cots pushed together in one room and a broken sofa bed in the living room. the beds are very uncomfortable. the kitchen is un-usably small. the shower does not have a door so water splashed all over the bathroom

room 208 extremely small (as for four people). neglected. worst of all, however, is the fact that no cleaning lady has visited this room for probably decades! disgusting shower curtain. dirty bed linen and blanket. trash in the dumpster from previous customers. window covered with frosted wallpaper - no access to any sunlight. strange bubbling sounds from behind the walls all night long. not even the smallest table or chair. thank god it was only one night. never again!

advantages
nice staff at

took my employees to have lunch and the sever was so disrespectful and rude she didn't want us to change table  to have a good view of the work trucks we call the maneger to let him know what was going on and he act like he didn't care we never come back and don’t recommended casa garcía  need to make some changes

perfect location. cheapest in town. they have alao 2 peraon rooms with private bedroom as well as hostel beds. ambaince is great. old building with good decor. it was a little bit loudy in the morning as my room facing the middle part of the building.

some public areas are made very nice and inviting in the building, but we had several bad experiences.  firstly,  very uncooperative handling during corona canceling (they gave us the impression that if we had booked direct with hotel they could help us easily to adjust the date, but hmmm via third party... they made it absolute miserable and also lowest responsiveless possible, at the end costong us super expensive. second, we ask 2times if they could move us to dbl room or cover-connect our be
nice tapas and quick lunch service for great price as for barcelona.

we were looking for an inexpensive local place with daily menu. we decided to go here even though relatively low rating (3.9). frankly speaking we had higher expectations. the place has a nice local vibe, responsive staff, they have our favourite moritz beer on tap.

where we were partly disappointed was the level of cooking. we ordered cold starters caprese (ok) and chickpea salad with tuna (canned chickpea, canned tuna +lettuce & tomato).
on the other hand what was great was main dish tuna, ve
great local tapas food and drinks!

already visited twice.
had salads, tapas, casseroles. still to find a food i don't like.
meats have that home cooked taste i love so much.
thank you, oscar, for the "regular" service 😉

false advertising at the entrance, prices don't match what you see from the outside. bad service overall and the owner was really rude.

edit: answering to the owner that is really showing their colours with their answers :d you cannot advertise something at the door of your local and then once people is inside and already asked for drinks tell that the offer is no longer valid. you are being the dishonest one.

do you consider a menace me telling you i won't come back? thanks for answering, you
oscar was a wonderful host - best gin and tonic i've ever had! enjoyed some small bits between lunch and dinner, too! ¡salud!
we had delicious snacks and drinks at casa pages! oscar was a wonderful and friendly waiter. would recommend for food and service!

depends what you are looking for.
typical local gracia vibe, easy going place. perfect for tapas or dinner.

i tried their angus burger it was super good, the meat was well cooked and the vegetables were al dente, perfect for burgers.
friendly stuff, good prices, delicious and simple tapas (also burgers, bocadillos and salads). highly recommended!

very honest lunch for a decent price of 10.50€ with fixed menu; choice of 4 starters and 4 mains + drink and dessert/coffee all incl. nice atmosphere and a lot of locals having lunch here on a midweek day.
great place with nice prices and delicious sangria! phenomenal vibe
great local place in the heart of gracia. more than friendly staff with a diverse menu appealing to all tastes. reasonable prices, good food. what more to ask for?
classical tapas place in gracia. they serve you small tapas with your drink. good choice!

amazing homemade food 🥘
i felt like home and is such a cozy place for local people ! please try their food !
provolone al forno, mushrooms, hummus ,patatas and more .....
gracias !!!!!
amazing food and super great atmosphere. def a local hangout. staff was great. easily 5 stars.
good and cheap tapa place in gracia. they have a large variety of tapas and the quality is good for what they give
good place to have a drink, only eaten there once, not great! soggy fries and overcooked tuna.
home made food, good taste, fair prices, friendly service
went here a few times when living in the area, always nice to pop in for a beer or wine on the way home :)
not a place where a local would go, food is tasteless but salty at the same time. spend your money elsewhere.
excellent service, good prices, great ambience. food delicious.
2 stars for the friendly service but food had no flavour
i was yelled at by the manager for asking for a table, whilst the restaurant was empty. racism? think so. avoid
very good service, food was delicious. nice restaurant.
the best local atmosphere & ratafia 🙏
nice tapas, great environment, fair price. i will come back.
all traditional and tasty food.  great deserts too.
fantastic place for catalan dishes and tapas.
i waited until i had been here 3 times before posting a review. come here!
good bar, the staff is nice and welcoming
its so great they attend you great 😀😁
nice atmosphere, the salad is delicious.
good place for dinar with family
great tapas
nothing fancy
daily menu at €12.50, homemade food with quality products, i like that the bread is baked, not frozen! neighborhood atmosphere, very pleasant in the heart of gràcia.

to repeat. very very very tasty homemade food. croquettes that really have flavor (very delicious), mushroom casseroles, original sandwiches, eggs with accompaniment, bombs of pagés (delicious potato with sausage meat and brava sauce... that will make your taste buds explode). there were 3 of us, with 4 glasses of wine between everything (with provolone) it came out to about €21 per head. super well invested. the atmosphere is very good, typical of gràcia's traditional food bar, with waiters wh

every time i go i am satisfied. they have a homemade, “spoon” menu, very complete. i have never eaten from the menu because they basically offer burgers and tapas. the staff is very friendly and the place is authentic. it's true that i think they could fix the sink a little, change the mirror, put in a more adequate soap dispenser, but it's utilitarian. the price is the most reasonable that can be found in the area.

the food is good and homemade. the salad is particularly tasty, highly recommended. there were some mistakes and some dishes that didn't come out, but it's quite good and another option in gràcia, with many points to repeat there.

place with a very good vibe in gràcia and with the flavor of the old places that remain. we ordered omelette, hummus, bravas and cubes of brie cheese with tomato jam. everything was very good, we would have asked for more but we couldn't do more. with 6 beers we also play at 12 euros per person (€36 in total). the boy was very attentive and nice. we will return for sure 👏🏻.

bar with an extensive menu with many dishes. we have ordered salad, patatas bravas, peppers and octopus. the salad didn't taste like anything, the mayonnaise was bland and without tuna, mostly potato. the patatas bravas were not fried well, as were the peppers, which were burnt on one side. the octopus costs 11 euros and the quantity is very small, it was sour and covered in oil. the staff is very friendly but a shame we made a mistake with the food.

i live in the neighborhood and for me this is my trusted tapas bar / restaurant. the food is very good and the service is very friendly. every time we've been there they've treated us very well. it is a restaurant with a lot of atmosphere, where there is a lot of noise and the service is at its best, but for me this is the charm of the place.

the best tapas bar i've tried so far. it's all good and authentic. the tortilla is delicious, as are the cassola moruna, huevos con chorizo, anxoves and patatas brava. we are in the gracia area, a stone's throw from pedrera.

i can't say anything about the food because we didn't get to taste it. they brought us the drink quite quickly but then we have already become invisible. we waited quite a while and when we asked if they would take a note of us, the person who was supposed to attend to us kicked us in annoyance and gave us bad manners. even so, we waited thinking that he would have a lot of work, and that everyone has a bad day, but our patience ran out when he went to ask two tables that had entered later... 🤷

a group of friends went to eat and we left quite happy, great variety of portions and adequate quality-price. the treatment was very close, they even invited us to a few shots. to add a drawback, the padrón peppers disappointed us a little.

cozy place with a great atmosphere, the waiter who served us was 10. homemade food and pure catalan products. you can tell that it is an old house with that vintage essence. the brava sauce is the best i have ever tried.
the calamari sandwich was good. the loin sandwich was very soggy and very dry. and the six croquettes were also poorly defrosted and were cold inside. the waiter very friendly.

they served me a menu for 90 people and i have to say that the salad was vinegary and did not have a pleasant smell. the baked chicken was worthless, undercooked and with raw skin, and the potatoes were hard as rocks. fact of the day i highly doubt it. it can be served more or less well, but if you are not able to offer a closed menu with a minimum of quality and food safety, don't do it.
the dishes and tapas are good, without being anything out of the world. the dessert, the sacher was not very good. a very thick but loose cut.

a place with a very good atmosphere. the treatment of the staff very pleasant, close and friendly, and the food quite good with a varied menu. it's one of those neighborhood bars where you can go without rushing to enjoy yourself. an ideal place to go with friends and be at ease.

old place but it does its job. very well located in grace. local without air conditioning and open through two doors..good attention and fast service.food... the sandwiches and hamburger of 8 las bravas and 2 frozen and badly fried... that's why it's difficult to rate it.i would not return except on grace parties.

the food in terms of flavor very fair. eggs with potatoes and cheese, dried beans, croquettes, escalivada with cheese, i did not find the taste of the product. the vermouth was the typical commercial one. the very good red velvet dessert

the menu of the day (or “set lunch”, menu del dia) is a great thing for a weary tourist. you don’t need to rack your brains for a long time choosing from all the available dishes - the choice is limited, but it will be prepared quickly and will be economical 😏 (€12.50).a very popular place with locals.don't forget aperol and vermouth.
homemade food and family treatmenta little gem of grace, where time has stopped, classic menu with good price and perfect quality
a gràcia classic that never fails! it's a pleasure to have tapas at casa pagès. homemade food, good product, good treatment and good atmosphere... what more could you ask for?
bravo. the food is very delicious. and the waiters are very genius despite the commotion they have.

daily menu at 12.50 much more than correct, simple and well-prepared dishes. traditional place, ideal for eating a menu without pretensions or nonsense. they also have very delicious burgers and tapas.
highly recommended, a site that i have repeated several times and many more that i will. suggestion: brie cubes and tuna tataki. until 3pm, €2,50 drink+tapa promo

obvious that i am a vegetarian and celiac and i have only been able to eat a salad, (half a menu €9 with a drink and dessert, but the gluten-free beer is a positive point, which is the gràcia festivals, and they only have that option due to the large quantity work, the place is good, the service is good, the only thing missing is that instead of two dishes of pasta, you put a first dish with vegetables or rice, something is meat, not fish, you will be great.i will surely return because they hav
one of my trusted sites. excellent service and great tapas

the food is very good, the attention of the waiters is also up to the mark and the atmosphere of the place is very pleasant and welcoming, the only thing i would change for my taste is the noise that makes it a little difficult to have a conversation with the group. however, we will repeat for sure since the meatball cover was a 10!
very good catalan cuisine place in the heart of gràcia. great value for money
it's not bad for tapas, some dishes are a bit scarce and a bit expensive for the price. the burgers are very good and big. the service is sometimes a little lost but it's all very familiar.
the best thing about the place is the waiter oscar!! the food is good although it lacks a little flavor
very pleasant atmosphere, waiter oscar is very friendly and attentive, he prepares spectacular cocktails.

they say that in the everyday restaurant, close to the office, the food and the premises add up but the service multiplies. these five (or better ten) stars are undoubtedly for a place in keeping with the gracia neighborhood, an unbeatable half-day menu with the quality/price ratio but with a service far above the restaurants in the area that go to the hunting and capture of tourists. congratulations!! don't change!
the usual tapas, the usual sandwiches, no frills. good quality, good taste, good quantity.good price everything except beer. €2.30 to open a bottle of estrella damm is disappointing.
excellent service and quality of food. like at home! we will be back
real home cooking.perfect for tapas or a midweek meal with the super menu of the day.attentive staff and very neighborhood atmosphere.we love.
great discovery, we've been frequenting it for months now, good service, quality food and quiet atmosphere.
stop looking for tapas bars in gracià. excellent food, fast service, unbeatable attention!
good service, good food and good atmosphere. super recommended. a1 and fast attention.

i liked the coffee, the sandwich, and reading a little. quick and courteous service, everything at its perfect point, in the middle of a beautiful atmosphere frozen in time. i loved it. i live nearby and had never entered. i'll be back soon.
excellent atmosphere, fun people, very good tapas and portions. the truth is that it is a pleasure to enter such an authentic bar, of which there are few left.

very expensive i ordered a sausage sandwich that came out of my face, €7!!! it was good, but not as good as what i paid for..the service... they are very busy, they have a large volume of work and the few workers there are suffering. the atmosphere is good, it has a real farmhouse feel
it has good prices. tapas promotions with beer, martini or wine.
very delicious food and fast service. the sandwiches are special

they have a sign with an offer of beer and tapas for €2.5. the trick is that you ask them for a beer and they bring you the big one, and then you confidently ask them for a tapa. when you pay you are surprised that they give you the large beer that is not included in the offer and they charge you for the tapa. it doesn't say it anywhere and they don't inform you when you ask for it.very sad dirty play.also, the place is not very clean either, the tables are very sticky.i will not come back
typical place frequented by regulars, friendly servers, warm decoration! the tapas are ok

we used to go frequently to eat the menu of the day and we really liked it for the good value for money and the atmosphere. we returned yesterday after some time and honestly the quality has gone down a lot. i agree with the recent comments i see about the lack of care and zero affection in the dishes... the salmorejo and the paella that have given us a very low level. and if memory serves, the price of the menu has increased. for 14.90 there are much better options. the staff is very good, but
traditional catalan food, simple, very cheap, everyone is very kind. the perfect place to cheat your hunger at any time of the day. if you pass by, stop by and you won't regret it
despite being full for the holidays, the staff was great with everyone
the burger with the cous-cous patty was a total failure. baguette would have been better. a giabatta roll and no sauce… not again!
typical tapas bar. relaxed and unpretentious. there is tv with soccer games.without a doubt, brie cheese and jam data are the best. epic. ask yes or yes!

unforgettable experience, highly recommended. from the second salad everything changes. it is mandatory to order a minimum of two salads, the dinner evolves throughout the night.crazy.ps: there has been difficulty in differentiating the waiters from the customers.
ultra small underground venue!  thanx for all ✊🏻🤘🏻
brutal..

the best place to hang around in barcelone...until bóveda come back...
meeeeeeetaaaaaallll
very clean bar with good bands and good atmosphere
very dirty and in order not to exceed the permitted decibels they close the doors turning it into a rat's den as soon as a spark jumps...

truly a shame, the female toilet was broken and closed, and the male toilet, which in principle worked, the toilet button was not operational, imagine the level of disgust when we were all using the service, it was vomiting, please take care of your customers , that we are people, not just animals for consumption... a little respect pleasethank you
i went yesterday, i had a great time with the performance. the place is very small and even though there was an air conditioning unit, we were very hot. i liked the decoration
small bar with live performances
an ideal place to have a drink on the terrace and listen to rock music, very comfortable
very good old-fashioned rock bar

music bar where there are accusations of groups on the weekends. rock 100%. as you can expect from a bar of this type, cleanliness is not their forte. it's small, the toilets are ok, better than expected. you can't see it from the street, you have to enter as if you were going to rooms 2 or 3 of the razzmatazz, but go to the bottom on the right.
10 for a joint 10 for music 10 for a waiter if you don't like punk, refrain from going

pros: a bcn venue that plays underground rock/metal. that alone is worth itcons: it's quite small with everything it entails: a lot of people inside, impossible to go to the bathroom in the middle of a gig, if someone gets involved, you're indirectly part of it... come on, the nightmare of any claustrophobic. furthermore, the little space causes the sound to be coupled...
a small but perfect place to listen to good music 🤘 and have a good time...oh the drinks at a good price. i recommend it 100%

it's a small place but it has all the vibes, very well decorated. bands play, the sound and lights are very good.it is half hidden, you have to want to get there.....you have to enter an alley and at the back is the place. i loved it...

mythical bar in the poblenou concert hall area. it's perfect if you like national rock. there are concerts but at too early an hour. i would gain a lot if the concerts were a little later.they have a terrace, table football and although the bar is quite small, it has something that makes it special.
the best of spanish rock by marina
good place to spend a pleasant night with live music

small no, the following. but as soon as you enter you perceive the soul of the place. witness to so many amateur concerts, but also birthplace of great ones. local with tradition like few others. the only downside is that if you are going to play here, be very careful with the sound since whoever is watching it is also putting out drinks. if what you are looking for is where to make your debut without further ado, to break the ice and with 4 friends, maybe it will be worth it for you. however,
as for many, many, many years, it continues just as well.
pure essence of marina. it is an 'old school' that, even though the place is small, its alley with its tables maintains the marina experience in all its splendor.

it's a "rock" bar where they play a lot of national music, if you like this heavy stuff and such, you'll like it. what can we say about the place itself? it's quite small compared to others in the area, but they make up for it with a terrace and the option of cheaper drinks. i hope i have helped.

place where time stopped. it looks like pre-olympic barcelona and the subsequent 90s. the biggest difference is that smoking is not allowed now and you don't see the circulation of as many substances as in those years.
one of the best pubs to listen to national rock. mythical place for rock lovers. very good atmosphere, with an outdoor area, perfect for summer nights
small place in the neighborhood of poblenou. concert hall with low acoustic quality for concerts. iconic place and correct staff

it is a pub entering an inner street in the area known by young people (and not so young) as marina. it is the only known place that has a terrace and outdoor tables, which is infinitely appreciated in hot weather. the music is of the rock genre, and the atmosphere and the people are incredible, especially if you go in groups.good value for money and good variety of drinks.

i only go to specific events because it's national rock and i don't like it, but what seems terrible to me is that they don't even put toilet paper in the bathroom. it is not a luxury, it is a necessity

in ceferino i have already performed twice with my band. it is a mythical, underground place and perfect to hang out and enjoy some drinks. if you have a band you can organize a small gig without spending so much. that does take your backline.

disco bar inside the razzmataz venue specialized in spanish rock. always crowded and with a great atmosphere if it is the type of music you are looking for, although as happens in these places it is totally impossible to order even a drink.correct place if you are in the mood to party and lively, although it would not be the most recommended nightclub. being the only place with its musical proposal, it can be a good alternative to end the night if you are having drinks at l'ovella negra or pepe
it's funny because it's very underground hidden behind the razz and they schedule amateur concerts there. they have a varied offer of beers and are friendly. but it's shabby and dirty.

pub only suitable for fans and nostalgic rock fans in the spanish language of the 80s and 90s. little variety in drinks, although i suppose that the majority of people who go simply want to enjoy a beer or "cubata". it's fine if this "thing" suits you, i certainly doubt i'll repeat it.
the typical rock bar, small, with loud music.ideal if you like to push dance.this comment is not ironic. or at least, that's what i've tried.
very neglected and dirty place, i went to see a friend who was playing with his music group, and you couldn't even hear the singer, the bathrooms were pitiful. i will not come back.
badly organised, scammers both for the prices and for the local and/or national bands that have played. 0 recommended. marina is very big and any place is better than this one.

for me, its main charms are that it looks like a club and that they play somewhat old-fashioned spanish rock. it has a terrace and table football. it's right next to the razz, so it's a good place to grab a drink before you go.

very good.place to have a few drinks or canes before going to the party. there is good music.a legendary place in barcelona, ​​you can appreciate the good music, that they play rock, that you can have a good beer, have a good dinner, be able to dance, be able to watch football.it's not a restaurant or a cocktail bar per se, it's truly an institution in barcelona, ​​with more than 25 years behind it, which has influenced many generations, it's a place where the waiters and the people make you fe

a traditional joint, one of the classics of poble nou, with the essence of the 70s and 80s, far from the hipster modernities of today's barcelona. its charm lies in the rock atmosphere, live music and 'shabby' in the good sense of the word. although it would be nice if it didn't go that far, because the sink was crying out for a good cleaning. the old style is not at odds with hygiene.
very good rock performances, like the raiders, etc.
one of the best rock bars/associations in barcelona. furthermore, the industrial environment is very cool.
nice place, well-kept, with good prices and, above all, a fantastic atmosphere and the best national music. i plan to go back, and more than once.
very well located and magnificent treatment of the bands and the crew. it's a shame that the music drops so much in level when the group ends
very good bar, i love the concerts 👍👍🍻🍻 i hope to return
national rock venue. very good music and the best attention from edu.

that they don't let you in sometimes depending on how you are dressed seems terrible to me knowing that it is a bar for alternative people and not a posh nightclubthe cubatas and shots are a little more expensive than in other bars but the waiters are good.

a lot of people, and at the bar they take time to serve, it takes 15 minutes to order, the price of the cubatas is very cheap, if you leave even if you have a stamp you have to wait in line, it takes 35 minutes to get back in.

very good bar, nice, great atmosphere. average priced drinks, you pay what it's worth.the only “but” is the fact that you go out to smoke, and that to enter you have to wait in line again, even if you have a drink already ordered at your table. that diminishes the experience quite a bit, even so, we had a great time. ideal for going in large groups and having a drink.let's hope the organization works to solve that specific problem.

a spectacular atmosphere, they should consider putting the bar closer to the bathroom so they can get there sooner and not drink on top of people. i give it five stars because the tables stick together so much that it is impossible for them to steal your cubata. i will definitely return.

the bar i go to every weekend for its good atmosphere and good prices. the music they play is good, rock classics, pop, and the last few weeks that i've been there they've been trying out other genres that also go well with the atmosphere and you can have a great time. the only drawback i have is the bathrooms, which don't have paper, but that can be fixed by going to the bar and asking for it, they will give it to you without a problem 🤙🏼

bar in poblenou, bigger than average and with reasonable prices. it is good to start night there and then, go to one of clubs nearby. they sell tap beer 1 litre size for €6,00.

dixi never disappoints. it's a punk-rock music bar near the marina stop of the metro, and it's honestly so cool. the only downside is that it closes at 3-4 in the morning... wish they'd open until later, but oh well!
it's a great place to stop by for a few beers with friends if you enjoy the music, but don't expect good licor. the random strong smell of popcorn is not very pleasant.

nice place to go and share moments with your friends.
i love karaoke sundays!
good athmosphere,  decent prices. nothing that makes it really stand out from other marina / west poblenou bars, but still worth it.
thank you i just spent one of the best night of my life !!!
the best place to attend the language exchange in barcelona. it is located in the middle of the musical district.

honestly, it reminds me of some places i used to go back home.
also all in all it was a good experience, nothing to complain
burger bread came out burnt, i would not recommend choosing this place to eat. ok for a couple beers with friends but nothing special.
great little place, friendly bar staff and a fantastic atmosphere. good music too.
one of the best rock bars in barcelona, must stop for everyone in the rock escene!
fun bar, great music and cheap drinks
good music. was better with the indoor terrace next to razzmatazz.
great experience during the brazil match 👌
awesome alternative club in barcelona, a must visit for anyone looking for reasonably priced beer and awesome tunes!
great place to hang out with friends and good music
great place to hang w friends.
cool place to hang out with new people from all over the world.
homophobic and transphobic place, keep out of this place... cheap drinks but ill treatment to gay and trans community...
great rock vibe and the diablo potatoes are the best potatoes in barcelona
watch there river plate, i like it, fernet is sooo goood ;)
great beer great team amazing music
drinks tasted watered down
cocktails to improve. atmosphere is fine.
amazing place, cool people!

very nice place
great doorman
nice club to go to dance and drink
fun place, cheap drinks
best place in barcelona so far
the prices are reasonable.
the best bar !
can't remember
favourite place
last night i was having a few drinks with co-workers and i want to highlight the service at the place, especially the waitress and the smile of the security doorman.thanks guys, a pleasure!
it is a place with large wooden tables and spacious to dance and be with friends, the beers are huge, and they are cold, the music is pop or rock,

it's a shame that it has changed so much, yesterday they played very little rock music, and even one guy started playing other types of music. the truth is i haven't been going in a while because the "metal bar" lost everything 😔

if what you want is punk and rock, this is your place, there is nothing else. only!edit: covid19 time. perfect place to come and have tapas and, if you want, talk to strangers to exchange languages. the scandalous food. all the dishes are delicious. special mention nachos, patatas bravas and bombs.

this musical bar is the perfect place to start the night on the right note. the waiters are very friendly and serve you the best drinks. the atmosphere is luxurious, with music that makes you dance from minute one. it's the perfect plan to have a drink and have a great time before going to the club. ¡

nothing more than 5 for judith's attention... and the service is very friendly. they serve you with a love that will make you come back... the staff is also very friendly. and i advise stopping by for a drink no matter what.
now it is smaller and more cramped, nothing happens, good music, but we ordered 2 mojitos and they were water.

kitchen open until 12 pm, which we loved, just after a concert and all the bars are kitchen at 11 p.m. a 10 for that, great food, very fast service and a fair price, and of course 10 music. i already have a permanent place after bowling at razzmatazz!!
this is motherfucking!! an aperol €4.5. in barcelona!! rock music. the friendly staff all very well!!

they are aggressors. they began to grab a woman by the neck and threw her to the ground when it was not necessary to use this type of force when people were already leaving the premises. they have some psychopaths as security.

i fondly remembered the old dixi from my first visits to barcelona and we were delighted to know that it existed in this new location.we drank, had dinner and everything was great. special mention to the vegan burger, even if you are not vegan/vegetarian as was the case for some of us, and to the tequeños, especially the accompanying sauce.incredible how the waitress knows how to handle the typical undesirables while providing good service to the rest. we will most likely stop by on future visi
we go on sundays with friends and it's good. it's great to go have a drink and sing for a while.
the best place in marina to have a drink or eat the best tapas in barcelona. with a small terrace in the sun that is luxurious and music in a large and spacious interior
good music! super friendly waiters and waitresses!!! ideal for spending the night until 3 am.
noemí, excellent waitress and her partner, we will also return for sure.
one of the best places to have a good time with friends and meet good people, we hope this place never dies, too many have already fallen in recent years

great place for its atmosphere. river games are not experienced anywhere better than in dixi. when it fills up it becomes a little uncomfortable, but bearable. the last game they made choripanes on the grill in the back and they always have raffles every game.

i went last saturday. good music, good atmosphere and good prices. the problem is that there is a “dance” area set up (where the dj is) with some tables and the volume was too loud, to speak you had to shout.
very cool atmosphere, reasonable prices for the area, although it's not too expensive either. acceptable music and atmosphere.
noemi and ross are the best you can find in barcelona!
a place where one of the workers is cool in the way he talks and they respect the schedule, they close early and on top of that they talk badly to you
very little music on rock thursday, very disappointing.

i love this site! it is the best place to do karaoke with friends, in my opinion. they are super friendly, both the dj and the baristas, and the place gives a very nice super festive atmosphere! i recommend it 100%!
a very nice place, it is never usually very crowded, good rock music, good drinks, table football, a place that is generally 25 years old or older.
good atmosphere, good music and people enjoying themselves.100% recommended.very friendly staff.

a place to escape from the week, and of course, in a friday and saturday atmosphere accompanied by youth and good music with spectacular customer service, and the best thing, on sundays from 9 p.m. they do karaoke, where it predominates rock, rumba, soul and even some jazz songs!!

what a disappointment... recently my partner and i went for a drink, they treated us correctly, the night started very well, good music from the 80's - 90's, quiet atmosphere (we could talk without having to raise our voice) and suddenly, in the blink of an eye, that changed completely. reggaeton began to sound like there was no tomorrow, it was filled with kids screaming and shouting like calves and on top of that, zero patatero covid-19 measures.

frankly the most rotten mojito in the world, rum and mint i'm still looking for them 🤣🤬, maybe not the right weekend 🤣the potato croquettes finally it was something not edible thank you for this moment at least i will have laughed
ideal to go chat with friends and listen to good music, to start or end a good night. good treatment, good prices, clean 👌
the food is delicious, everyone is super nice, the place is very large.

you write down a song on the list to sing at karaoke and they never played it, i go to ask and see that they have skipped it, which i mention and they answer me with an arrogant "i don't care." it's a shame because the place is good for the price and atmosphere but my friends and i will never go back to where they treat us that way.
brilliant. great music and cubalitres that are well worth it (they don't fill your glass with ice, like in most places).

we went with friends looking for a place with good music and a good atmosphere, they recommended dixie to us and we approached it, it was impossible to choose better, good music, everyone enjoying the night to the fullest, but what i have to highlight the most was the attention of the waitress, a 10, (i think her name was nohemi) many times when a waiter is very busy they seem distant and in a bad mood, and she served us very well, with a smile all the time and very attentive every time we want
for every rocker and metalhead this is your place

the legendary dixie, good music, free entry and drinks at a good price, the ideal option to go out at a good price and have a good time with friends. there is usually a good atmosphere from 1 in the morning, but if you go earlier you can find a table very easily

everything was fine, except that the doorman, i don't know if he was funny or what, he told me that i couldn't enter in a tracksuit, he let me in but he left me a little crazy, since inside there were all kinds of outfits from torn shorts/long pants to something similar to a costume 🤣
it's a shame not to be able to return because we're french... racism at its peak.
very good music, smiling waitress who serves efficiently and prices that are competitive with the marina's offering.

good music, very varied people and average price, the plane is amazing in terms of decoration!very friendly treatment from the waiters and access control staff.one of the best places to have a drink in the marina area.
a good place to go for dinner and/or have a few drinks during the week and on the weekend. special mention to nohe and mónica, the best waitresses without a doubt.
descendant of the mythical dixie plane. it's not the same as it was but it's not bad to have a drink with friends. good atmosphere and reasonable prices.

original place, very well decorated and with very good music. the price of the drinks perhaps a little excessive. it has a smoking room. there are billiards and table football. the waitresses are beautiful. the environment is ideal.

good treatment, very competitive prices, good music and atmosphere. recommended to have a good time without worries of any kind. in addition, there is a hotel next door for those who want to take advantage of it 😜
the site is quite complete, popular prices in the area and good music and atmosphere in general.
the drinks are very good and cheap. the atmosphere is great and the waiters are very nice. but for it to be your turn to go out and sing karaoke, at least 3 hours.

it is super good to have a drink because they are quite cheap, they have a wide variety of alcohols and it is a spacious place both to dance and to have a drink. they play very good music and the staff is very friendly. i don't know the bathrooms because i didn't go in.
one of the best places to have a beer in marina, with excellent music and magnificent treatment from all the people who work there. keep it up.!!!!
the place is excellent, with air conditioning which was great for me, the prices are quite good and the service is fast and friendly. plus some days they have live music, it's worth going.
the best experience of my life in terms of food, drink and love. great bar to enjoy unforgettable karaoke nights.
i don't give it 5 stars because the drinks are quite expensive compared to the other places in marina. as for the atmosphere, they play music with a screen and it is quite good for going in a group.

a dirty, dark place that smelled of brewed and chopped beer. lots of noise and crowded with people.the place is very large and has a space with chairs and tables that allows you to be a little quieter.the beer was bad like in any other joint in marina but i was surprised by the non-alcoholic beer, fresh and in a bottle, without a doubt i must have been one of the few who didn't wake up with shit the next day.i suppose that for those over twenty-somethings it must be a fabulous place but for me,

horrible situation we spent tonight in this place. a person has been brutally attacked with physical force by the employees of this place. it is totally deplorable that in 2021 these "people" continue to use this way to communicate with others. the lack of education, empathy and rationality is what is missing in their brains. i will not return again due to the impact that this situation has caused me. this meetup doesn't deserve this score but this place does. hopefully the attacked person make

before it was more fun, we need to change the musical style a little instead of repeating songs from the same one. it is a spacious place, more expensive than other relatively nearby bars but you feel very comfortable and there is usually room unless you go very late. sometimes it gets very crowded but there are interesting events.

a bar or pub with a great atmosphere, a lot of music from the 80's, very varied, but with a lot of rock and people of different ages that is also very good, the only but is a ledge near the dj table, which unfortunately i didn't see it, i fell to the ground and the glass i was carrying also, although nothing serious happened, it is in a busy passage area and it is easy to fall, from here a call to the dixit company that can fix that part, so furthermore, a highly recommended place to have a dri
good prices and great food, spent €20 for 2 entrees, a main dish and dessert, enough for two people. the fish was especially good. great service as well.

affordable snacks and coffee. good free wi-fi. w
when it's not busy, it's a good place to study for an hour or so.
good cofee and tea. nice service.
genial!

excellent service, they receive you with great warmth and kindness. good drinks and coffee. very pleasant to sit at the outside tables. everything clean, bathrooms very good. i thank them very much for allowing me to stay and work at the tables for a long time by ordering drinks, they save me and i have a very comfortable time. i will continue coming without a doubt.

good home restaurant to eat at midday, the half menu costs 9 euros and comes with a main course, drink and dessert. it has a terrace that is usually busy at peak times. it is located right in front of bau university.the mother and son kevin are lovely, they help you with whatever you need. even if the dish you want is not on the menu. quality products.
shout out to kevin and his mom. they always welcomed me with great warmth and kindness. i'm returning to mexico but i still have the memory of the excellent service and tasty food.
we went to eat at midday every day of our holiday. very good and very friendly staff.in love with this place!

after waiting a long time for them to serve us, and to serve other tables first, they charge me €9.20 for a coke, a bacon and cheese sandwich and an iced coffee. more than 9 euros!!!!!!! with this price i could make a menu at any bar in the vicinity. don't come in if you don't want to leave your paycheck
the food is good... very competitive prices, the place is cozy, they are very friendly, but i think they should be a little more organized at meal times...
excellent service, coffee and delicious food! i recommend it 100,000%, do not hesitate to visit it, it will make you feel at home.
nice place and the staff is very close and helpful, it is a pleasure to go there for a drink
a cozy place, the person in charge is super friendly. you eat very well at more than reasonable prices.
good cuisine, good treatment and good price 👍
a nice and simple place with careful attention
my favorite in all of barcelona!
good service and quality at a good price
good place to have breakfast or coffee
they always take good care of me
sandwich shop, cafeteria, for a beer.
good breakfasts, lunches and snacks
exquisite selection of different gins and flights to try at reasonable prices. only issue is seating with narrow stools on one side of the tables.
really nice place for a gin-tonic. super service and knowledgeable staff. makes for z successful night out every time!
cosy and adorable gin and tonic bar. some of the best drinks we've had and the sweetest bartender. cant wait to go back :)
an off the beaten path amazing gin bar. the service was exceptional. the location attracts locals and the music they play is super chill. love this place !
cool gin cocktail bar. cozy, fun decor and good service. they also have craft beer in draft which was delicious! they serve tapas but i didn’t try the food.
great!! where else can you get a gin and tonic flight? and very chill vibe too! thanks for being so kind to us when we were the only people in there.

lovely place nestled in a corner of gracia, very discreet and out of the preying eyes. the atmosphere is very cozy and the barmaid is very friendly. they have a vast variety of gins (my favorite being the monkey 47) and good cocktails (the pink sour is very good). a good place to relax and start your evening with some nice gin and tonics.
amazing drinks with gin, kind and helpful staff, we had a superfun evening at elephanta!
excellent selection of spirits & knowledgeable barwomen. very cozy atmosphere
amazing gin and cocktail bar! the mixologist was so friendly and helpful and took amazing pride in her work. thank you for a great evening.
our favorite gin bar in barcelona! we are casual gin drinkers but here we try some amazing ones every time we visit. we always get cool new recommendations from the lovely girl that works here.
lovely and cozy place! certainly the best service in barcelona, cuz the staff is really great! also, the cocktails are really amazing! i definitely recommend elephanta 👏🏼
delicious cocktails, especially g&t. had the drink of the month and it was amazing. beer is nice and cold too!

i arrived, drunk, i left more drunk, it was fun.
good gins
very coquette and cozy little spot in gracia, the gin cocktails are delicious. definitely will come back
great variety of gins and cocktails in a cool atmosphere!
a gem with lots of nonalcoholic virgin mocktails. thank you for having many options.

amazing, really curated menu of not only the best gin tonics in barcelona but also virgin cocktails that i enjoyed over and over during my pregnancy. amazing athmosphere mostly thanks to roger, nuria and the rest of amazing staff that go out of their way to make you feel at home. a must to try repeat in gracia for sure❤️❤️❤️❤️
small gin bar run by two ladies. really cozy and well done with extensive and well explained gin menu. a really nice place for afterwork and after dinner

this is a nice cocktail bar with good drinks. we went there because it had such great reviews, and the cocktails didn't disappoint, but the customer service was definitely lacking to say the least. the bar was full, so we were asked to sit outside and wait until one of the tables became available, which we were fine doing. we ordered a few drinks and waited paitently only to realize after about 40 minutes that 2 other larger groups had been sat before us. when we brought this to the waiter's att
a must visit- gin bar with really attentive people in it. highly recommend it. i assume that their refreshing coctails would really match with the summer heat as well

been there once and i have to say that i have hardly been treated that well in my traveling experience. friendly staff, very knowledgeable, superb cocktails, great atmosphere, what else could you ask? left the place very happy, and looking foward to visiting again
great fancy cocktail bar, you can taste great gins. it can be very busy during the weekends since it's very small. worth a visit if you love gin

best gin tonic bar in all of barcelona.  i've been living in barcelona for 3 years and i have tried many different gin bars all over the city but this one is by far the best.  the ambiance and the decor of the place is very inviting and warm and the drinks are spectacular.  if you like gin and tonic, you must go here.
rad little place with chill vibes and great service. good cocktails and cheap beer!
this place is the king of gin.  drinks are delicious.  we also had a cheese plate that was incredible.
great gin bar with chilled music and tasting selection for a great price. friendly staff and relaxed vibe.
great atmosphere and good selection of high-quality cocktails. very friendly and welcoming staff. maybe a bit pricey but i'd recommend it anyways.
i loved the way they served the drinks. if you don't know what to ask for, just tell the staff what you like and dislike... they will come up with ideas of what to drink!! they always nail it!!!
i had one of the best gintonics in a while and a great nite. the service waa great and the bartender was super nice.
incredible and cozy cocktail bar for gin enthusiasts! the bartender was super attentive and thoughtful - the drinks were amazing.
a nice corner to grab a really good cocktail or a gin. they are specialists in spirits, so try any of them. super cool!!! good job guys!
very good gin cocktails!

popped into this bar on a whim based on the excellent reviews both here an on tripadvisor and was very glad i did. the bar itself is small, cosy and beautifully decorated but the star attraction is the gins, of which there is a huge selection.

never fear though, as the friendly staff are super-knowledgeable. tell them what you like and they'll suggest something for you. i went for the nordés and had one of the nicest gin and tonic's i've had in a long time whilst chatting to the friendly owner

this is my go-to cocktail bar in barcelona. the vibe is relaxed, it’s not hectic, pretty small and quiet. the service is great. drinks prices are a little bit expensive but it is top quality ingredients, the cocktails are really amazing. i would definitely recommend this place.

great selection of worldwide gins. for those who are open to try new tastes, you also have the option to order a plate of 3 different gins. the staff is very helpful and will try to tell you more about the origin and history of what you are about to drink. if you want to sit outside (only 2 chairs) you need to be really lucky!

great selection of gin! the place is small, cosy and not too load. they serve small snacks like hummus,  natchos and olives. you can order 3 mini gt which is great to try different gin combination. best for max 4 people in a group as the tables are small. affordable price.

very small but cosy. wide gin&tonic selection and delicious cocktails. i really enjoyed their pisco sour. not suitable for very large groups, but perfect for a friends night or a date. the place gets full really soon!
by far my favourite cocktail bar in barcelona, the place is very cosy, the service impeccable and the selection of drinks is awesome. don't miss it!
small pub with great variety of gins! ps be patient to wait for your drinks, it's usually pretty crowded

great little bar with friendly staff. specialises in gin with over 40 available. i recommend the gin tasting flights, where you can select 3 different types of gin and mixer for less than you'd pay for 1 at a swank cocktail bar. highly recommended when passing through gracia.

one of the best little bars in europe. i am not a gin and tonic person, but the drinks were wonderful and the bartender was great! he spoke english really well and was very friendly and enlightening. really a must!
lovely quaint bar with various drink options even if you are not a fan of gin. a cocktail will set you back 10 euros but the quality is worth it. lovely atmosphere and very friendly barman.
amazing cocktails and an adorable bartender!
amazing service and must visit for gin lovers 🥰

small and cozy place. nice cocktails and amazing service. perfect for gin lovers.
definitely coming back. stay strong in these challenging times!
the best bar i’ve been to in barcelona. fantastic cocktails and superb service. highly recommend!
very nice and cozy bar with nice barmaid, we enjoyed her recommendations and drinks was cool
calm and stylish neighborhood cocktail bar whose looking for quality gin & tonic and surprisingly delicious homemade empanadas...
great bar. amazing gins including several from catalonia. hidden gem introduced to me by a friend. can't wait to go back!
amazing drinks and super friendly staff. bent over backwards to make sure we had a great time.
good bar. quite expensive. i had to pay 8.80 for a whiskey sour, and that is in the upper limit. small and cozy and a bit away from the crowded streets.
i love this bar. cozy, nice bartender. amazing menu, also tons of tea. i recommend the nutmeg gin & tonic - so good. also there is wifi!
fun gin bar!! the curated flights of g&ts is an excellent way to understand the nuances of gin
lovely atmosphere with great cocktail options. small but cozy place. service is great and the staff very friendly

great cocktails. delightful staff.
nice vibe.
super knowledgeable and friendly staff. ready to provide plenty of story and info around various gins. crazy cozy, would say 4 concurrent companies max.
nice cosey bar great drinks, competitive prices for the area. no faults part from the size of the bar. but will definitely visit again
nice cocktail bar. quite small but good ambiance. i had a mezcal cocktail and was quite good. can have sth to eat as well.
felt very unsafe here i wanted a nice night drink but the staff are fine with violence happening in their space
i have visited several times. one of the best places to have a cocktail. huge selection of cocktails and helpful staff to chose one.
good bar with a great variety of choices. good and decently affordable cocktails.
simply put, the best gin bar in the world! nuf' sai really but i have to add that the bartender is insanely friendly and he knows his stuff
cute place and professionists barman :)
decently priced drinks and they provide nuts(or something deliciously salted) with drinks! haha we ended up asking for refills and they were nice enough to give us more.
great respect for this place. difficult to match their gin tonics. just not as comfortable as it could be, but maybe nobody would ever leave otherwise.
really great ambience. amazing variety of gin. compared to the other gin spots in gracia, i like this the best.

great bar, super delicious gins, super friendly barkeeper and best service.
definetly a recommendation for gin lovers.

elephanta is a cozy and beautiful bar ! service is excellent. happy and warm people :)

try some of the amazing cocktails !
great little bar. slightly out the way for tourists. but if your in that neck of the woods it's worth going to.
small and cozy bar, perfect for having a drink with friends. great gintonics, try their guacamole  or hummus
a cozy place for some cocktails, they specialise in gin and have a daily offer on a gin & tonic combo.
lovely place, best in class service, great gins. we had a great time here :)
great vibe. excellent cocktails. reasonable prices. absolutely recommended.
cosy bar with a lot of cocktails. can be mixed a little bit too sweet for some
the décor isn't great and the bar can be cold in the winter but the cocktails are very good indeed.
good place,best atmosphere. they have a really good gintonics and cocktails.
one of the best place around the area for a quiet j&t.  extensive gin menu.
nice cocktails in a cozy place .
a nice cosy neigbourhood bar. interestingly wide variety of choices. a very nice guy at the bar asking for feedback and opinion.
delicious drinks, brilliant atmosphere, and amazing service.
lovely place, good music and atmosphere and of course great cocktails!
relaxing atmosphere, friendly staff, great gintonics made with care. nice vintage vibe.
great assortiment of gins in a small cantina, with a good bartender! so what else is there to wish for.....

great place!!!!
very tasty kokteil, great atmosphere and a very lovley personal!
must visit!
we were served delicious drinks by an absolutely lovely waitress.
best gin and tonic in the world. out from tourist attractions but worth a walk.
nice little bar. outside seating area and live sports. the prices seemed to vary on occasion!
really good place. breakfast from 2,5 to 5 euro. food really good, big portionsglas and nothing on the menu is more than 10 euro. the owners are extremely nice people.
