nice local bar to grab a coffee and a bocadillo, with a nice terrace on the sun...
taste was average. staff is good

bar restaurant with very good prices, and a quality that is more than remarkable for the price. we had something quick because it was late and it was next to the hotel and it was a pleasant surprise. very friendly staff, generous portions, delicious food and very good service.
currelas cafeteria bar, if you stay in the hotels in the area and want to have a cheap and abundant breakfast, here is your bar.
notice to sailors: medium estrella galicia at €2.40🔪
perfect to go eat some tapas, a mixed plate or just have a few beers or a coffee. very nice owners. although the dishes are simple, everything is quite good. oh, and very good prices!
bar to have coffee, or eat, they have a menu of mixed dishes and sandwiches.they are fast and friendly and a very good price.there is a taxi rank on the corner, so you will always find one.

place near hotels and laundry. while the washing machine and dryer were working, we enjoyed a beer and fries with a hamburger. the service is very nice. a simple place frequented by locals and tourists, i recommend it. 3 large portions of hamburger with fries, 2x cola, 1 beer, 26 euros
the service attitude is very good👌🏻the price is affordable (﹡ˆoˆ﹡)
the food and sandwiches are fantastic and they serve you very well. the prices are affordable.
small place with cheap breakfasts, fast service. well-located traditional bar.
cold beer and air conditioning
i love chicken vegetable
big dishes at good prices! the fried potatoes with egg and tenderloin are very filling and delicious! the sangria is the best we have tried in barcelona!
the pizzas, the food in general and the service are very good. the only drawback is the chairs and tables, which are very large for the space there is.

we are people from the area and he has treated us very badly just for ordering something to snack on (we had 4 rounds of drinks) so we will not return... we told him and he was offended! we have told you the truth :/
the chinese that serves you is rude and dirty, i do not recommend coming here at all given the places around you
a simple and modest bar in pueblo nuevo, barcelona.
estrella galicia on tap, extensive menu of sandwiches, tapas and quality food, available staff and very cheap
very friendly service and the breakfast was very tasty.
a quiet bar with a very good terrace and good prices
the best sangria, good price and very delicious food! 100% recommendable!!
a simple and modest bar in pueblo nuevo.
excellent loin sandwiches with cheese and beer at a good price
disastrous service, in response to complaints they claim to “not speak/understand spanish”.
€7 for two coffees and a sandwich, and very slow service.
chinese bar. good service and price
great cheap. it has everything.
good and cheap

good food. amazing flavour with sauce on patates braves and spanish omelette.
very nice and friendly staff.

will come back again!

i almost didn’t go in because it looked so unassuming - luckily i did!
good variety , most of the usual tapas suspects , but some very good dishes.
we had the sepia a la plancha (very nice olive oil and parsley dressing over it), nachos w guacamole and cheese (also almost didn’t order this because , really, nachos as a lunch dish?) but again, far exceeded my expectations . so well done, with generous accompaniment of the guac and cheese, together with some condiments. last was the pimientos de p
pretty decent food but worth an extra star because it's open late, the staff are great and the atmosphere is pretty good, too. one of our stand by places when we're hungry late in gràcia.

great local bar and restaurant. the chef's make great food, tapas and their lunch menu is sooo flavorful. they treated me like i am from the neighborhood. 6 big screen tvs and great friendly atmosphere.

great tapas, vermut, wine, lunches...
the chef even added a specialty dish at my request for a lunch menu option and was cooked perfectly!
authentic. food fabulous. staff friendly. don’t worry if you don’t speak spanish

great tapas bar in a local style, non touristy atvthe neighbourhood
food is freshly made, well served
prices are inexpensive. we had 4 tapas dishes and 3 beers. ended up with 30 eur which is reasonable enough
recomnended if you're in the area

what a wonderful spanish diner.
great music, awesome food.
very nice staff!
best bravas i ever tasted, also recommend the brie delight (sweet & salted)... sometimes is really busy but they keep trying to give a good service
good menu in english language. food was good and came quick. very friendly staff.

stayed at an air bnb nearby.  this was our go to!  cafe con lèche  and croissants de chocolate to start.  three course lunches when our schedule permitted, but always back for a snack and night cap before bed.  super personal staff,  great bites and drinks,  -overall a wonderful taste of day to day city life in barcelona.
cool place. i come here to watch barcelona fc games and drink beer. neighborhood spot with some good food. recommended.
great local catalan bar

it was very crowded and noisy.
the waitress forgot our order.
the prices were not bad but the food was not so good in my opinion.
charming lunch tapas. good local spot. friendly. get the manchego cheese, olives, chorizo and onions, jambon iberico and anything else you are interested in.
food is good although a little expensive, worst part through is the house has a lot of silly rules like not splitting the tab, no cocktails, if you are alone is good to eat otherwise i would pass

very good service for a small place. the guy was very nice a s polite. we order the lunch menu. salmorejo (cold soup) was great, garbanzos con morcilla (to die for). for the main course we both had the same breaded chicken with roquefort sauce.  came with potatoes and for dessert we had lemon tart. not over sweet, or acid. just good. menu was €11 each. portions were abundant but luckily not american giant style lol . small nice place.
i always go to this place! the food is great, staff are friendly and has a good atmosphere
good beer and delicious tapas
thank you for the "salad without a face" and everything else ! the onion rings and baby octopus were great !
amazing food and service

service ok. bartenders making jokes on customers (especially foreign) was annoying.  it costs nothing to be more professional and committed. at the  end, we always work for our-self, no matter what we do.
nice place for quick drink and small tapas
little lisbon in a heart of barceloneta. amazing service, big portions, affordable prices.

too crowded, the waitress forgot to bring our order.
people shouting at each other.
not a good experience.
great low key neighborhood joint. it is frequented by locals mostly, so it is great for a couple of drinks and occasional tapa. recommended!
nice familiar atmosphere, friendly staff, football on the tv, good food, cheap beer. what more do you need in life?
want an old school bar in the middle of the busy part of barcelona? come here.
great place to have some beers and tapas while watching barca play on one of the many screens.
typical spanish pub with decent prices (12€ for 1 liter of sangria )
good selection of tapas, quick to serve and reasonably priced. menus in english too.
good beer and food. tacos and cheese dish very tasty.
awesome staff, great for football and so close to fontana. great!
absolutely fantastic ...highly reccomend you wont be disappointed
brilliant bar and lovely food
food is ok. drinks are ok. not spectacular but ok
good tapas, good beer, not expensive.
patatas bravas tasty. beer ok.
slow service, not the cleanest in tapas bar
good beer and very good tapas
great place to watch fc barcelona
lovely, tasty, friendly
nicecpkace. quaint and nice food
bones tapes

good place to have lunch or dinner. they usually make a mid-day menu. the place is nice and bigger than it looks from the outside. the food is correct. on the menu there are some burgers and tapas that are quite good.
my culinary experiences in this place have been very satisfactory, both when going to have tapas and when eating from the menu. variety, quality and good price. highly recommended.
typical and very good tapas, characteristic old pub style atmosphere. average prices

this is my place to have breakfast or a snack, an excellent coffee with a mini, which is not so mini entrepan, for €2.50 in gracia, if you read correctly, in gracia. the atmosphere is very musical, if you stay a while you can see a concert by some ⭐ rockstar! 😍the phenomenal attention, very nice and endearing. i haven't eaten yet but the dishes i see passing by look good. 😋

typical neighborhood tapas bar, to try a little of everything. very attentive service! i recommend the chicken fingers, las bravas, calamarcitos and chorizo. the nachos disappointed me a little, little portion and little guacamole. but everything else was great.

excellent place to have some tapas and some beers. they make an awesome sangria. the delicious dishes. impeccable service, you couldn't ask for more. a 10! we have been many times and we will continue to go.
always treated with a smile and availability to serve and chat. a great cook! my favorite bacon with cheese. 🤩

quiet little bar to have a few beers and eat tapas with friends. the cheek piece is highly recommended. excellent attention.in the photo we ordered the padrón peppers (which are excellent), the pulpits with a homemade fish sauce and the cheek with sauce and mashed potatoes (highly recommended).at the end of the meal we closed with a few glasses of frangelico.

what i needed at the right time, menu for €14 weekend, delicious and for that exceptional price. i returned at night to have dinner and watch the champions league final, an impressive good atmosphere and the place packed. the roman squid tapa, delicious and the cheese as well. if i return to this area i will repeat for sure!!!!

nothing special. the waitress was very nice and pleasant.the fideua with its homemade aioli, good.for the second i ordered churrasco with chimichurri sauce. the quality of the meat was very poor, it was tough and difficult to chew.the flan for dessert, very normal.
all very good burger, delicious chicken, very delicious. cold bread would be better if it had been heated a little.
found by chance, in a place that seemed less touristy. very good surprise. very friendly welcome and excellent food. best tapas of our stay.

context: the waiter was a short, rude guy.we have gone for the first time and the last. they have closed the kitchen with the order half done and without telling us. the table smelled bad. they don't know how to make broken eggs. expensive for what it is.
we went with the children yesterday for dinner and it was good.they treated us very well.we each ordered a sandwich and they were good.
to have something to drink is fine. good music. i gave it two stars because i didn't really like the food.

we went to eat and expected something else, since it looked good from the outside. they don't make the food there. we ordered patatas bravas and when we left we saw that they had them in a plastic container. we ordered a hamburger and it was cold and so was the sandwich. it didn't smell like food, meaning they didn't make it there. it may be good to drink but i wouldn't go back to eat.

english belowtapas bar with a very good atmosphere and very attentive and friendly staff, a good place to go alone or with friends. i had a light dinner last week, i had a great dinner with a beer and a coffee. everything very correct and fast service. very kind and friendly chef. i recommend it.englishtapas bar with a very good atmosphere and very attentive and friendly staff, a good place to go alone or with friends. i had a light dinner last week, i had a "bomba" (spicy potato) with a beer a

the owner's treatment is shameful. they literally kicked me out, i was going to watch football at dinner and since there was only one person there, he treated me as if my money was not worth it. i have been in the hospitality industry for 23 years and came on vacation to barcelona and i didn't expect there to still be people. so. that's enough... i'll take care of commenting on it in the tourist guides for which he regularly collaborates.
the calamari a la romana on the menu is very expensive.2 portions, 1 beer 1 coke = €28.90excessively expensive for a bar and tv on with volume at full volumehow awfuli will not return
we had some calamari a la romana before going to the cinema, and they are the best i've had in a long time! tender, well cooked and with a good batter. and the waiter was very kind.
we found it by chance walking along paseo de gracia. and it has been a success. very good food, and the waitress was very nice and very attentive.
top, top....definitely go there.great food. super nice people.great for watching football.we had a lot of fun in the store.
we ate at the premises, good food and good service.the waiter very friendly.very acceptable price quality.the place has its charm.
very good to watch games, great food and atmosphere.

a very picturesque neighborhood bar. the staff's attention is good, what i like most is the food, which is homemade food. makes it look like i'm eating at my house. the potatoes are spectacular and the atmosphere is very nice. the lunch menu always has a variety of options and is very complete.

good service and good sandwiches... generous burgers. it's been a long time since i enjoyed a bacon cheese sandwich so much. the terrace is not sheltered and the street traffic makes it very noisy... i still recommend it.

the number of times i have walked through gran de gràcia and i have never noticed this bar. the decoration inside is cool, vintage vibe. the music was very good, they played a bee gees concert. the drink and food arrived, the waitress was very friendly. the bravas were very delicious, crispy potato and the sauce very well complemented. the potato omelet was very thick, i liked that because it suggests that it is not industrial. ideal place for tapas in the area.
it's difficult to find a place where they play good music, eat well, and have great rentals, old style but modern. i really liked everything! to repeat!

very nice waitress, who seemed to be in charge, also very attentive and nice, we had a hamburger and a burrito, if you want to be hungry and lose weight, the burrito is what you should order, for €9 i expected something more than a 90 % lettuce rolled in a wrap, the rest, 10% two pieces of meat and a chopped vegetable. we will sin of "guiris"...the meat of the hamburger, good and the potatoes too.
traditional bar perfect for going to watch games. a very good atmosphere and very tasty tapas
cute little restaurant, great service, great rock music in the bar, very friendly staff, great food! 😊
good atmosphere, friendly waiters and reasonable prices. we tried the eggplant chips with honey and it was very good.it is next to the fontana metro and is a good meeting place..
excellent place to watch football, no matter where you sit you can see it clearly. good snack food.
excellent place to have tapas, lunch, dinner, or just spend time watching football, talking and having a beer. affordable prices and variety of dishes. highly recommended
good food, good televisions, good tapas and very good service… excellent tavern to watch soccer games
place with competitive prices to have a beer, tapa or a cold cider. shaded terrace a stone's throw from fontana. friendly service
great tapas restaurant, super friendly waiters, good atmosphere, good music. warm places. i recommend

we have gone a couple of times. the first for the good opinions. we left happy. we repeated the second one and were not so happy. it was sunday at noon and they were missing half of the tapas menu. they could have said it more clearly because we called before and they only said that something was missing. otherwise it is a typical neighborhood bar that has everything everyone wants and some specialties (potato omelette...) in general everything is good and the price is good. the place could be

the best tapas place in barcelona, ​​without a doubt. the quality-price ratio is incredible. the patatas bravas are crazy stuff. and a separate paragraph for the pork cheek with potatoes, which is why i personally congratulated the cook accompanied by a strong handshake. each person who comes to visit us in barcelona is taken to the snack bar to live this unforgettable experience.

excellent service, complete and well-priced breakfasts, varied and well-priced mid-day menu you can even make a half menu and its variety of very good tapas, highlighting their bravas and their meatballs, at night i recommend their hamburgers or their burritos
stressed waiters not friendly at all, the place is small. i don't like
menu and tapas bar. the place is not very big but both the attention, the service and the food are 10!

we have gone a couple of times. the first for the good opinions. we left happy. we repeated the second one and were not so happy. it was sunday at noon and they were missing half of the tapas menu. they could have said it more clearly because we called before and they only said that something was missing. otherwise it is a typical neighborhood bar that has everything everyone wants and some specialties (potato omelette...) in general everything is good and the price is good. the place could be

the best tapas place in barcelona, ​​without a doubt. the quality-price ratio is incredible. the patatas bravas are crazy stuff. and a separate paragraph for the pork cheek with potatoes, which is why i personally congratulated the cook accompanied by a strong handshake. each person who comes to visit us in barcelona is taken to the snack bar to live this unforgettable experience.

excellent service, complete and well-priced breakfasts, varied and well-priced mid-day menu you can even make a half menu and its variety of very good tapas, highlighting their bravas and their meatballs, at night i recommend their hamburgers or their burritos
stressed waiters not friendly at all, the place is small. i don't like
menu and tapas bar. the place is not very big but both the attention, the service and the food are 10!
potato omelette with onion and very generous potato. highly recommended. friendly and attentive service.

today i went to eat for the first time with some friends, and the truth is i didn't have a good experience.the broccoli was cold and the potatoes had squid (which wasn't even squid)nothing natual pineapple, pot and no rum.i will not return poor cleanliness.

i came here to have coffee in the morning, and it was nice that it opened early on sunday morning. i had cafe con leche + croissant, cafe con leche + mini bocadio, and it was delicious and the owner was friendly. give it a try~
a little poor, they don't provide tablecloths or napkins to eat, i had to ask for cutlery, so good television space

i no longer live in barcelona, ​​but when i go i don't hesitate to go there, especially on thursdays for their spectacular paella and on fridays a seafood stew and black rice on the menu. wow, i left there wanting more
service is really good once you have been more than once. frittata is made fresh daily and is so cheap. cafe con leche is hot too
beers are cheap, but the food is not good consistently. the bathrooms upstairs are like entering a sauna in the summer.
lovely service, and cheap. they unfortunately don't speak english well, only spanish, wenzhounese and mandarin.
just for survival mode
china town

an authentic "currantes" bar with a menu at 8 euros. the owners are chinese and the cook is russian. the food is plentiful and high in calories. don't be too picky about the service. the cleaning... let's just say it's fair.

i waited for a customer to pay to order. after paying he ignored me and went into the kitchen. i waited and asked for coffee with bayleis, he told me the coffee machine was off. i wanted to ask something else because my boyfriend wanted to drink something cold anyway and he didn't even let me talk about going to another one. there was room outside and inside and people were drinking. it's 8.30pm, usually open until midnight. obviously i'm not coming back.

daily menu at 8 euros with abundant dishes. saturday and sunday tapas, sandwiches and mixed dishes...the only one always open! family management, pleasant to deal with, cozy room with tv, small terrace. good quality-price ratio. i have been coming to eat here for 2 months and there is the possibility of half a menu for 6 euros.

in times of need, of hunger and thirst, el primer café is there. it's not that it's the best, it's not the fastest, it doesn't have the best offer, but it's always there and that's the most important thing, damn it!!!

chinese bar a little rude, with questionable hygiene.of the few times i have eaten at this place and ordered the same dish or sandwich, each time they have charged me something different. not recommended for eatingplace to at most have a few beers when leaving work.
old bar, overprotected for covid-19 with those screens that make it extremely ugly. lively terrace, friendly staff
the bathroom is very dirty, full of spiders and smells very bad.
cheap and very good menu. homemade food. located in an industrial area. i don't miss fridays
better and cleaner than spanish ones, very good cuisine for such a cheap menu, and very attentive
dirty and very rude. they don't make up for the low prices. avoid this place.
although it is a place run by a citizen of oriental origin, the cook is national and the potato omelette is hearty.
helpful, clean, normal. good terrace. large interior space.
small bar with a more than reasonable working menu and a small (but pleasant terrace).
they serve very quickly, to grab something.
they never close. you will find it open on sundays and holidays.
bad service and the chinese talk to each other and nothing is understood
looking forward to trying that delicious paella...
chinese bar, coffee with milk is good.
normal bar, i haven't tried the food yet.
not very good please improve a little
old bar, acceptable menu
good sandwiches with affordable prices
thursday, good paella
they are attentive and pleasant
neighborhood bar without further ado
aoald nature

it was my first tapas meal ever and i was really delighted. we ordered croquettes, green peppers with goat cheese, and gambas. everything was delicious. my favorite would be the green pepper because of the unexpected combination with the goat cheese really gave a smooth taste with the bitterness from the pepper. the staffs were also very friendly and welcoming!

very good menu del dia! i would recommend you to try their menu del dia as it it offers a good variety of dishes to choose from. we ordered 3 sets, with the first course being a cheese salad, potato zucchini soup & pesto pasta. all had great portion size & were tasty.

for the second course we had cod, meatballs and chicken. although the amount of potatoes was overwhelming, the meat was  very nicely done for all three. my personal favourite is the battered cod as the meat was good and the batter

highly recommend!!! one of the best meals i have had in barcelona. the service was excellent, so kind (even though we arrived far too early for dinner). the meal was affordable and delicious. ambiance was perfect- relaxed and beautiful. cannot wait to come back!

we had lunch here, it was looking good and lunch menu offer. we could choose from 4 appetizers, 4 mains, 3 deserts and several drinks. the food came very quickly. appetizer, big portions, tasty. the mains were also ok. overall great value at 12 euro and the service was very friendly, good came quickly.
very friendly staff and delicious food. kitchen opens at 12:30pm for lunch, but you can get tapas beforehand if you are hungry. we enjoyed everything we ordered.
great place for lunch. i am sure that dinner was great as well, should come for that later.

went there for my christmas dinner party with my team, we had a closed many and since i sent the first email to contacted them, they where so helpful. the food was amazing, the service incredible and the place beautiful! not enough word to express my gratitud and how good everything was. thank you!
one chic and sincere restaurant with great price/quality ratio for "today's lunch".
excellent experience, i highly recommend,  spectacular environment,  designs, food, services,  you won't regret, thank for the good taste, and to make the difference!!!!
excellent food with very good service. i do recomed, the octopus, the jam,  the edges and the omelet, the desserts are really good also
loved this place. very hospitable and engaging staff and service. very good food and a pleasant atmosphere.
i am in love with this beautiful place... there are no wirds to describe the warm welcome and delicious food. will comw back again for sure.
one of the best restaurants in the city. with gluten free options.

we had dinner here on the recommendation of staff at seventy hotel down the road. the food was incredible, really fresh and good quality ingredients. i couldn’t fault it. the service was also very quick. highly recommend.
good food and friendly service but way understaffed and small plates of food.
their patata bravas are the best with a different and very tasty sauce. definitely recommended
excellent service and the best quality of foods. i'll come back again
superb! i went with my child and was satisfied with the very friendly atmosphere.

excellent restaurant !
great atmosphere and delicious food!
on top of that, service is always timely and helpful
a "must visit" place if you want a lovely dinner in a nice place

probably the friendliest place in the neighborhood.

everything tasted great. good wine recommendations too. my only regret is i came alone so couldn't try rest of the menu. they also nicely packed my leftovers, which i ate for breakfast. was still amazing. 😋😋

visited here on a monday with my partner for the menu del dia. after reading about the positive reviews online we were excited to go. we got here about 12 and was surprised how quiet it was, although i heard before that most the locals are out about 2.
sure and behold from 1 to 2 the place really started filling up with lots of locals and it felt like a very friendly traditional spanish restaurant.
we were mostly happy with how speedy and attentive the staff were.
food quality was fantastic, tho
excellent food from the daily menu. the staff is kind and friendly. the prices are more than reasonable regarding plate size. top recommendation!
great restaurant. friendly staff. great atmosphere.
a great place to eat tapas. more locals than tourists. i would call it a hidden gem.
excellent food and choice. kind and attentive service. we enjoyed it so much we visited twice during our stay in barcelona. thank you for looking after us so well.

maybe it was due to it being lunchtime and the deep frier not being hot enough, but the food was really oily and hard to go through.
the atmosphere is quite nice though and good music is played.

walked in with minimal expectations but we were blown away by the quality of the food. we had the burata filled ravioli with truffle sauce as an entre and the tuna and cod as main. the fish was cooked to perfection! would visit again given the chance. the staff is very accommodating and speaks good english.
outstanding restaurant in a cozy hidden street in barcelona. exquisite cuisine!

delicious food, warm personal service. we had the "menu" which was an amazing deal. includes a starter, an entree and dessert oh and did i mention beer, wine, cava or soft drink??? amazing.  wish i was staying in barcelona longer, i'd definitely be back!

really bad service at this place. sat down to have something to drink, but was to told they needed the table for other people before we even got to start with our bevereges. waitress was really rude about it, and wouldn’t even come over to give us our bill when we asked for it several times.

delicious food, compliant staff, not rushed to leave. ideal in my books.

the bacalao - cod was thick and perfect. the mozzarella, pesto and tomato salad was a lovely meal. the craft beer was  interesting.

delicious lunch at reasonable prices. their daily menu has you choosing between three or four different starters and main courses, as well as there is a few options for dessert. everything was delicious. i had the leek soup to start with, which was ridiculously creamy and tasty, and the andalusian style calamares as my main course, which was clearly fresh out of the deepfrier and absolutely not something out of a bag from the freezer! my girlfriend had the wok, which was some of the tastiest vea

cozy relaxing restaurant with extremely nice staff! really making a difference!
the food was good, with many options all of great quality.
i def recommend it!
wonderful tapas and dessert. very cosy place. friendly staff. please note that this is the same as madame tapas (we where confused of the combination). wish i made photos.
cute little restaurant with delicious food and lovely staff. highly recommend!!
kindest service. the waitress was patient for me to finish my order in spanish even though i'm not fluent.  great night out. great food.

one star for design but the food was below average to say the least. we left most of it on the plate... don't eat the ensalada rusa, the steak tartar was swimming in gravy, and the burger was really bad.
small and cute tapas-style resturaunt. very reasonable and dishes were great-tasting.

we arrived at the place by chance. during our week holidays, we went 2 times with my children and some friends. i recommend this restaurant to people who like lightness and quality food on a nice environnement.

loved this restaurant.. went there twice in a row at the end of our trip.. romantic, bustling (went in with no reservation) delicious house wine and sangria as well as a mouth watering and cheap menu..
good risotto. however not with gambas (large) but shrimps (small). staff was very slow - out of drinks for several long times.
we got here early and had the place to ourselves- great restaurant with great food and service. the ambience and decor of this place is fantastic. highly recommended
great place to enjoy local and home-made food in gracia. fresh and good quality ingredients used. warm atmosphere and (super) friendly staff. thank you!
ambiance was great, food was really nice. service on a monday night was fast and friendly! would reccomend to anyone looking for a nice dinner.
good,  delicous,  warm
it's the restaurant to be !!! amazing service, the dishes are beyond what your mouth ever experienced, you could not leave barcelona before.

amazing service and even better food.
definitely would go back.

delicious food
my husband said that this was the best dish he has ever had.
great place, very good food and amazing service!
friendly staff, fast service, good food and atmosphere.
amazing atmosphere, food, service and best cappucinos 😁
excellent and affordable food, highly recommended.
delicious food and perfect service. a must in barcelona!
great vibe, great food, great service. we'll repeat!
traditional restaurant in gracia! good prices and service
great good! and awesome service!
creative tapas, interesting decor
amazing service
amazing food
quiet and cozy atmosphere. we ordered several tapas to share and we liked them all, good quality. for black wine i recommend the bestué, it was a success.

a real pleasure to be able to enjoy a meal at estel. the decoration and atmosphere makes you look around with every bite and enjoy. the food is spectacular, the burger with truffle sauce and the sauce that accompanies the bravas is delicious, and as for the service, it could not be more attentive, fast and helpful.

restaurant with very good decoration and friendly and correct service. it has a menu of the day for about €12.9 with four options per dish, the truth is that it is the cheapest in the area without being chinese or fast food. if i don't give a higher rating it is because the quantities of the dishes are somewhat small. the background music is very pleasant and they don't take too long to serve you.
very nice staff. we only had wine, olives and guacamole. but it was delicious. cozy atmosphere. plenty of privacy if you want to talk. the prices also seem reasonable to me.
brutal!good food, spectacular service, incredible quality.i repeat many times.

you can eat both dishes and tapas. we chose to make tapas and we liked everything we ate (croquettes, scrambled eggs, steak tartare, chicken wings, lollipops...). to put a "but" i would remove the skin from the black pudding to make the lollipops more comfortable to eat.

treatment: excellent and friendlymenu: very balanced with very interesting options although some not very successful: the croquettes for the unit price are very small although tasty, and the claudia salad is not very good, just because it was missing that: the salad!value for money: very goodwe will repeat without a doubtnote: they do not have baby seats nor is it accessible. point to keep in mind, negative

great discovery in the gràcia neighborhood. they have a varied menu, but we opted for some tapas to share and we thoroughly enjoyed it. the staff is attentive and charming and the place is very cozy. we will repeat for sure 😊

the experience at this restaurant left a lot to be desired in terms of the quality of the dishes. among others, we ordered a pesto pasta which turned out to be without sauce and too oily. in addition, we encountered abrupt and rude responses from the waitress. this lack of attention to detail and unfriendly attitude negatively affected our visit. i'm sorry but i can't recommend it, that menu is not up to par.

the moment we spent dining in this wonderful little corner of barcelona was a real pleasure. the food, fresh and homemade, without tricks or cardboard, was delicious. the service was impressive, our daughters asked to add or remove ingredients, make the omelet something else, etc. they agreed to all this very willingly and with a wide smile, offering us a great little moment of happiness, which is what it is supposed to be about when you go to a restaurant in good company. needless to say, the

superb tapas address in the heart of the lively gracia district. very warm welcome, nice selection of wines and very honest value for money. be careful not to have your eyes bigger than your stomach though because the portions are generous. i recommend !
a very cozy place with very elegant decoration. the food is very good. the waiters and managers are very attentive and friendly. we will repeat without a doubt!

we were here for dinner and can fully recommend estel de gràcia.both starters and main courses were very tasty (although the slightly sweet note of the pimientos de padrón was a bit unusual at first), matching wine and reasonable prices. service was attentive and friendly.

we were here for dinner last night. we received a very warm welcome. the service was very nice and attentive. we were there with two babies - and that wasn't a problem with the strollers either. we ordered two burgers - the burger superstar and a burger whose name i forgot but it was breaded and somehow we didn't find it that tasty - so it just wasn't our taste. the superstar is highly recommended for this. therefore only 4 stars. the ambience is nice - you sit really nice and quietly. thank yo

very nice place, located very close to paseo de gracia and diagonal. rather informal atmosphere, with a good variety of tapas to share. the service was super attentive and friendly and the food we tried (salad, wings, blood sausage lollipops, squid and croquettes) was, in general, tasty and well cooked. to make a point, we ordered cheesecake for dessert and it was still partially frozen. however, i emphasize again that everything else was very correct, especially the waiters, and the price was

we came in because of how good it looked from the outside and because of the menu with attractive dishes at a very affordable price.covid certificate as required by law to enter, and unbeatable treatment from both waiters.the gnocchi to take off the hat, and the seconds are also more than recommended.on top of that, they gave us yogurt for our daughter at no extra cost, so she could have some dessert.we will be back!

we were 5 people for dinner. we arrived at 8.30 and the starters and main course were perfect, there were barely 4 tables occupied and we could talk without having to shout...until the restaurant was full. after 9.30 it was impossible to have a conversation, i suppose that business dinners on these dates will be something exceptional because the truth is that the decoration of the place is perfect for quiet dinners, as a couple, with family or with friends. moving on to the food, perfect hambur

a very nice place, very pleasant atmosphere, the waiters' treatment perfect and the food very good, we ordered an assortment of croquettes, potato omelette, steak tartar, a hamburger with truffle sauce. highly recommended
ideal place to meet friends. mnu good quality price. the place is very nice. friendly service. to come back
welcoming and intimate venue, soft lighting, elegant setting, well-kept service.good meat and starters.the preparation is particularly refinedsome sweets

it is the old restaurant, which has changed premises, of francesc giner on carrer còrsega.it keeps the good things of old, but in a new and very well decorated place. it's cozy and beautiful.it's a good restaurant, with moderate prices. the food is very good, the menu is not too extensive but sufficient and the service is professional and very friendly.we ate there very well.since they keep the file from the previous one, which is closed, i renew all the photos.

we went for christmas dinner and were pleasantly surprised.we were in a room downstairs alone and with very attentive service.it's a shame that since the drink is not on the menu, the price skyrockets.original and good starter dishes and the main course cannelloni as well.we will repeat for sure another day.

spectacular tasting food!!very good service, attentive and helpful, a luxury restaurant, ideal for dinner or lunch, in the center of barcelona. i will definitely repeat, it won't be long before we return!!

i would repeat! very good service and the wines were excellent! the cheese board was very good although the duck would not be what we would recommend! the scrambled eggs with cheese was spectacular! we would go again! it is better to make a reservation!

it was one of our favorite restaurants in gracia and during the pandemic, going to a medical center that is very close, we saw that they had changed location. so we made a mental note to visit them and see the new place as soon as they allowed it. the other day we went to dinner to celebrate my birthday with my partner. he made the reservation to surprise me and when we arrived it seemed that they didn't have it written down or that they weren't expecting us, it seemed very strange to us. the t

very tasty food, refined tapas and wide choice. the only downside: too much cinnamon on the tarte tatin. furthermore, drowning d3 puff pastry in a 'soup' is never a good idea. nice, but not a good idea.
the umpteenth time at the estel de gràcia, and not the last. tapas to share, good drink and excellent, friendly and close service. we will be back, as always.

best bar in gràcia, local place, amazing staff and owners. interesting wine list and is always changing. chef is lovely and marc is the best. sexy food menu and is very trendy. they have cocktails too, but it’s a fun wine bar! definitely check it out.

one of the best tapas we had in barcelona!
recommend tuna and scallops with pork belly.

it’s truly amazing what these guys can present from their small kitchen. really good different takes on classic dishes. everything we had was very tasty and rich and was paired with good wines (only regret is not getting the name of the orange wine).
very nice service too in this small place.
definitely worth several visits!!!

if i’d be able to do, i’d give not only 5, but 500 stars.

if you want to taste very good tapas then you are here right. i have never tasted better tapas.

i had to wait for taking a sit but it’s definetly worth it.

we had a wonderful evening here, experiencing easily the tastiest tapas that we'd had during the whole of our stay in barcelona.
sitting at the bar, we enjoyed front row seats to the kitchen action. the two man, powerhouse team kept the venue running smoothly and helped us greatly when interpreting their daily catalonian menu.
we enjoyed their patatas bravas; roast beef with parmesan, mustard and egg yolk; panfried razor clams; scallops with broccoli puree; russian salad; octopus and pork belly

amazing food, amazing service, extremely friendly and helpful staff, great ambiance- i absolutely loved it! fun/different take on tapas and boy were they good! will definitely be returning here. it’s always packed but we were able to get a good spot and plenty of space around 3ish on a saturday

beautiful tiny gem. creative tapas in very affordable prices, made with care and passion for cooking. an open kitchen and dynamic atmosphere run by a team of professionals who serves you with love and a smile. recommended!

does a 6 stars rate exists? it's amazing! great vibes, creative gourmet quality tapas!

they have a great indipendent local wines choices as well avermouth and draft beers.

we had "pez mantequilla" carpaccio which was a more aromatic style of a chevice, steak tartare on focaccia with black truffle oil, strawberry salad with "mato" and same pinchos of "gilda's" (anchovies, olives and green peppers)

it's all melt with guys working and seeing they love their work and what they serve.

this create
amazing place delicious food. and people from service are very gentle and friendly. loved the wine and best croqueras de todo mi vida.

the place deserves all of the stars! the menu is stunning! yes, the plates are smaller than you expect and a prices a bit higher, but the are so well balanced you will surprise not noticing any hunger after all.
thank you guys for the one of the most interesting and sparkling food experience in years! ❤️ will definitely comeback!
little bar with amazing food, the owners were super friendly and we had the best time. perfect tapas experience in barcelona.

wow, what a menu! with each plate it was getting better and better, there was nothing we wouldn't like and we tried a lot. it's a tiny place but with good vibe, stuff is super nice and the chef is a star managing so many things at once, great job guys. definitely would love to come back to try new menus
no words. the food was amazing, i just want to go back and have more of their scallops!
fantastic food and wonderful service. cosmopolitan atmosphere. probably some of the best tapas we have had!

very nice tapas place! not the best if you're on a romantic date, as you have to share the table with strangers, but for me that was a great point, as you feel like sharing a great moment with other people having fun around you. great atmosphere, great service!

love this spot! thoughtful, fresh and always delicious tapas. great wine selection! friendly service and always a great jam on the bluetooth speaker. small and always busy but never made to feel rushed.

easily one of my favourite bars in barcelona.

although you might need to wait for a spot, grab a drink on the street while you wait because it’s worth it.

a fun, neighbourhood atmosphere with mark & his team working non-stop to keep glasses & bellies full.

all the food is amazing and we’ll-priced. be sure to try the fois gras & the razor clams - standout dishes!

this place won me over. i tried going to la pubilla my second night in town, but was told i would need a reservation. they sent me packing for extra and i was kinda disappointed. that ended when i arrived.

mark and ricardo, server/wine enthusiast and cook respectively, were my new best friends by the end of the trip. after my first visit, i came back 2 other times. the food was incredible and the wine kept flowing.

this is a great place for a solo traveler or even a few people. it helps to spe
great food and ambience! marc and team are truly culinary geniuses.
great place to have a good wine and eat succulent tapas. small place, to go alone or as a couple. let yourself be advised by the waiter. exceptional food honest proposal in this city of madness ..

heard of this place through a friend who told us they had great bravas. we found that everything, i mean everything, on the menu is outstanding. the food is very original and we found ourselves surprised with every dish. especially with the sellery carpaccio. a veg i normally don't eat.
great food and atmosphere, relaxed and cozy. the house tuna with the special marinade was amazing, second for me was the tomatoes with pickled anchovies.
amazing food. creatives, fresh & surprising dishes. good vibes only. tapas as it should be.
great experience quality food thank you and all the best for the future 👏👏👏🐸✌️

homemade tapas in a very typical place in gracia. they have a standard menu + daily meals that change everyday. the wines are very good. i would recommend to go early as the place is very small and get full very quickly.
i loved the experience, the spanish tapas were super and they have a menu that changes daily. super friendly service, and all this comes with very good prices!

absolutely love this small but cosy gourmet spot in gracia. delicious menu with specials that change regularly, and each time surprises with more innovative ways of preparation and mixture of tastes.
staff is friendly and will always welcome you with a smile and a recommendation ☺️
incredible food and great staff. highly recommend
a sort of contained frenetic chaos that resulted in some of the best food we tried in the city along with some of the most interesting wines. sausage on toast, what's not to love.
great seasonal menu and wine. calamari was fantastic!

this place is fantastic! everything i look for in a bar/restaurant. stellar wine list. delectable food. we were in barcelona for 3 days and went here twice. we even walked around for 2 hours the second time trying to find it again because we forgot what is was called. we won't forget again. i would suggest this place to anyone but especially if you work in the hospitality industry and appreciate the work they have put in to make this place extra great. i believe our servers name was matt, he get

it's my favorite spot in gracia, tiny charming place with very good quality of food and wines, they really know what they do. quality-price relation can't be better. excellent service and good vibes. highly recommended!
perfect and cozy tapas restaurant, delicious food and cava. absolutamente recomendado :-)
high 5 to this fabulous little place simply delicious 🤩deserves its mention in the times yesterday 🙌great job guys 👍

luckily i live next door so i don’t have to look far if i fancy something special:).
very nice place. friendly staff. local flavors made with local products cooked with passion - highly recommend.

a great place for have some drink and tapas. the food here is amazing and the place so cozy. mind that the bar is really small, so maybe you need to get there early or wait a bit. totally recommended.
amazing food, excellent atmosphere, lovely staff and service, and great value for money. highly recommended.
an all around lovely time. the tiny bar made room for our group of 8. service, food, drinks, and atmosphere were wonderful. 11/10 would recommend.
the best croquetas in barcelona! i've been here several times and i'm never disappointed by what's on the menu for that day or their wine collection.
loved this place - great service, great food, great ambience. small gem.

best kept secret in town.
amazing food ,wines , and service
tiny little bar with amazing food with a great wine selection. come early (19.00 or so ) to make sure you can grab a spot as the place fills up quickly!
delicious❤️ absolutely hidden gem of barcelona💎 food & wine of catalan is simply perfect and the staff is very friendly 👌
extraordinarily delicious, kindest staff, perfect meal. i will return to spain to eat here again
great restaurant. great wines and well price vs quality! amazing food.

original tapas. good combination of ingredients. small and cozy. you may have to wait about 15min to be seated.
good service
wonderful service and hospitality. delicious food with great wine selection. come early if possible and expect a local crowd.
amazing food and staff! small and cozy place for a nice dinner out..
superb spot. some of the best alioli i've had on bravas. the catalan wines were excellent as well
great food and the environment is awesome. the chef constantly updates the menu so there is always something fresh
was impressed by the flavors of this place. the sardine toast with confit tomato was out of this world good.
wow !! 2 amazing guys and amazing foods ! it’s cute, taste so good and the atmosphere is great !!
all round fantastic! one of my favourite places in barcelona. a real treat.
excellent, considered cooking in a very cool and relaxed setting. strongly recommended!
nice tapas. quality food like pubilla.
amazing food, nice staff, i highly recommand!
delicious wine and tapas in small local setting
very good and experimental tapas, very friendly service and very good music taste!
best tapas in town and the best people running this place!!
super local place with awesome food and great selection of wines...
best tapas and wine bar in bcn!
modern classy classic!
super good food and wines and lovely staffs.
this place is magical
small but very charming place. value for money a little too much for my taste although it was very good. we will repeat 👍🏾

10/10. bar restaurant ideal for those days when you decide to go to dinner at the last minute, they do not accept reservations.small and cozy place with an open kitchen and only 3 workers, shared tables, a must in barcelona. a relaxed place where things are done well.the sea and mountain scallop a 10 and the foie with chocolate bread another 10.

yesterday we went around 10:45 pm after the movie since we saw that it only closed at 1am. although who we believe was the owner treated us very well, it was not so much the girl who worked there. he wasn't in the mood to serve us food, he was rushing us to order.they ran out of bravery. and for 2 glasses of wine (not very big but delicious) and 3 tapas we paid €50. it seemed quite expensive to me. the quality of the food was good, i didn't think it was anything amazing either.

i had read a review that said that it was the typical small restaurant that you don't want to share because you don't want it to be discovered, it was difficult for me to decide to do the review for the same reason, but how to share is beautiful! if you go to gracia, be patient or go try the dishes at this fantastic place after hours, they don't make reservations. there were two of us and we made 4 dishes washed down with red wine from toro, and each one was better, tuna tartare taco, prawn and

they don't accept reservations, so go early to avoid running out of a table. it is not a place to eat something quickly: they take their time preparing the dishes, which are to be tasted and enjoyed quietly. everything was great and together with the good service, they make the experience a 10.
the original, varied and wonderful menu is all very delicious. the attention and variety of wines 10/10. it's always packed and you have to get there early to win a spot.
the food was phenomenally good! the tuna tartare with shiso in particular will stay in your memory for longer.

what a brilliant place:small bar in the gracia district - only about 25 square meters but a perfect atmosphere - super brilliant organic wines, delicious vermouth and perfect tapas that i have never found in this quality anywhere before. absolute insider tip - owner is the same as in la pubilla!!!

perfect bistro. the meals are very good, and the ingredients are clearly displayed in the display case. by the way, the handwritten menu has the recommendation of the day. there is also a wide range of wines available🤙🤙🤙

a wonder of a place. ideal for few people (from 2 to 4 people maximum). patience to find a table because they don't reserve and it's small. the friendliness of the service is the prelude to the quality you find in this spectacular place to share dishes. brutal croquettes, incredible chips, wonderful loin at a low temperature. everything spectacular. one of the best places in the neighborhood.

a good place to eat for its cuisine, but the place is not equipped for summer. ceiling fan for the entire premises. of course you choose to dine in that restaurant because of its kitchen, knowing that they have no air and that it will not be at the perfect temperature, what seems bad to me is that they turn off the fan without finishing eating to free up tables quickly, they should take care of those things. we didn't order dessert because we couldn't be in the place with such a temperature and

small and very nice place. very friendly and attentive service. the menu, which changes, is delicious but perhaps a little expensive and nothing very special. great variety of wines, they advise you very well

i know that many times it is rated with 5 stars simply because you liked “something”: but we loved everything and we ordered half a menu (it is small). the photos speak for themselves, the food is great, the guys are super friendly and watching them prepare your dishes right there while you have a little wine, is priceless (and we have spent very little). we got there because the restaurant we wanted was full and we thanked god because we discovered this charming place that we now have in the t

small place with a lot of charm, a lot of variety of wines and a short but quality menu, everything we ate was delicious and they have several dishes off the menu. friendly staff, we will be back to try more!
rich! small but bully! the menu is fun and everything is very very good, we will return!! good option in grace❤️
very small place, so it is recommended to go early because it fills up. the food is very good, few things but of quality. price correct quality. very good option for a tapas dinner.

very small place but very well used.very attentive service and very delicious dishes!!they have a great variety of wines.in the photos roast beef with parmesan and egg yolk, and winter salad with sardine.

small place, but very cozy. there is a good atmosphere. very good service, a very rich menu with small details with great flavor and quality. perfect for making tapas or vermouth. good wines, great variety by the glass. perfect price quality. for mandatory.
unique bar with a special menu that changes every week and never ceases to surprise. the food is simply spectacular. the attention and dedication of the chef and waiters is always exceptional.

very small place with little space. interesting portions, some better than others. let's say one but... a little small, you have to order several to start eating, and it ends up being quite expensive. in full grace. good atmosphere. maybe they're a little cocky sometimes.

very small place with uncomfortable stools. little variety of tapas, very expensive and small, €5 for bravas is an exorbitant price for 4 potato wedges that were nothing out of the ordinary either. variety of wines and correct service.
small bar with a varied menu of tapas and original dishes. the offer of wine by the glass is very extensive but they only have beer on tap from mahou.

great tapas at reasonable prices. small but very cozy place. it doesn't fill up at all (capacity for about 20 people). good selection of wines and some off-menu dishes that vary depending on the season. the rostit croquettes and the egg with sobrasada are recommended, as is the russian salad.

fantastic. the wait is a little long (almost 45' on a weekday night) but it is worth it. super well-executed “simple” dishes, the kind where you enjoy every bite. the staff is friendly and it's very cool that they cook everything in front of you in such a small space.the only “downsides” are that they didn't give us a wine list so we could choose calmly, and that there is a lot of smoke inside the place at times.we will return for sure
good music (classic rock, mostly spanish) drinks are reasonably priced
a good place for a party with spanish (no reggaeton!) if you go out without a plan ;) + cheap drinks
very good music and cheap drinks. but during the summer it´s impossible to stay inside.
nice site to listening punk rock music! friendly staff!
nice place to listen to good spanish rock
spanish rock and popular drinks
bon ambient i bona musica

excellent 100% spanish rock bar. from the moment you enter the bar you can feel the good atmosphere. it is relatively dark and well decorated. the prices of drinks are good for the sector, for example a pint of beer costs 4 euros. it's a very interesting concept since they only play rock of spanish origin, or at least that's how it was the night i was there. despite not knowing many of the songs, it was a great experience.

one of the worst bathrooms i have ever seen, but what to expect from a place like this.dirty, it smells horrible, there is no lock so you have to hold the door with your hand so no one can enter.for my cubata they served me expired orange juice.i will not come back

i usually go for my friends and i have alwaysgiven a bad vibe, plus there are men inside who say the mostmisogynist that crosses your mind (clients), they have called me 'pretty' at the end of a sentence in a derogatory tone for asking a worker a question. i understand that working at night is difficult and tiring, but i didn't say anything bad. i've given it several chances but i don't like the atmosphere at all, plus it's horribly hot.
typical marina bar, there is nothing more to add hahaha.always with good music, perfect for going out for a drink
the white label drinks they sell are poison for the body. very very bad not a song in catalan all night, by the way, not even asking for it.
i go very often and i always have a lollipop cocktail and play some games of foosball with my boyfriend and our friend. i had a great time and the music is very good

very hot. poor ventilation and a very unpleasant smell. it does not have air conditioning and the only air movement is with fans. the drink heats up quickly. the atmosphere is very cool if you like rock style.
it is a place where there is always good music and atmosphere i repeat whenever i can!

being a fairly small place i like what there is, the two bars are a good spot when it's full and the music (especially rock) seems great to me. you can drink at bar prices and dance like in a nightclub without paying an entrance fee. i recommend not missing the closing, which is always worth seeing.

i love it, the music is a journey through rock in spanish. the drinks, the staff, even the security are the best.the only thing i have to say against it is that i asked for a song when they told me they would play it, they didn't. there should be a time to request songs.otherwise the drinks and the atmosphere are great.

excellent experience!!if you like old spanish rock music it is your ideal place.at night the place is dark with some fluorescent lights, a large bar with drinks at a very good price and it has mini table football!!i went for the first time with my friend and i had a great time.(it's my friend's favorite bar)
if you like rock and such, the best bar in barna
the place is old and small, the bathrooms without latches. there is no air conditioning, too hot. but the waiters, the prices of the drinks, shots and the music are excellent!!
they accept restaurant tickets, i'm going to deduct €300 a year in kalimocho

pub/bar/disco that also has two foosball tables, if you go first thing in the morning you can play a few games quietly, later it is more difficult, it gets very crowded. the atmosphere is rock and somewhat gloomy, mainly spanish music. they serve cubalitros and up to a certain time you can also order it at a cubata price (€6 depends on what liquor you want)
i swear there was paper in the bathroom brother (good cubata)

one of my favorite places!! the atmosphere is great, with underground rock decor, black lighting and neon. very good music, generally bands in spanish. they have table football and the price of drinks is quite good.the best of all is the final performance!! recommended to stay until closing! you're sure to have a good time there!

really enjoyed it. when we returned home, we realized that we had lost our keys. we write an email. they answered us immediately saying they had the keys. we went to look for them. they had closed, but they opened the place and gave us the keys. they were very kind and friendly. thank you very very much.
very good atmosphere, good music, you have a good time and the people are very happy.
good music in spanish. extremoduro, barricada, héroes del silencio, marea...and a very good atmosphere. the waiters were very attentive and helpful.
bar with a lot of vibes and good music it's always fun to go but how hot my friend! put some air in because there aren't even windows 😅 the tkm. kisses

the place to be totally friendly, fresh cold beer, festive atmosphere at its best, good music, sometimes there are tickets to get a discount or a gift of a shot with a purchase. super recommended to have fun like hell!!!!!good prices, good everything. and dance, the coven is going to begin!!!

small place where they play classics and not so much varied national music (rock, pop, punk...). it has very good prices if you go early, in addition to having a very nice atmosphere.they always close with the song that gives its name to the place.
mandatory stop to go out partying in the marina area, drinks at a very good price, with offers until 12 midnight. good atmosphere and good music!
good place to have some drinks and some table football for lovers of spanish rock.

good bar, typical of marina, until 1 they have an offer of xxl cubatas for €5. if you go early you even have time to sit down, but later it is more complicated. it has one or two foosball tables. i would recommend the place

it's not bad, they play various national classics (rock, pop, punk...) and it has very good prices in addition to having a very nice atmosphere. what i miss is other music, but that's down to personal taste.very nice waiters!!!

spanish rock musical bar, if you stay until the end everyone sings a song written on the wall. the atmosphere is young but not very young. it is a very closed place so it can get very crowded and overwhelming.

joint. it's the word i give it, dirt, stuffy atmosphere, drinks in plastic cups. not too expensive drinks for 8 euros... and punk rock music. i ordered an absolut with lemon that tasted like lemonade, i think they taught him about alcohol. i'm not coming back

thank you for that saturday night.thank you for making me feel like it's every saturday.thank you for playing that music that reminds me so much of my place in madrid "el penta".thanks to that guy from the flyers, i said something wrong when i got out of such a mess i was in. "you are not to blame for anything" you are a very nice and super nice boy.thanks to that waitress who served me the shots without knowing what she said.thanks to the waiter who changed my first liter gin and tonic because
there was paper in the bathroom 100% real, 5 stars surprised

the music at the venue is incredible - excellent, the floors are too dirty and sticky, tables full of empty cubaliliter containers that have not been collected... on the dance floor there is a lot of humidity and a bad smell, they did spend some time cleaning, ventilating and clearing the tables. location would provide better service to customers.

i had a good experience, the cubatas are large and cheap, although the brand name drink had a different price. spanish rock music and no reggaeton or commercial music, it was the first time i went and i was comfortable
very good royo and the waiters are super friendly, and the music is very good!!
pleasant atmosphere with very good prices until 1am. cool style of music but they don't put any women with the thousands of examples out there in these styles.
a good bar to prep before going to razz to party. the white label cigars are cheap and they are cubaliliters, so it's very good to prep.
you can choose if the cubatas are branded or jugs. don't order cocktails, they are the ready-made ones and they are very bad.if you like the rock vibe it's cool.

i have been going for many years, and i think it is one of the best places in barcelona to have a drink on fridays, saturdays and holidays, good music and a very good atmosphere. if you like punk and spanish rock, this is your place🤘

the truth is quite good, on top of that they let you choose whether the alcohol is from a bottle or a brand name and the price depends on that! music wasn't 100% my thing... but that's just taste! the atmosphere is great and the pub is quite big!
it is very good to spend some time alone or with friends, the drinks are very well priced and there is an infinite variety of music
i didn't like the bar very much. the atmosphere was very good and so was the music. what i didn't like is that the cubalitres don't rise at all. it was like drinking coca-cola.
the waitress meri was super friendly, funny and patient with us when she served us! that there is football is also a puntazo!

everything is super cool, until i leave for a moment and the doorman tells me that i can't come in because i wasn't there before (a lie, i said that if i wanted i could show him photos from a few minutes ago inside the premises), he tells me that i was playing and he didn't like it.

i am a veteran of this joint in the marina area.what to say! very friendly and professional staff, both waiters and access controllers.cheap drinks and good offers.the only negative point is the bathrooms, which are always disgusting, even first thing in the morning. otherwise unbeatable!

nice place, fast service, but if you come to watch a match, e.greally, you have to order dinner or the waitress won't give you a table. burgers very good. only 3 stars for the first impression of the service.
one of the few places in the area that are saved ♥️♥️ by the music, by the atmosphere, by the laughter. really, sometimes i just go to marina to come here.

decent drink, nice place, but too much flamenco. i have nothing against that style of music, but it doesn't fit at all in a rock-goth environment. and the volume maybe too high to be able to talk at the tables
i don't like the music on the site but i give it 5 stars because all my friends were like that all night :d and that made me very happy. also cubalitro at €5
good environment. rock and punk bar, drinks at a very good price.
good atmosphere, spanish rock music and cubalitros €6/7

good varied music (without reggaeton🥳) and good atmosphere. very cheap drinks and some very good table football to snack on at the bar. it's a shame that during the pandemic they are not respecting the capacity😅

if you like rock in spanish you will like this bar. it is a less heavy "club" than it seems as soon as you enter. you can just as easily give it your all dancing as you can playing some games of foosball. before 1 o'clock, cubaliliters only cost approximately €7 (xxl cubatas, they call them). the drink is very well priced and you can choose if you want it brand name or cheaper. 100% recommended, especially before going to razzmatazz since it is very close.
very good atmosphere and economical!
the only bar that continues to maintain the essence of the marina. always full of friendly people. they have always treated me with fun and good vibes, even if they were saturated with work.

hijos de caín is the bar/pub par excellence. spanish rock, table football, great atmosphere and in the end, the meeting place for everyone when we go out to party. it is always a good opportunity to go drink a few beers and be with colleagues.

good bar to go to have the first drinks when you go out in marina. very good offers and the drink is good. too bad there is little place to sit and if you arrive a little late you have to stay standing.

a traditional rock joint🤘🤘🤘🤘you can drink some drinks at a good price, sing doorknob, play football, the waiters and staff treat you well. great rock atmosphere. you even do pogo when the level of euphoria is high.
the bar with the most atmosphere in barcelona, ​​for lovers of rock and good music. foosball, good prices and unbeatable atmosphere.highly recommended.
very good.if you like music in spanish it is ideal.it has good moments and some bad ones.more good than bad.very cool two-story place.with table football. and two bars
my favorite bar in all of barcelona. people actually enjoy the music and friendships there.

of all the places where you can have a drink and listen to music in the poblenou area, for me, the most authentic and where i find myself best listening to spanish rock music and drinking cigars.from the moment they open until one in the morning, xxl cubatas are available for the price of a normal one.it is appreciated that they ask you if you want to be served well-known brand drinks or "white label" alcohol......proof of honesty.

the place is good but it is brutally hot inside, there are people without masks drinking and the capacity is too much, there are too many people inside drinking without masks and without ventilation. i don't understand how the authorities can allow it.

do you want to spend a friday or saturday night and don't know what to do?hijos de caín is a good place to go with friends and enjoy a good atmosphere, the boys and girls who serve you are very nice and their prices are affordable for any pocket. it also has two table footballs to spend the night.
it's been years since i've been there...they play flamenco or songs like these now because it's really not cool. of course, the pr is a crack
i go almost every weekend but the heat and the smell, xd
good music, good atmosphere, good price, alcohol that you remember the next day...

the worst damn club i've ever been to, the stench of piss could be smelled from the bar and i'm not exaggerating, it was unbearably hot, i think it was over 40 degrees. you couldn't even breathe inside, people were going outside to avoid fainting...
we got a big surprise! small and cozy place with rock and alternative music at its best!

i do not recommend entry to anyone for this establishment, or at least during the covid-19 crisis, since at no time is it about having a policy regarding security measures (and at no time is the clientele encouraged to do it, of course), imposed by the ministry of health, therefore, even having a very good environment and even being something more pleasant than anything else, one must be clear about one's priorities.
nice little place to have a few cocktails, excellent sangria. ideal for starting the evening before moving to one of the clubs in the area.

very good . i already knew it. i would like to take this opportunity to announce that on december 21st there will be live music by two great groups who are doing quite well and in the near future they will be talked about a lot. i advise you not to miss them!!! free entrance  !!!!
well that's it, the same old thing, same palylist that they update every 10 years, but for a few beers it's a good time
good place, good music and good atmosphere, but it is extremely hot. that's why 3 stars.
the best bar in barcelona
it stands out for how dirty it is and the lack of chairs inside.the security staff at the door are unpresentable.the bathrooms are pitiful and super dirty. hasn't been cleaned in life
a pub where you can enjoy quality spanish rock music while playing table football and having a drink.
a little commercial, if cool people come in, they take away punk and metal
surprised, cheap alcohol until 1 and good music.it's been several weeks since i've taken friends to the bar, and everyone has enjoyed it.it's already a must on fridays!
good rock bar, with a perfect and familiar atmosphere. good prices. a place to go to spend a fun saturday night if you like spanish rock.i love
local with a very good atmosphere, rock music and very good prices.
if you are in barcelona and you like rock, you absolutely have to go to poblenou. some table football and some beers, good music and if you don't care, a shot awaits you at the hijos

great tapas at really good prices. the staff was nothing but friendly and polite. there is also an english/french menu. if you’re looking for a quick stop to eat something and go this is a good place to go. super fast service too. you must try the squid if you’re a fan!
this place was okayish. the tapas ans carne offer until 21:00 is fine. otherwise it wouldn't be worth the money. tapas are cooked without love.
i liked the service , valentina was a patient and a nice person ! i like the food . i felt at home .

it is a nice place with burgers and hotdogs. we loved one with guacamole and feta. prices are good and the guy was very friendly. our order was brought very fast.

another nice thing: this place is located on one of the nicest gracia streets.

we went yesterday night, we ordered potatoes with melt cheese it was super! hamburger xxl was fantastic!! its totally value for money!! i recommend it !!! when i will return to barca i will visit for sure!!!

very nice food and decorations of this restaurant.
100% recommended
the best food i have been it in badalona. and chef cook his very lovely and service very good the local is nice

i am a bratwurst and food lover and this place although looks nice and cozy it is far away from the quality.

we have noted that the owner did his best to buy cheap ingredients. me and my girlfriend have ordered 2 bratwurst and we we're very disappointed by the quality of the bread. it was the frozen one and not natural leavened, as well as the sauces didn't contain anything special.

i wouldn't recommend this place, although the owner was nice and he was carefully listening to my complaint.

you can get a small drink and a tapa for €3.
lovely service

cosy, friendly, fast and really good food! for only €61, we (4 pers.) had 2 drinks each and our bellies were full.

also, the staff was very friendly! and the food was coming very fast after we ordered! my compliments to the staff, the kitchen and the owner. well done.
súper nice place! the is absolutely great and the service is super kind! don’t give the 6 stars because the software doesn’t allowed me 👌
pretty tasty for the price. staff was very nice and it was good customer service. worth a stop if the menu looks good to you!
the bread could be a bit more toasted, it was a bit gum-like, the rest pretty good. don't expect gourmet food and you'll be fine, nice to take a bite
nice barrio place for a quick bite, or to watch a football game having a beer with something to eat.

great food, all fresh and clean.
tasty burgers you should get there 😋👌
you want a hot dog this is the place you need to come they'll add anything you want in it my kids love it
the staff is super friendly the chief is amazing he served delicious food!!! coming again for sure
the best food ever and super fast. amazing price actually to cheap.
delicious tapas for a pretty much nice prices, great and friendly service 🥰
great tapas, prices and friendly service - what more could you ask for?
average hotdogs but good place to gran a quick bite or watch a football match
really bad food. it was as if everything was made a day in advance and put in microwave just before serving.
i ate lunch with my colleague there it was nice and awesome
great value for money and nice service.. totally recommended.
cheap local place for hotdogs, burgers are also good.
amazing food and great prices
very bad behavior
value and quality in a friendly atmosphere.
they charged us €5 for 5 pieces of finguers, the scrambled eggs, the undercooked potatoes and the bacon. the kitchen could use a wipe.

local that leaves a lot to be desired, cold food, dirty local.a very simple deal, the kitchen visible to the entire public and dirty on top of that.they have charged us €5.50 for this “fingers” cover, 5 small-sized fingers at an exorbitant price.
pretty regular place. the tapas bordering on approved and the burger cold.
they serve quickly and the quality-price ratio is reasonable. we paid €12 per head for sandwich, potatoes, drink and a bottle of wine

our holiday started and ended here! from day 1 we received a very nice and friendly welcome and every time we came by in the evening for our last beer of the evening, there was an exuberant wave and our beers were almost ready! what nice people!! we have never asked your names, but we baptized them "frank" 😜 thanks for a nice time!!

for years we have known this safe enclave of tapas cuisine and something else at a more than reasonable price. very close to the verdi cinemas, on the street of the same name, it invites us to go to frankfurt verdi where tapas are the important thing, despite having the famous sausages in their different versions on their menu.four adults and two children went to enjoy a meal based on chicken croquettes, padrón peppers, and patatas bravas as starters to share. all to the liking of those present
dark place and with a lack of cleanliness especially the ceiling, the food and the very correct moroccan boy and the decoration of the. curious place

the best restaurant in gracia without a doubt! the best sandwiches, the best cocktails and the owner of the place is very friendly. we were a group of 10 people and everything was super good and super fast. thank you, we will return a thousand times.

it is a very nice bar, very tidy and informal at the same time. young like the owner "milan", a nice turkish guy who prepares excellent cocktails at competitive prices. the mojito is really good. the food is also very good and even the rich sandwiches are light.

fast, attentive and very friendly service.the place is narrow, but cozy... i like the table barrels.value for money is not bad, although i can't give much opinion as it is my first time going.we will return to try some tapas that we have seen and i will tell you...
a place without any pretensions. wide variety of frankfurters, hamburgers, tapas... good beer on tap.very good in the treatment and attention.

good value for money on verdi street. almost the only place open after midnight, it saved our dinner, since the theater ended late.the place is not the most charismatic in the world, but the attention and the food are worth it.

i went to dinner for the first time the other day with the family.and we left delighted.very good treatment and good food.you can't ask for more from a frankfurter.homemade bravos, one for soft ones, but homemade.the rest is perfect. good frankfurt, burgers, chicken fingers... all very correct and good.i will be back for sure.

the manager of the place is arrogant, once he didn't want to give me change for tobacco and had bad manners.another time i ordered a portion of potatoes to take away which was a joke and when i told him that there was a small amount on top he hesitated.don't worry, i won't return to your place, my testimony is real and you are rude.
