if you want to dance to latin music, meet people and have a good time while drinking mojitos, this is the right place.the attention is very good and i assure you that you will have a great time.the only bad thing is the heat, the place usually fills up to capacity and so many humans in one place enjoying life usually produce a lot of heat.the atmosphere is very good, there are dancers of all levels and i guarantee that if what you are looking for in gracia is where to dance here you will not st
a good place to dance and hang out. good environment

a different, small and beautiful place. they teach dance, there are shows and live music. there is flamenco, salsa and rumba depending on the weekdays. they mainly make salsa. entry is free. prices per person vary around 6-10 euros on average. i'll be alone in the gracia area😁
folkloristic, latin and traditional, there is always beautiful local music and people dancing

pufff, i'd rather go to a club and dance a little bit of everything that will cost me less than a drink in this place!!!!! paying 5 euros for a heineken beer and hot on top of that... what a disaster, i wouldn't return to this place.

an authentic place and good live music and dancing. good cocktails.the bad thing about it is that it is a small place and sometimes they let too many people in, this means that the bar is always full of people, it is very hot (what i highlight the most) and there is little space to dance or be comfortable.
i went for the first time, frankly i wasn't very hopeful!  but amazing atmosphere, songs music everything was so good!  i would definitely recommend strongly.  🐙🐙🐙

went for the paco moreno concert. venue way too small for the amount of people here. sell less tickets that way people don't have to be pushed and shoved around when there's an act performing. absolutely ruined the evening
a good, genuine live music venue that puts on interesting acts. a rare thing in this city.

hipsterism in gracia!

funny place where to have some drinks and hear non-main-stream live music. it's a must if you are hanging around in gracia.

prices are friendly!
excellent drinks. great atmosphere. outstanding pretentious show. what more can you want.
very small but good music
one of the coolest spots in town, check out the indie concerts and the excellent jazz jam session.
good atmosphere and overall pretty nice bar with good music.
great vibe and danceable tunes

amazing music bar ,    nice live shows ,
good music
brutal
a very welcoming venue for small concerts. at night there is a very good atmosphere and the staff is very friendly!

i was surprised that they have expanded the premises a lot. i hadn't gone in a while (several years). i can't comment on the catering service because i only went to see a concert and didn't consume anything, but i loved the atmosphere and the acoustics.

we've been there a million times and it's always great but suddenly a few months ago it seems impossible to get in, it's always full and the doorman tells us rudely. this didn't arrive at 1 or 2, today it wasn't even 12... the truth is that it's a shame :(
small concert hall with the stage at ground level, not very practical.

this bar should be closed now, the doormen are disgusting, classist and disrespectful. literally the selection to enter is at your discretion. they don't show (like all places) the count of people in the bar.

good place, good music and good waiters. the only discrepancy is the goalkeepers. i understand that they are insertion workers, they help the workers but not the clients. these are mentally handicapped goalkeepers. at least the company saves on taxes by hiring mentally retarded people. win the insertion, lose the business.

the place is small but curious and famous in barcelona for being a venue for nearby concerts, where you can almost feel part of the groups that play due to how limited the space is. the selection of artists is very good and the people who come respect the performances and participate in them, making it a perfect place to enjoy live performances, although the sound quality, being a space that is not acoustically conditioned, can be greatly improved. an important point to keep in mind is that the

the guard at the door and the owner are homophobic, they saw me from head to toe and told me not even a pretty girl can come here, but a guy like you! a disgusting place, better quality of people at your door.
legendary concert hall in the middle of the gràcia district

super fun!we met a lot of nice people, so nice that i lost my phone and whoever found it (thanks a million) gave it to the staff in case its owner showed up (me😬✌🏽)we danced until the party was over 👯‍♀️…the staff is very friendly… dealing with people who are having fun on holidays can't be easy, thank you for your patience and kindness!you are very nicethanks for everything we had a great time!😁🫶🏽
tremendo bar, the waiters are beautiful and the moscow mule is very good, you have to try it!
the place is cool, but going to a concert and not being able to see anything because there are too many people for what the venue is, well, frankly, terrible.

i went to heliogábal to have a few drinks because it's a musical bar and i loved it.it's super cozy, the staff is phenomenal and the live music is incredible. i have decided that this is not the last time i go.
a very welcoming and familiar place, live music and great musical concerts
well located small venue, decent sound quality and friendly staff. the only bad thing was the capacity, after twelve there was no room

i went to paco moreno's concert tonight and there were a lot of people for the limited space of the place, constant pushing in front and behind, 0 respect from the gentlemen with mustaches and adidas sambas who surrounded me, i left after 10 minutes.
the place is super cool, the concerts are fairly intimate and cozy thanks to the place
spectacular. also, the bouncers, great guys!
i love helium and the security guards are the most, super nice (:
great atmosphere to see lesser known groups but with incredible potential
it would be nice if the doorman didn't blow his cigarette smoke in your face when he tells you that the venue is full.
excellent music and a pleasant atmosphere.
special and very beautiful and close concert. we went to see ferran capdevila. a 10
top place to see concerts by emerging artists in the front row.
good music bar to go for a drink.there are days when they play live music.
good bar with good music, it is a small environment but they control the capacity. the only thing i would suggest is to have a variety of drinks. friendly staff!
this place is a disgrace, the doormen are rude, close it now. 🤮🤮🤮

very close concerts in a very small place. we watched "drug holiday."good catalan-speaking attention from the waiters, something we find essential to return.canes at €2.50, i thought it would be cheaper.

good atmosphere and good music, although the second could improve a lot, but the worst of all is that it is a very small bar and it starts to get packed, it is a huge, so, in capital letters, there are almost no tables or places to sit, not even shelves or something to put down the glass, a real asshole sit
"great" place to see a concert in the most intimate way you can see, good acoustics, and as long as it's not live, the music is also up to the mark 👍👍👍

the residents of heliogabal are all tired from never being able to sleep. unlike the other music bars in the neighborhood, they do not try to contain or dilute the flow of people standing on the street at any time of the night and especially any day of the week, including sunday! the annoyance due to shouting and chaos is permanent, and amazing, seeing how in other places they ask us to leave to go out to smoke and talk very quietly. zero respect and empathy. there must be some mafia or friends

hello good night. i'm already at home, writing this review. today, i finally decided to do this review, rating heliogabal. i like it a lot, because you don't have to pay anything, mainly. also, because i can go out to smoke whenever i want and come back in without queuing, even though i had to queue today. the music sometimes accompanies and sometimes not, today it did accompany. recommended to everyone.
mother and son at the bar. endearing people.
both as a bar and as a concert hall, it's a place to feel at home. the staff is very friendly and there is a very good atmosphere

hethe atmosphere is great, live indie music artists are always performing, cozy place... cold drinks, clean bathrooms, very good treatment from the staff; both the concierge and the bartender are very friendly and attentive, young and old contemporary people living together united by music and art.in conclusion, a great place for cool people.
nice place if you like to live like the locals and escape the tourists. great playlist.

without a doubt, one of the most legendary bars among the alternative scene of grace. the perfect place to go have a few drinks on weekend nights listening to good music and enjoying the atmosphere. even so, don't expect to sit down, the place is small and usually gets very crowded. the prices are affordable.
bar, concert venue, emblematic of barxelona. small but cozy, you have the experience of having the artist by your side, the feeling is very close.
bigutillu atmosphere with star foam
they rob you and you can't be safe. a shame

emblematic concert hall and drinks venue in the gracia neighborhood.the program is full of emerging bands and the occasional established group from the national and international scene.the hall does not have a stage itself and the capacity is very small, which makes the concerts really close and special. you have to see them standing.the acoustics are correct for the type of venue and it depends a lot on the strengths of the band for it to sound good.the drinks during the concert are not expens

this is one of the musical bars par excellence in the city of barcelona. they really have a very careful musical offering and the atmosphere created at the concerts (although it is hard to believe at first glance) is great: very good sound and closeness with the artist.as a bar, when there is no music, it is quite good, it is usually filled with people and the background music is acceptable. it may get too crowded at times, but it's worth stopping by for a drink if you're in the neighborhood.th
summary: goalkeepers suck.

clearly, one of the most magical places in gràcia. not only because emblematic groups have played there when they were not yet known, such as manel or amics de les arts, but because even today interesting groups or singers appear there. the beer is not very expensive and the only problem is the limited capacity due to covid
a bar where you can enjoy live music while drinking.if you can't decide what to drink, we recommend the moscow mule! if you want to have fun while drinking in barcelona, ​​please check it out!
excellent place to meet friends and enjoy a drink in a comfortable atmosphere. cooking place and good service.
will johnson intimate and close 👌🏽
handsome waiters and porters!!
very good, live music, enthusiastic audience. it is thankful after all the time that these shows could not be held in small committee.

legendary place in barcelona where you can hang out and listen to good music, whether live or live.the place is small and due to local regulations they have limited the capacity and it depends on which event you can stay outside.the downside of these places frequented by "trendies" is that the drinks are too expensive for my taste.
people come out drunk and shouting without any respect for the neighbors ... at a quarter to three! and we'll see until what time!
the place is small but cozy, the people are very nice and you find the best of gràcia with music that accompanies and cheers you up. what more can you ask for? 100% recommended
one of the best bars in barcelona with a very varied music scene

the good things come in small jam. the heliogabal is the temple of the moderns of gràcia, the city and the countryside... but it is tiny. i don't know what the capacity is but 70 people, if they fit, are very tight. however, the cultural and musical offer is always at the forefront and the gin and tonics are affordable. it's a good place to go for a drink after dinner in gràcia and immerse yourself in barcelona's hipsterism. one of the outstanding venues in the catalan capital, without a doubt.
quite overrated, always full and not much special apart from the good atmosphere.i'd say it's dead on, but if you like crowds and are a complete hipster you'll love it.

ideal place to model your best hipster clothes and meet great unknowns from the cream of current and not-so-current catalan pop music. its red walls where works of art by great local artists who are friends of the waiter on duty or second cousins ​​of the owner's friends are hung, exert a hypnotizing effect on whoever visits them. you can enjoy excellent intimate concerts and often entire nights of good music. its best time is after 1 am.
small but cozy bar, with live music.in my case we went to see gala nellvery advisable to listen to it.
best music and concert bar in the city without a doubt!!!!!
good place, good atmosphere and live music, what more could you ask for.
best programming, great music with friendly staff!!!mandatory stop
the concerts there are always special. you can trust the programming with your eyes closed.
one of the few venues in barcelona that offers live country music

being able to have a few drinks, in a small and very cozy place, where there are many live performances, from jazz jam sessions, scattered music, and poetry nights, make heliogàbal a place of reference in gràcia.

mecca of the great new catalan musical groups. here you can see some of the best concerts in the city. and no one would say so, because the place is small, and with the occasional column that disturbs the view. but we don't know why, we repeat it and repeat it.

we went to see a live performance. the place is very good and the prices are reasonable. the location is perfect, in the heart of gracia. the service wasn't the friendliest around but there were so many people that perhaps it wasn't representative of the day to day.
the staff is friendly and the place is really cool and nice, we will be back!

helium is a must for culture and good vibes, if you don't know it, you haven't known the true spirit of the neighborhood. it is much more than a bar, it is a cultural venue with concerts. simply great.
good place to listen to live music and drink craft beer.

one of barcelona's alternative music venues. it has a very good selection of bands and drinks at a good price, however, sometimes it is too small for the amount of people who come to certain concerts.
small, but cool music. it would be cool if they improved the sound system.
soporific and soporific music. it makes me want to cut my wrists. the beer is good. according to a colleague, this used to be cool. if those
what a cute bar! the staff was amazing and i loved the olive in the aperol, never tasted such a yummy olive 🫒 thank you

cute bar in a lively square in gràcia. they have a terrace with heaters so you can sit outside, even in february. there’s a good selection of very reasonably priced drinks and a handful of food options, all of which were delicious. to top things off, the waitress was an absolute gem. we’ll be back!
a great place to visit for a spritz! lovely woman manager who we chatted to during our visits. definitely worth a visit to sit outside for a drink on the square.

we where there for a drink in the terrance, the atmosphere is great. the girl took a bit long to take us the order but she was kind and friendly. the olives are super good and the bar inside has a nice style. prices a bit high but its common because of the area around the plaza.

our waitress cintia was amazing! she accommodated us in the terraza even though was a busy sunny saturday, fast service, she was always smiling and attentive, nice tapas and drinks 🍹 highly recommended 10 stars ⭐️
friendly, quick and good. despite all tables were booked the staff managed to give us a seat. the provided food was great and the beer was cold. thanks for a nice evening

this was one of my favorite bar experiences, the owners were super sweet and the atmosphere of the bar was 10/10 very aesthetically pleasing. please come here, it’ll be worth it! thank you martina & sercio, until next time!
excellent atmosphere, well made drinks, the best bar in gracia! the bar staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, visit if you can!

we were waiting with our 3 year old for a table and asked the waiter for a table. he told us they can't do list for terrassa and than a girl came and smiled the waitress so he just gave the first free table to her saying she asked before. we saw her she came after us and told but he said just he is sorry.
whyyyy????
affordable prices. aperol spritz 4 euro, olives 2.5, chips 1.8 euro. attentive staff, nice atmosphere.

great location - plaza del sol - but the wait staff treats foreigners like absolute scum. if you are catalan, you can come here without an issue. tourists and anyone living here who isn’t born and bred “spanish” should avoid.
fantastic atmosphere and prices
the ideal place for some proper italian drinks in barcelona
fun sprits bar, dog friendly, and the sweetest bartenders. cozy interior with live bands at time at well.
my favourite place in plaza del sol. the food is amazing, service is the best
brilliant place with super friendly service, excellent cocktails and a great play list.
you can pay with bitcoin here, the first money that can not be faked! thank you so much for supporting a world in freedom and peace.
great place. tasty, friendly
i really like this bar. they have a great selection of aperols and similar drinks for super affordable prices. they are also super friendly and the place is very cool, i like the decoration.

they open the bar, empty terrace 0 people and a group of 8 goes to sit down and have a drink and they tell us that they do not accept groups of more than 6 on the terrace which is not possible. they fill the tables with 2 people and run out of our consumption, which would have been cocktails and not water/infusion. these types of absurd policies are inexplicable guiris of the staff that serve us that we do not understand.owner: don't you know that 8 people consume more than 2-3??solution sailor

we went on a saturday night, and although we had to stop by a couple of times to ask if they already had space, the second time the four of us were able to get in.a cozy place where you can have a drink without shouting and without having to dodge other people's arms and elbows.the prices of the drinks are quite low.

i came once and i liked it especially with regards to the prices which are more similar to italian places. the following times it was difficult because they have four tables in a row in a very busy square in the neighborhood. this time unfortunately they didn't seat us even though the place closed 30 minutes later. even though we had been waiting for a while, the waiter decided to seat a group of kids who had just arrived. really kind! :(

on saturday we went to dinner on the terrace. we were 2 people and we sat outside and then a table with 10 people sat next to it. the girl saw it and attended first to the table of 10 and they told us that we couldn't sit down because they had 1 couple waiting. we told them that we had been seated before the other table and they still kicked us out. very bad treatment by the waitress.
aperol is the common denominator and clear protagonist of this well-located and decorated bar. with very reasonable prices and very good service.

we were drinking original italian style apperol made with prosecco. well-poured glass, with popcorn to accompany (free included per drink). the service was super nice and friendly, the place was clean, tidy, with the perfect noise level and a good air conditioning system inside. i recommend it!!
nice bar located in plaza del sol de gracia. very good campari and aperol spritz. the staff is very nice and very fast in service.
good vibes and good prices. the place is very cool. ideal for having a drink with friends. they also have options to snack on something. fast and friendly service.
everything was great, camilla took great care of us and made our afternoon an experience to repeat!
we went as a group to celebrate a birthday and we had a great time, they treated us with kindness and affection (and patience). the food was pretty good
emblematic place in gràcia, the placa del sol. good service, run by a very nice italian woman. volldamm or turia on the terrace €3.50, maybe a little expensive.

excellent place, specialist in spritz (very refreshing italian drink). the attention from the waiters is very good. excellent service and great kindness when serving. a little difficult to choose a place to consume but not impossible. recommended!
very warm, quick and efficient welcome. everything was good. i recommend. the place is very pleasant, especially in the sun. i will come back for sure

one of my favorite places. there is always a good atmosphere, whatever the time.i love olives, nachos, pizzas and everything they have.the spritz is on another level and the pressurized wine.... ufffffff.... to die for!a must visit if you are in the gracia neighborhood!

very nice bar located on the nicest square in barcelona. 4.5 euros per spritz. the gin and tonics are great and very well served (from 6.50 to 10 euros). the service is very friendly and the menu is stuck on the table. small downside for the rather average nachos.
i went for the second time, at praça do sol. very pleasant place. there's spritz, but there's craft beer.

i went with a group of more than 10 people for a birthday. the waitress has treated us as if we were a problem for her, asking for orders as if she were a general of a small army at war. everyone's feeling was that instead of taking advantage of the orders of 10 people, they were almost annoyed. in the end he realized and apologized for the treatment, but i still think it would be important for the owner of the establishment to know that these things happen because many of us wanted to order mo
i really like this place. from time to time i go to have a drink and chat with colleagues. it is really nice

the atmosphere in the square is very lively, the waiter is friendly, attentive and pleasant. they have prossecco on barrel imported from italy, very hard to find! i would say that the brave ones are also a reinterpretation, but good ones!
well... let's see it's a bar where you can have a drink with friends, nothing special

the spritz did not have gas, in fact i asked him if they had made it with white wine. the regular potatoes and blue cheese sauce had no flavor. a 10 for the boy who served us, very friendly. i understand the low price of the drink, but i would pay more if they served the spritz in your glass and with its original recipe, considering that the bar is called spritz bar.
the bar has a nice decoration and they give you nachos with your beer. the ceiling of the bar is very high and gives a comfortable atmosphere. the music is pop.

best place we've found for aperol spritz!! (i would say that they now sell them for €4,50 in the interior). the service is very friendly, there are always people, especially on the terrace when the heat starts! the music, for my taste, generally too loud and a bit strange, but if you go there with friends at night, you don't care. there are plenty of other drinks and nibbles, like fries with blue sauce or a really good meatball patty. they will continue to see us!!

very nice place, few tapas but quality, great cocktails at affordable prices, very familiar atmosphere, with a very popular terrace!! they hold events and private parties!! place with good music, what else can i say!! excellent
excellent place to have a drink. the music is not so loud, so it is possible to chat!
good atmosphere, very nice waiters and the drink at a reasonable price for the area it is.

excellent place with a very good terrace, affordable price, recommended to spend a good afternoon with friends, the girl who served us was fantastic, thank you matilde, i would definitely return to this bar, i would only review the bravas that were somewhat different, but everything excellent

the bar is very cute and fun to have a mid-afternoon drink. the italian waitress served us great and was super fast, she was attentive to everything. economical prices, or at least compared to other cosmopolitan cities.

an unmissable place on this famous square... so much so that you will have to wait a little if you want to get a table on the terrace! the atmosphere is great and the staff takes great care of you.an address that is worth a detour, particularly for these inexpensive tapas and beers, but above all a special mention for the best mojitos in barcelona ❤️ you can go there with your eyes closed, it’s the ideal address for a drink on the terrace.
kamoma is a place where, as an italian, i feel at home. plaza del sol is beautiful and the atmosphere is always great. great spritz, great guacamole, good music, impeccable service.
good drinks at a good price. cintia the waitress was super nice and friendly. few food options (enough for a bar) but delicious.
camila and luca are an incredible team. super professional and pleasant. the atmosphere was great and so were the drinks! highly recommended

i give it 5 stars for its sprit and good service. the place is nice and cozy. it has a good variety of cocktails that are very well prepared and at a not bad price. i recommend it to those who are spritz lovers.
exquisite aperol and the attention of the girls is great. very good atmosphere
there is always a lot of good vibes in the place. the girls who serve are super attentive. the beautiful atmosphere and decoration
good bar, good music, good price and good spritz!

good drinks at a very good price. they have a terrace overlooking the square and the interior of the place is super comfortable. every time i have gone they have treated us very well. the food menu is minimal, it is more of a bar to drink and snack. i don't recommend the pizza at all, the rest of the menu is fine.
great interior. our cocktails were very good!

very good spritz, good vermouth and the incredible margherita pizza! highly recommended to have a few drinks in plaza del sol, the staff is super attentive and they do everything possible to make you feel comfortable.
very bad service, with your hand in your pocket... las bravas 5 euros, very few, boiled and with raw mayonnaise... never again!

the food was very delicious but above all the attention of the staff. the girls were super nice, i think they were 2 italians and a girl from here. they asked us at all times if we were okay and made recommendations. i will definitely return for the attention. greetings!
excellent attention from the staff. good food and the place is nice inside.
very friendly staff, wide variety of alcoholic drinks and very cozy ambient music.
small bar where they serve delicious cocktails at low prices. the aperol spritz is 4.50 euros.you can also snack on tapas.
the owner is fantastic and the spritz is excellent with the different tastes. when i return to barcelona i will definitely stop at kamomo
nice terrace in authentic week. delicious drinks and accessible delicious tapas on a nice square. good and friendly service.

there were 7 of us at a table on the terrace, one more person arrived and there were free chairs, they did not let him sit, explaining that they could only form tables of 4 people. when we asked for explanations, they first told us that if the police came they would have a problem. later, a worker came out and in a not very pleasant tone told us that she had many tables waiting inside and that her boss wanted to rotate tables. in short, they have invited us to leave, making a meaningless excuse
i'm italian and it's amazing to find a place where a spitz costs the right amount and is made very well!

our experience at kamoma has been fantastic, we have contacted diego to celebrate the signing of our wedding with our closest friends and he has prepared a special package for us that we have all enjoyed very much, the great food, the excellent bar and the luxury service. 100% recommendable!
beautiful site! we go often after work, the girls are very attentive and the atmosphere is top!

place more or less well laid out, the prices for a pub are normal, the background music quite, quite normal, at a good level, does not interfere at all to talk. there are two waitresses, one has a very bad mouth, at the beginning when we entered, and the place was very empty, when we went to ask for a second round of views, she charged us for the first and the second, and she made a mistake twice in an order of six things, instead of bringing 6 drinks he took 5, then, of the gin and tonics we o

it shows that the site has changed management. the atmosphere is much brighter and the music is great! it is a highly recommended place to have a drink. the waitresses and waiters always have a smile on their face and are super attentive. they also have super good tapas, and very good value for money.brilliant!
icute charm and very good service
we went with friends to have a drinknice bar...
always perfect atmosphere! very good service and very good vibes, especially a waiter named juan! we will repeat for sure since we live nearby
suggestive locationexcellent quality of alcoholthe guys who work there are very nice
very nice place. good music sounds. it has live shows and is very well located in front of the plaza del sol.the spritz tool is 4 euros.

nice place in plaza del sol where you can go and drink with friends, i give three stars because after consuming a lot, it seems it wasn't enough for the managers and they kicked us out of the table if we still hadn't consumed it and the place closed in half an hour.. what ways
place to have your spritz. from the creator of el blau, you will find an italian point with a very good atmosphere :)
excellent service, super friendly waiters and bartender. very good prices. the spritz are delicious and the food is not far behind. the potatoes with blue sauce cream are very good

totally overpriced, small portions. small portions, very high prices. an example is meatloaf. they served us a tiny bowl with 5 meatballs without any garnish and it cost us 5.50 euros. it's the typical tapa that would be free in granada...i know this is barcelona, ​​but there is a middle ground.
excellent aperitifs at reasonable prices, informal and eclectic environment.
the girl who welcomed us (cinzia💙) is super courteous and hospitable, and fidel's moijto is top notch!!!! compliments!!!!
i always go for the aperol spritz!!! for now the only place that doesn't charge me at the price of a drink since it's not a drink itself!!
good place for cocktails
cocktail bar with a good atmosphere, very attentive, friendly and professional staff. highly recommended.
excellent service from the waitresses, very good cocktails, correct price and they give you some details to snack on, i will return when i am in barcelona
great aperol spritz and a very fair price! delicious potatoes, excellent service.
super friendly waiters, normal prices and quality drinks!!
good bar, service 10, the waitress a 10 super gentle and attentive cinzia, each drink a tapa and it is super cheap i recommend it
4€ per spritz so great deal! only problem, the decoration and a little sad inside but otherwise good atmosphere and good staff!
i loved it, the place has it all, a very good atmosphere, a great menu of drinks, tapas and desserts... and the best of all, is the attention you receive.highly recommended.
an evening shared with people, speaking italian.
i didn't like it, that there were animals (getting in the way) otherwise and to be honest you deserve at least 4 stars, very friendly and very helpful staff, quick attention, everything very good
good drinks and tapas at a good price. very friendly people, check if there is a party because it is even better.

the pub is spacious with ample room inside, featuring long tables that are perfect for large groups. they also have numerous screens of various sizes where they can project matches. the menu includes beer, cocktails, and food options such as burgers and sandwiches.

drink towere were cool but i can not say the same about the taste of it. sangria had a very strong taste of alcohol that i didnt like. nachos came with almost nothing, just chips, cheese and guacamoles. bravas were okay and wings too. i was not amazed with this place. prices were okay, not very expensive. if you want to get wasted you can go there
it’s a go to ! perfect for big groups, the ambiance is nice and friendly
huuuge place! great food, (huuuge) beer. it's more party than evening dinner. absolutely recommended.

*must have a mask to walk-in*
what a spectacular party venue for anyone looking to socialize with your friends, or if you’re feeling bold, mingle with any nearby parties sitting by you. the beer was fairly cheap & big, & the free popcorn was not stale.

their big mug san miguel beers are about 4 euros, craft beers like brutus beers are about 6 euros (pictured, tasted like an american budweiser), & their gallon pitchers of san miguel are 35 euros.

a great atmosphere that can be both chill & fun!

perfect place to watch a football game!! very big with big screens.
and by football i mean real european football!
but i absolutely not recommend their food. unless you want to spend your night on the toilet.
it's really disgusting and poorly done.
all the ingredients comes from mercadona, nothing is home made. and it gives you diarrhea.
amazing place! these guys reallyyyy enjoyed 15l of sangria
best patata sbracare, the food in general is really good. sangria good, i recommend also taking the 5 liters of beer or sangria.
full ! please book a table! nice place to go with friends and have some beers !! but call ahead cause it’s always full! ❤️

this is a great spot for groups, the place is huge and has bench seating. we went as a party of 10 and pre booked the table (which i highly recommend as the place gets very busy) and we all had a great night. they also have pool tables upstairs!

great place to drink but the food services is quite abysmal, 1 hour for three sandwiches while the other clients that order after us got their orders before us. communication is also quite poor if not cold.

good for watching sports games. it was a party for super bowl.

love the long table brewery vibes.

perfect place for beers and good company. fun and cool atmosphere. mostly for younger people or people with a young souls. 🌝 list of places so if you are a big company go there and get a long table. even though it was big it easily hot full. 💃iy was lacking the music of bad gyal though.
a really big place in a quiet zone. mainly attended by local people. one of the main characteristics is the really good drinks and atmosfere.

nice restaurant bar. the menu is good. price versus quality it’s good. the attention isn’t excellent but isn’t bad too. it’s a huge old industry space in barcelona so the interior of the bar it’s so cool.

really cheap place to drink something before the party. you can go in big groups. the place is huge. music is good. you can buy from beer to cocktails and other stronger drinks. the bathrooms were ok. i didn't try the food.

huge place. i was there as part of a very large group, maybe over 200 people and the venue seemed to cope just fine. we had a fixed taps menu which was tasty and well presented. big tanks of beer and sangria on the tables, so no wait for drinks.
it's a pub cum bar with really good music where you can chill out with your friends and sometime or the other there are different activities going on, in this pub.

we just came out after drinking one beer. the bar was empty, monday night. we came in and the waiter wasn't really polite, my brother asked for a tap beer and i for a franziskaner, they server mine withou a glass, a weissbier is always served with a glass, making me fhink that the staff doesn't know a thing about beer. we asked for nachos, the food was good and the place was nice, but they didn't even gave us napkins. the waiter was kind of rude. the kept staring at us. i went for a smoke, the b
very good tapas for the price! big and wide place, good music and you can always find a company if one needed...
great bar to drink beer, talk, play or even dance! very kind staff!

this place gets crowded. it’s a really big space and there are a lot of tables but if you don’t make a reservation i think you won’t find a table for a big group. they have fusbol tables on the second floor and music is ok. i don’t think i would come back because it’s just not my style but my friends loved it.

place is in old industry building, except that everything else is mediocre, the do not have more than 2 two draft beers!! (they didn't even had their own beer so only one when i visited...) they do have imported bottled ones, but that is not the reason to visit this place, if you like san miguel piss then go ahead.

me, my friend and our 2 girlfriends managed to find a place for four people empty and we let our girls there when we were in the bar for ordering the drinks.

meanwhile, the group next to our girlfriends started to harrass them to take our seat when we were absent and even one of the girls in this group slapped one of them.

no need to say we could not stay impassible.

but the security guards intervened and they prefered to listen the lies of the group telling them this seats was from them and

food is good, cheap and tasty. it is a young peoples place, so fokus is on the great beer and socializing. i would not recomend going there for a quiet dinner, and being 58 i'm not sure i'll return there often.... wonder if they sell out of house?
cheap-ish drinks and huuuuge place. worth a visit when you’re in barcelona. head upstairs for a second bar with a cool overlook.

the most racist place in barcelona, stay away. if you really want to have a nice evening stay away from this place.
first we got aggressed by other guests who started mocking and saying  “are you guys speaking spanish or chinese?”
the security guards do nothing, be sure you will not get protected if there will be any problem.

terrible experience. visited it after a while because it has become a tourist trap. terrible, overpriced beer and awful service. out of 4 people working the downstairs bar, only one waitress was actually attending customers with an arrogant, unprofessional attitude. will try my best not to come back.

great place , lot of young and international people, cheap drinks!

love to go, huge space also for dancing

used to be a fun place we visited weekly in 2017. went back this year, but service has changed. we did not get an explanation as to why we weren’t allowed in, but seems they prefer local guests now. unfortunate as it used to be a great establishment!
awesome place for drinks and the food is great as well, the biggest location so that’s also appreciated!
new craft beer tavern downstairs in l’ovella negra marina, awsome place!

great place for a weekend night with friends. there’s pool and foosball tables, varied music, food and drinks. you can dance, play in the tables, sit and have a drink, great for varied tastes on going out.
good atmosphere but sticky tables and menus. the nachos were also cold :(
what a cool bar! awesome music and great food. the drinks here were fairly reasonable and the customer service was excellent. should surely recommend this place.
good and massive place to get together with your friends.  adorable and good .
very nice place to hang out with friends or watch sports. the food is also good. however it may be a bit dirty
my favorite bar for company happy hours with much people: colleagues and friends in barcelona.
great place to go for drinks. nice music and perfect mood for a weekday drink or if you don't want to go hardcore. the price is one of the best things at ovella. but the best one by far, foosball
good beer bar 😁 ,  where we admired a beauteful intimist flamenco with the joaquim 's family 😊!!! that i really recommend warmly !!!!
this is one of the best place to bring your group. drinks are affordable food is fresh and affordable.
good atmosphere, epic frame with good drinks/food at reasonnable prices. very convenient for groups, think about making a reservation beforehand.
great atmosphere for watching football matches! highly recommended

really nice atmosphere and interior design, with a rustic aesthetic, -0.3 stars cause it closes at 2:30, they end up opening the lights and begging us to leave. -0.7 stars cause the sangria dobekindafelloff

great place to start a night out. really huge space with affordable drinks and lots of seating. it can get quite busy so would recommend coming a bit before the crowds come through if you want to grab a seat. nice atmosphere.
large bar with pool table, lots of tv's and table football.

excellent bar with a brilliant atmosphere, set in a large old warehouse and filled with long tables. there's a game space with table football and pool, and a well tended bar where the waits are not too long.
favourite beer pub in barcelona! awesome ambience. unpretentious. price/quality ratio is great.
favourite beer pub in barcelona! awesome ambience. unpretentious. price/quality ratio is great.
good place for watching the world cup. prices as really good.
patty is not almost rare, only got a patty and cheese but ordered a cheeseburger

the beer isn't great but it is cheapish, san miguel (€3). the ambience is that of a students or erasmus bar, a lot of travellers or younger people who come for the cheap beer and sangria (which is considerably better). large open places, music varies depending where you are, reasonably clean and staff are amicable. it's perfectly ok.

awesome music. great space. perfect after office spot. cheap draft beer
i wish they had more beer options. my go to place every friday after work. burgers are decent. popcorn chicken is really good.
sports bar, a lot of teenagers, not my kinda place.
really good place to watch the game and have a beer.
amazing place to spend a night out with your friends, very cheap and close to razzmatazz. they also host vintage markets sometimes!

really fun bar, we got these "beer towers" that were 31€ each, we got 4 of them for 20 people and we were all pretty tipsy by the end of it. they seem like a great deal. the building is awesome too, it's a old  wearhouse converted to the bar so it's very industrial while still being very fun

very good and cheap beer. popular with students and young people. it's located a bit in a suburban area (there's nothing around it) but it has a very good atmosphere. pints of san miguel are €2.90 and  you get a small bowl of popcorn with it (don't forget to ask for it)
very university oriented, but still an awesome spot to visit. unique atmosphere and a decent selection of drinks and food.

well decorated and pretty big. the hamburgers here are very good and the option to get 5 litres of beer to share is great if you are going with a group. pouring your own makes for some entertaining competition.

it was really awesome. this pub it's the best if you want to take a good bier. i try the coke+wine too and was unbelievable. a lot of people come in the night but u can easy find a table because it's so big. really, if you are in barcelona, i must try it. ++++++++

this place is ideal for big groups, with several group discounts and menus on offer. the menu has plenty of offers, from finger food and cheese to burgers. price is reasonable and matched to the quality of the food.

keep in mind you need to pay when your order arrives. you can do it so in cash or card.

one of the best places to go for a drink!!
if you are visiting barcelona don't miss it. it's huge and with a great atmosphere.
you can drink all kind of alcohol and eat dinner.
at the end of the bar there are some pool tables.
ok prices and great place!!

great place to have a night! people go for all hours. cheap beer for the beer lovers and sangría on tap and cocktails for the nonbeer lovers. €7 for a glass of whiskey and €16 for a bottle of wine. shots are cheap! a little potential for dancing and pool.
good prices and nice vibes with many people. maybe hard to find a table.

super fantastic place. very good prices, nice people, kind staff. big place with a lot of chairs and table to sit. it's a nice local place to visit and enjoy your night. unfortunately it's not always open.
don't miss this place!
decent for football and lager but the pub attracts some strange people
it's alright. good fun for groups. shows football, drinks reasonably priced. do not buy the nachos chewbacca. can make a better mix yourself at home following a youtube video.

not what i expected. this place is meant for massive groups of youngsters (teenagers mainly), chugging down gallons of beer. the food menu is mainly american (not something i want to eat in barcelona). the food menu is limited. they don't serve wine by the glass. if you are looking for a good meal, then give this one a pass.

i do believe they have frequent concerts though. so if concerts and beer fountains are your thing, then you might like this place.

huge bar in poble nou with a great variety of beers. and when i say huge i really really mean big. this place is bigger almost than vatican city. the decorations are also really cool and they have ping pong tables. toilets are also good but could be slightly cleaner. food is also good but a bit overpriced 10€ for a small burger with no chips. at least it tasted good but if you get drunk it won't fill you up completely. anyway this place is great for beers and big groups i mean, you could bring h

great atmosphere, great location to get a few beers and a bite for a start into the night - really close to razzmatazz (get tickets for razzmatazz in advance - we got turned away cause they where already sold out)

great place to meet people, from locals to expats to tourists.. a friendly environment where you can enjoy cheap drinks with plenty of seats available.. also some food is provided even at midnight. close to some nights clubs, i would definitely recommend going there at least once
it's a good place to go, if you're a student (cheap food and drink + full of young people). beer tastes like water though. on the weekends, there's a second hand market which is pretty nice.
solid sports bar. decent food, relatively quick service, plenty of room for a big crowd. had a blast watching liverpool vs tottenham in the 2019 champions league finale.
very good patatas bravas but the waiter looked like it wasn't his day. in general always nice place to grab a beer but if you into wine you can't order glass only bottle.
must visit.. great place to chill out.. huge no of tables, good beer and food.. could take up to 15 mins to serve on a busy hour..

a warehouse sort of place converted into a beer and sangria bar. they only serve san miguel and sangria and almost by the litre ! you can buy a litre of beer / sangria for almost eur 6 . the choice of finger food and burgers for the mains is also decent . lovely atmosphere as the whole place gets filled by the night . it's open till 3 am on friday and saturday :)
perfect place for meeting friends and have some drinks. huge space. very noisy and dirty. free bathroom. no outdoor space. soccer pool table inside. low quality and cheap food.
big drinking fest, like you walk into a harry potter cantus in setting. nice place for youth to drink, play and socialize.
really nice bar, with a lot of space and large tables. ideals for groups. they served good beers, not too expensive. they also have baby-foot and billboard!
a really fun bar! as a tourist it reminded me of a german beer hall. the place is popping around 11pm-1am, and they serve some very tasty sangria!

a fun local spot with big, delicious pitchers of sangria. my husband thought it was a better deal to just buy the pitcher for the two of us — "no way we'll drink it all!” he said — then over the course of an hour it all disappeared.

huge bar with pool tables n bar games down the back. serves food and famous for its jugs of sangria whilst cheap a bit sweet n sickly not the best sangria. more a studenty atmosphere but all ages in attendance. good for pre drinks before razzmatazz club
cheap drinks and good atmosphere. young crowd here, bar food, and big tv screens, good for big events on the tv.

rudest people ever! we had a reservation and they wouldn't even let me in. no one was speaking english and they couldn't understand what i was telling them. i was waiting in line for almost 20 min just to not take me to my table. lovely place as far as i ve seen from outside but not going back!!

really like the atmosphere, informal and relaxed. one of the few places in barcelona where they have lots of seats. even if it gets quite crowded on the weekend. food is nothing special but prices are cheap!

l’ovella negra is always a must if you are going to party around this area. it looks quite nice and the place itself is huge. i always loved to go there and even though i don’t go that often anymore, i know that if it’s in the plan it’s going to be a good night out.

very busy location with lots of young locals, very reasonably priced but could feel overwhelming for the average tourist. the selection of food however was extensive! for anyone looking for many options and good pricing, this is a go to location!
not my kind of bar, getting too old 😜 but for students it's perfect 👌🏻 the music, the space, the long tables, pool tables , the giraf of beer... 🍻

huge macrotavern with decent cheap food and sizable drinking options. not for everyone as in there's a lot of noise always (a lot of annoying bachellorete parties going on and the sort) and loud music. drink waiting time is non-existant if you go to the bar, food can take quite a while sometimes.
great informal pub in barcelona. i've been there during an holiday and i found it really amazing. good beers and good music are the key of the success!

good bar if you're looking for a very energetic atmosphere and cheap drinks. nothing gourmet here, but the patatas ovella taste like fries with vodka sauce (perfect drunk food), there's free popcorn, and with 5l of sangria for only 26€, i don't know if there's a better place to predrink for your night out. expect a crowd of 18-25 year-olds and sticky floors.
busy but very spacious pub. doesn't offer wide selection of beers, which is common in barcelona, but very good prices on drinks and food! gets busy during weekends.

we rented the private concert club for a rock and roll wedding celebration and were beyond satisfied with the extremely profesional staff who made of the event a perfect night. joan and his team went beyond our expectations to make everything perfect. chapeau gentelmen!

the biggest bar in barcelona, but that's not necessarily a good thing. in the day i went it was quite empty and becomes a bit unconfortable. prices are ok, not the cheapest, but not the most expensive in barcelona. there are good promotions is you go with some people
awful beer and food, the meat was burnt and the sandwich too dry. when i went in, there was a very strong smell of bleach, the table and chair were sticky. don't recommend.

do not go to this place! poor service, food is absolutely average. but worst of all, we found a quite big piece of plastic in our patatas bravas and when we reported it to the waiter his answer was “yeah sometimes they come in a package”. no explanation or compensation at all. avoid.

can't recommend this restaurant.
fideuá had almost nothing in it, the pumpkin salad had almost no pumpkin, mix mariscos for 25 eur looked nice but with almost nothing to eat. the only good thing was entrecot with roquefort.
crema catalana was terrible, we could not even eat it. the service was ok

amazing. we were walking around trying to find a restaurant and passed by them and decided to go in.
food is amazing, well prepared and it doesn't take long to come. we took the 3 courses menu and took the waitress ' advice to order a house wine, which was really good.
the staff was beyond friendly.
i would recommend it to anyone.

i enjoyed the ambience, the staff served us really well and the food was good. i ordered the menu del dia (daily combo) with paella, bread, beer and ice cream, and the price was cheap (7-10€). i felt really catalan eating there.

appetizers were great, main dishes on the menu del diaz not so much. tuna and cheeks were ok. prob not for everyone. coffee and staff were very good
overall if you go there , order some seafood because we regretted ordering from the 10.50e menu.
but i would come back to try the seafood and maybe that would make it 5 stars.
great dinner, moderate price. one of the best for the area. we had seafood dinner in 2 with a bottle of wine for less than 45€.

we shared tapas (pulpo a la gallega, pan con tomate) and two seafood dishes and were quite satisfied. expect plenty of oil as per typical catalan restaurant, but better quality than usual. the waitress is incredibly nice.

favorite tapas experience in barcelona. we had the spicy potatoes, empanadas, muscles in curry sauce and the meatballs. they were all wonderful. it was slightly hot inside though but that's not enough to change my rating because of the food.
it is one of the best places to go with friends and family for a nice meal. the food is perfectly prepared. it's great value value for the money.
the lamb shoulder and the mixto de mariscos were excellent!  service was friendly, atmosphere also great.
good place visited by locals, lunch for 11,50 with 2 dishes, drink and desert/coffee, great food
excellent seafood plates and customer service, totally recommended. by the way, the daily menu looked great too, many customers ordered ir
you should have green salad, grilled green pepper,and fideua at caleta de gracia if you want to eat seafood at barcelona.
really nice traditional catalan food. nice staff. it gets busy so it might be important to book a table

try the cava sangria! menu del dia was solid and a good deal. not very english friendly so get your google translate ready. everyone was so nice. accidentally ordered fried tiny fish bodies but they were actually quite good. loved the beans with ham as well. very cute.

we just had a delicious seafood dinner, you would have loved it. sangria, queso fundido, chorizo, seafood platter with grilled scallops, cockles, clams, razor clams, mussels, some bread with tomato, then some grilled squid. super tasty. €54 for the two of us. very nice service also. would come back again
really nice old school bistro style place in gracia.  thought the food very good, did prix fixe dinner, and good value.  quiet, mellow, relaxing.  good, friendly service too.
it's hard to tell something about the food if you ordered something and you didn't get it because the waitress forgot to order it in the kitchen

a nice place to eat sea food. the chef can be seen cooking at the kitchen and just one women serves all the restorant. it seems that this is a family run business nothing to complain about good food good service. i strongly recommend.

we ate at lunchtime in this cozy restaurant in the heart of gracia on saturday. i recommend getting there early because it fills up very quickly, which is a good sign. we had a menu del día for a not unreasonable 14.95 euros.it included 2 dishes + desert and drink. they offered typical spanish food: fidua, fish and meat dishes. portions were generous and tasty. good friendly atmosphere. highly recommended.

i loved it! tasty tapas with fish, mussels, shrimps and veggies... nice and cozy place, a good mix between old school and modern. staff is very friendly! a big screen projecting underwater images contribute to the atmosphere. sadly enough the creatures that you can admire on that screen will end up on your plate. if you feel guilty about this is not your place.
tasty traditional dishes, especially seafood, good service. excellent price for value.
small fish rest . not much options for kids but i shared the salmon with my 7 year old and she loved it. staff helped when we had questions. price was right for barcelona.
great experience in this restaurant
wonderful spanish cuisine. excellent food at great price and outstanding service. definitely a must-go.
good local restaurant, very reasonable prices and friendly staff with good food in contrast to many tourist traps.
great food and service. the shop was full but the lady who served us was excellent and everything came on time. the taste was great as well. definately reccomended.

a local place with local food, good flavor and decent price. only reason i give 4stars because i was the only person who didn’t get bread for my meal and i had to ask twice... not sure if it’s because language problem.
excellent family owned fish restaurant, great quality, great price, lovely owners. what's not to like? molt bo!
nice and cheap food and nice staff. try to go on thursday to eat a paella on the 'menu del dia' (menu of the day). also, try their fideuada at night.
really awesome food! worth a try. will come back again
not highly recommended bcz sea food is very normal... also not a good presentation just because of touristic area they have guests
small place, try to come early and you won't be disappointed. typical mediterranean food prepared by expert hands
wonderful local restaurant that has not sacrificed quality and service as many do now, and very reasonably priced.
nice restaurant that offers a decent choice of local dishes and is not touristy. friendly and helpful staff.
quaint place, kind of old school-looking. very good food and excellent service.
great lunch menu and pretty attentive service despite the crowd.
great little place. a real find. great service and great food.
great place to eat!
excellent value for money - great food.
mediterranean food. good quality.
great food for the value!!!
one of the best restaurants in the zone
the best place, my favorite.
fantastic
informal i bo
bon restaurant.

good food, quality and good work can be seen from the start, it's not a michelin star place but it's a place to go with family, friends and have a good lunch or dinner, first experience, food a la carte, but it's sunday in july, you have two menus, one for less than €14 and another for less than €18, which look very good, some corrections could be made but the market has what it has. for me, for us, a place to repeat because i'm curious to try the cod stir-fry and some other dish, market prices
except for the tomato toast everything was very good.very fast table service.very efficient kitchen.the atmosphere is very welcoming.good pricegood option

we popped in today and had a great meal!!! all fish of great quality at a very good price. excellent service in a small and very cozy place. to put a very small but small variety of wines from the land. very happy!!!a year has passed since this first review, and we have been four or five more times, just to insist on the excellent value for money of the place, as well as the service, always very friendly. highly recommended!!!
very happy with the service above all, very attentive and also one of the few places left in favor where you can make a reservation! good and quality food! i recommend it

i want to highlight the good service we have received in this restaurant from the waitress, who although she takes all the tables in the place alone, does so in a very fast and organized manner, without neglecting the excellent service she has with the customers. .every time we can, my partner and i return to this restaurant. the menu of the day is very complete and even though they are full of customers, they are incapable of giving you a bad face or stopping you from the table.and the best of

i ate here on a saturday in november 2022 with my son. very good service - they are very friendly and always attentive to all the tables. good food and at very good prices compared to other similar places in barcelona. i recommend their fideuá with allioli - it's delicious!

just upon entering, the empty tables and the rancid smell of the place were already suspicious. however, we wanted to taste a catalan cream that the reviews promised. when 3 of us sat down and ordered 2 tapas to share, 3 desserts and 3 drinks, the shop assistant didn't think it was enough. in a very bad way he told us that we could not ask for that. the audacity to try to manage my food and my pocket was a service worthy of a seedy restaurant that is surprisingly still open.grateful not to eat
informal i bo
bon restaurant.

good food, quality and good work can be seen from the start, it's not a michelin star place but it's a place to go with family, friends and have a good lunch or dinner, first experience, food a la carte, but it's sunday in july, you have two menus, one for less than €14 and another for less than €18, which look very good, some corrections could be made but the market has what it has. for me, for us, a place to repeat because i'm curious to try the cod stir-fry and some other dish, market prices
except for the tomato toast everything was very good.very fast table service.very efficient kitchen.the atmosphere is very welcoming.good pricegood option

we popped in today and had a great meal!!! all fish of great quality at a very good price. excellent service in a small and very cozy place. to put a very small but small variety of wines from the land. very happy!!!a year has passed since this first review, and we have been four or five more times, just to insist on the excellent value for money of the place, as well as the service, always very friendly. highly recommended!!!
very happy with the service above all, very attentive and also one of the few places left in favor where you can make a reservation! good and quality food! i recommend it

i want to highlight the good service we have received in this restaurant from the waitress, who although she takes all the tables in the place alone, does so in a very fast and organized manner, without neglecting the excellent service she has with the customers. .every time we can, my partner and i return to this restaurant. the menu of the day is very complete and even though they are full of customers, they are incapable of giving you a bad face or stopping you from the table.and the best of

i ate here on a saturday in november 2022 with my son. very good service - they are very friendly and always attentive to all the tables. good food and at very good prices compared to other similar places in barcelona. i recommend their fideuá with allioli - it's delicious!

just upon entering, the empty tables and the rancid smell of the place were already suspicious. however, we wanted to taste a catalan cream that the reviews promised. when 3 of us sat down and ordered 2 tapas to share, 3 desserts and 3 drinks, the shop assistant didn't think it was enough. in a very bad way he told us that we could not ask for that. the audacity to try to manage my food and my pocket was a service worthy of a seedy restaurant that is surprisingly still open.grateful not to eat
very good food and very reasonable prices.
the food is good, weekend menu included at night, the place is great, but if you want an irish coffee don't order it here.
excellent value for money. super friendly service. highly recommended, there are few places like this left in barcelona.
everything is very delicious and above all they serve very quickly. the staff is very friendly. approximate price of €32 per person.
we went to dinner with a friend and shared all the dishes. spectacular everything! crayfish, mussels, noodles and a super burrata salad, all very tasty. totally recommended!!!

place with a marine decoration and a projection of marine animals. good food, rich and presented correctly. it stands out for its good quality-price ratio. we have booked because the place is rather small. they have attended to us quickly but, due to the volume of work, we have had to remember some orders. it would be the only bad thing to highlight. if you come by car, you will have to go to the parking lot, because it is difficult to park in the area.
a good restaurant with good service. competitive price quality price.

they are absolutely charming. everything is spectacular, for me the grilled mixed plate is what is most popular.they have reasonable prices and generous portions. what more could you ask for? whenever i have visitors i take them there and they love it.thank you so much ❤️
very good food, very good service. very good price quality

it is a place with a very pleasant decoration, spacious and where you can enjoy both tapas and a more complete menu. the staff are very attentive and friendly and the food is tasty and excellent value for money. my friend and i ordered several tapas and among them a variety of delicious grilled mollusks. highly recommended and eager to repeat.
one of the best quality-price restaurants in barcelona. sublime food at an unbeatable price, as well as good treatment. i highly recommend the cheek pads.
really recommended, the food is very good, value for money too, and the service is friendly and attentive. what more can you ask for?

great discovery in the heart of the gràcia neighborhood. charming place with seafood specialties.it offers a €14.95 menu during the week and a very varied menu. we opted for the menu and everything was delicious.we have gone with the little ones and they loved it too.the waitress who served us has been a sweetheart at all times, thank you!
pep, excellent cook and team leader, nuria, the friendly smile at the reception. the dishes are exquisite and unbeatable value for money.a risk...can develop addiction..

the menu of the day costs 9.50 euros during the week and includes dessert or coffee and a drink. we ordered the ravioli, meat and sausage and we loved everything.restaurant with a very warm and maritime atmosphere.in the area it is the best value for money menu.we will return for sure!
very good paella and great tapas, good price

it is the second year that we come to this restaurant and we will definitely return.the food is exquisite, the staff is very familiar and pleasant and the establishment has a lot of charm.congratulations to all!
very attentive staff. family cooking with excellent value for money! my favorite in barcelona.
restaurant for people from the neighborhood, the tourists have not arrived yet. honest cuisine. good ember

to start, they brought us the bread with burnt tomato, the 4 pieces were just as burnt as the ones in the attached photo.we continue with the provolone, it is the one from lidl and it is served without bread or anything.scrambled eggs, frozen and reheated potatoes.the lacón rolling paper, 4 sliced ​​pieces and a lot of potato.the chocos without flavor of anything, frozen too.yes, the price is very cheap, but sometimes it is worth paying a little more and eating quality.attentive and fast servic
good place to eat milanese... the dishes are generous and super fresh! i loved it... the attention was super good....
mare de deu! spectacular cove menu! splendid dishes. cozy restaurant and very friendly service.we will return without a doubt.
good food, good quality price, cozy atmosphere, and very friendly service.

everything is very delicious and the quality-price ratio is excellent!!!!wonderful octopus 🐙, excellent patatas bravas and super escalibada…gentle and very kind waiters!very cozy atmosphere…we will return for sure!

i loved it, i ordered a mixed fried seafood tapa, and it was delicious, except that i expected it to not be that much, but on the contrary, it was huge and delicious.i accompanied it with bread with tomato, the best option.i really recommend this place, good service and tasty food.
very friendly attention from the two waitresses and the cook
a cozy place, with super attentive and friendly staff. the food is good and the quality-price menu is great.
the food is very fresh, the cook is very professional, the fideua is delicious and the entrecôtes are spot on, quality and price great. i recommend it 100%💯

💯% recommended5⭐ are few. it is a good place to talk, laugh and have a good time, the comfort that the space offers you is incredible, the service is great, the music is very pleasant; it is very original to listen to current music and at the same time watch videos that make you remember old and good times.keep like this 🏆🥂👍🏼

tourist trap, don't eat or drink here. in 5 years of living in barcelona, i have never gotten this low quality food served. the meat was hard and disgusting and the bravas were very oily. as a "cook" i should feel ashamed to serve such food. they charge 10% extra for sitting on the terrace, which is the main reason why you would sit there, so that doesn't make sense. and the prices are already ridiculously high. never again, avoid at all costs.

awesome - outside sitting - great atmosphere -delicious - really easy going staff and helpful - great value- reeeaaallly yummy food for meat eaters and vegetarians - are just tapas  - 5 of us had 15 tapas dishes and 1-3 drinks each for €111 and lots of drinks :) we were all stuffed

had a lovely experience here. the team were very friendly! the wine was lovely and they recommended very good local wine. the plaza was beautiful. there is also free wifi! lovely place for dinner and friendly. also best brie croquettes ❤

awesome service, delicious bravas, incredible mojitos/sangria, free wifi! there are tvs with the games too for those sports fans who don’t want to miss a beat. if you are in gràcia, be sure to stop by!
the staff treated me like family. the croquettes reminded me of my abuelas recipe. i never felt so welcomed in my life. the food and drinks are incredible. i want to eat here every day.

the restaurant had a sign with "homemade tapas" outside, but the problem was that every meal we ordered wasn't homemade at all. the pizza margherita was okay, but it was definitely a frozen one. the caesar salad was also okay, but the dressing wasn't made in the restaurant and there was maybe one teaspoon of chicken filet in the whole salad, which felt like a joke. you nearly couldn't find a piece of meat. instead of "homemade" fries we got deep-frozen fries. the bravas were really good though.

in one word: terrible. the staff is mostly grumpy (with the exception of a couple of waiters that were actually nice and attentive),  rudely shoving beers and food on the table. the portions are small and overpriced -- take, for instance, this 9€ nachos portion, with pre-packed chips thrown on a plate with two minuscule dips. it's a pity, for the location is handy and the place itself is not bad. won't repeat

someone explain to me the low reviews. we came here accidentally after getting lost trying to find a different place and couldn't have loved it more. best margarita i have ever had and i come from san diego. but the seafood paella was amazing. i only review a place when it deserves a great review and this place most certainly does.

a hidden gem in gracia. we stumbled upon it for some lunch. it was simply amazing. it was like home cooked food. i'm definitely coming back again. do not let the reviews fool you. the staff is friendly and is a place to eat and drink (not to have coffee).
it’s a very nice place. the waiter is really nice and funny and the food is great. totally recommended if you want authentic spanish tapas and a great service

one of the worst tapa places in gracia. prices are demented (7.80 € for a patata brava, seriously?) while food quality is awful. we stopped there because the excellent thai restaurant in front was still closed and the kids were ravenous. a trap for tourists (and fresh residents) please avoid.

do not come to this bar ever! my girlfriend and i went to have some bravas and a beer, and we were told that we had to order a tapa per person. the service is terrible, we were also forced to share a table with another couple.
they didn't even want to serve us drinks. the food is insanely expensive and of terrible quality.
the calamari were frozen and so greasy it is a miracle i did not instantly get a heart attack (11€).
all in all one of the worst places i have ever been to in my entire life!

the nachos were pitiful, no cheese on the top and the dips were extra small, even when we asked for more. the bravas, well, without brava sauce... 😔
wouldn't recommend to my worse enemy.
everything was good but the best part is how warm and kind johnatan is! amazing service and just a very very good feeling after our interaction with him, thanks!
a great place for a chilled rest after an exhausting day in the city. and if you are just a little hungry, order braves - the sauce is self made and just f***ing awesome. so no kissing after that ;)

on the good side: nice location, the staff was friendly and helpful, the beer was good and everything arrived quickly.
on the downside: the food was quite disappointing, it did not taste good, ot was just "acceptable". the price of food was quite high especially when you compare it to the quality. for this price i would expect some really tasty food.
best thing about the place is being situated in nice placa. all the rest - very moderate.

over priced normal frozen food with a really high crazy cost i never ever had this before to pay just small things like this beside of this the rude behavior of the waiters and they are not making somthing amazing if i pay money i would deserve somthing in return but we learn and warn other people and let karma do their work with them.
tasty bbq chicken wings, brie cheese. tasty  german beer.
sangria was from box, and nachos & dip straight from the market opposite the restaurant. 24 euros total. if you buy them yourself from the market, the quality is the same, but price 1/3.
not bad, ok tapas for ok price. unfortunalely there is really bad smell in the toilet and lots of homeless people around
the best operators which are working here, i highly recommend this bar, really friendly people. thank you that i could be there and spend my time in barcelona in this place. :-)

175 / 5.000
resultats de traducció
star_border
horrible. the waiters are very unfriendly and force you to eat one dish per person or they kick you out. we left but before that we made a formal complaint in the complaints book.

ronqui was such an amazing waiter. when we arrived all the tables were full but he did his best to get us a table soon enough. the food was great -we had some amazing tapas- and we took amazing care of us!
nice place. i find the tapas to be ok. nothing fancy and it´s reasonably priced.
does what it says on the tin, simple,  honest,  tasty, well priced and friendly service
best bar in gracia. after a while of searching all the bars around, this is the friendliest and has the best food. the staff are very friendly, jonathon and the guys go one step beyond for you!

really good food and fantastic service, we came for a meal with an old friend who's a local and found a new favourite! food was quick and enjoyable, the croquetas were a group favourite. bonus points if your waiter is roinqui what an amazing man, so hospitable and so understanding of our broken spanish/ catalan.

i guess we should've read the menu better?

.40 cents added per item ordered on the terrace.

so 8.50 for a bacon and cheese sandwich is already pretty hefty. but when you order an extra egg for a 1€, the price is actually 8.90€+1.40€.

oh a croquetta for 2 euros? nope it's 2.40€
2 drinks for 5€? nope that's 5.80€.

so on the 12 expensive items we ordered we got another 4.80€ on top of that, which they then added 10% vat to, and which didn't add up.

the waiter was not particularly nice or helpf

we didn’t actually eat here as we came the service was grumpy. we were with 3 kids who were really hungry (2 and six years old). we gave them just a little of carrot which we had with us to keep the kids occupied. the staff immediately told us that this is not accepted and that the manager is not happy. we said ok and left across the street to papa tomate.

in 10 years in barcelona this never happened to me. i ordered lunch, a beer and coffee. actually ate fast. average hamburger, not great.

seconds after my last bite, about 20 min since i sat down, the waiter hands me the bill and asks me to pay now. i tell him that it's pretty rude as i  just finished eating. he said 2 people are waiting for my table.

he even apologized and said that he only does what his boss demands of him

i understand the pressure, as post covid restaurants are struggling.
really accommodating. helped us understand the menu in english and made us feel very welcome. if u are visiting barcelona as a none spanish speaking tourist this is a great place to stop in grassie

dramatically overpriced for what it is. the location is ideal so you could expect something else from such a restaurant. also, maybe because we went there with foreigner friends and talked in english the vermut was suspiciously watered. i would advice the management to change their policy…

my friends and i ate here on our first night in barcelona and it was delicious!! not only that but the staff was so friendly, the place was super clean and the food came out in minutes. very happy we stumbled upon it (ps try the mojitos!!)

refused to serve us sandwiches, juice, and coffee because the clock had just struck 12. we were told that we had to order a full lunch in order to sit at the terrace. very mediterranean. sad to see a local bar turn into a tourist trap. will not be returning.

tapas were poor, that’s a fair assessment.
for having its name be the beer joint, even that was disappointing.

the bravas were served with the largest blob of industrial mahonese i have ever seen on potatoes. gross 😩! the calamares had overstayed in a freezer.

only attraction was the fact that it was there, in a plaça in gràcia with a terrace. fridays are a struggle to get to sit somewhere at all.

the waiter could recommended everything, weirdest entré i have ever seen. paella, not really that tasteful. same with the salmon(the specials). there was even wine included in a menu we chose, which we of course did not get. other places in barcelona give better food for a lower price :)

we were told the anchovies are not salty but too salty... has more salt than other places... olives ordered were quite 👎... the red sausage was better than i thought...
promised myself to check google review before trying new places...
nice spot, average food. you'll definitely get better tapas elsewhere but it's in a lovely spot on the square that largely makes up for it. the mushrooms with jamon are not bad

ordered the calmari which came in a horrible batter which ruined the taste of the squid. after that sharing the seafood paella which says €15 euro when it's for 2 people you have to pay €15 each, so basically it's €30. it was inedible, the paella being hard and chewy getting stuck in our teeth. would definitely not recommended.

i like this bar so much the terrace is big so i  always go back, i tried many times the bravas, the dados de queso en mermelada de tomate, croquetas and of course the sangria and beer, even the attention from the personal ronqui y jhon very very nice they make you feel at home.
