are you sad, sad? do you need to forget your past and start a day without knowing who you are and why you are where you are? in open, that experience is ordered like "two jugs of valencia water", a roller coaster of emotions during the night that will make armstrong's "what a wonderful world" little to define your night. go out and party, enjoy and be careful because there are outbreaks. peace.
mythical party bar in marina. good prices and bad hangovers. it has a table football and a pool table which is always appreciated.
i have come to see very large cockroaches (bugs) walking among the seated people...not exactly a clean place to me. on the other hand there is a good heavy atmosphere
they kicked me out for being black.i'm not even from africa, i'm adopted.
it is very typical to make valencian water in a jug! good price although a lot of noise, like throughout that area
very good atmosphere, quite a variety of beers, very large room, and has a table football and a pool table.
the best bar in marina ever. cheap cubatas and always a good atmosphere. i am a regular at this place
more air conditioning please :)
good bar for drinks in the marina area. good atmosphere and delicious valencian water
it is a nice place where you can have a quiet drink with friends and they have quite affordable prices.
cubaliters for young people with filthy floors, a place where people walk around and are somewhat conflictive.
super bad, crazy people who frequent it, frankly, you can't come here if you're a little balanced.
great prices, good atmosphere, if i had to say something bad it would be the heat inside the bar.
mythical friends bar in marina. precursor of the waters of valencia, which have offered me such a good night.
the typical bar to drink a jug of valencian water and talk
i lost my jbl headphones please see them!
comfortable place, music of all kinds and pleasant, easy-going people.
i haven't entered because i'm black. painful.
great to have something in company and at a reduced price, that is, if you bring something for the heat.
bar with billiards and table football where the kids go to get fancy while drinking.
excellent place to have a few drinks with colleagues.
if what you are looking for is a quick drunk, agua de valencia. negative point hellish heat
cheap to drink and good to go in groups.
if you come here and don't drink a valencia water, you haven't been.
to have a good time in marina is great.
best bar in marina ever
cheap drink, good atmosphere
valencia water jugs with friends 🔝
good bar
great water of valencia
what you need for a few laughs with friends.
excellent bar
edge waiters
it's fine, without further ado
a classic from the marina area
brutal

not super impressed as a michelin starred restaurant overall. we liked the few exotic items we tried: pig feet were deboned, very tender and flavorful with duck sauce and dried plums; cuttlefish rice was yummy; veal brain was quite an adventure but great. sea bass was as expected, calamari was plain, desert was cold and disappointing. could do better on presentation. service was also slow - it took a few minutes for the menu to arrive when we were the one of the only two tables right when it ope

in my five months of living in barcelona, this restaurant has easily become my favorite. i'm at a loss for words when the soap in a restaurant is incredible—apologies to my mom, but this soap was nothing short of magnificent. the meat surpassed all expectations; it was so tender that cutting it with a spoon felt like a luxury. as for the macarrons del cardenal, their deliciousness made me understand why even napoleon was a fan. the flavors were exquisite, and every bite was a delight. beyond the

good, if you take no chances. don’t order something your not quite sure about or something you don’t fully understand - as it will be bad. i was there multiple times with bigger groups and it’s really a hit or miss. but you can never go wrong with the deer

what a treat. beautifully cooked food but so proudly catalan. this was the perfect dinner to end our first trip to barcelona. i would recommend this to anyone looking for a very nice gourmet dinner. service was superb but also very warm and friendly too. am always going to come back when i visit this wonderful city

first of all please don’t take me wrong as i’m 100% sure petit comité particularly chef carles gaig is a master chef and his sea food and other meaty dishes are excellent . however, i went to the restaurant and booked for dinner but informed them , that me and my partner are vegetarian. they assured us that they serve also vegetarian dishes . we arrived at 8 pm and someone directed us to our table . we asked for vegetarian menu but the person who served us said they have no vegetarian menu but t

petit comite: an exquisite culinary journey

nestled in the vibrant city of barcelona, petit comite is a renowned michelin star restaurant that promises an unforgettable dining experience. as a food enthusiast, i had the pleasure of indulging in their culinary creations recently, and i must say, it was an extraordinary gastronomic adventure.

the highlight of my meal at petit comite was undoubtedly the calamari dish. prepared to perfection, the calamari was tender and succulent, showcasing a del

fantastic restaurant. amazing food and ambience. top notch service: excellent wine recommendations at a very fair price point and a lot of flexibility with our ordering. they turned our order of two sea bass and two oxtails into two courses for the entire table, which made the dinner a lot more fun for everyone!

we really enjoyed their menu. the caneloni is extraordinary and the meat was also fantastic. pork feet was also one of our favorite dishes. service was kind and the place is nicely decorated. long wine list. i was only disappointed by the pork size but overall we enjoyed it. red tuna was also very tasty and monk fish.

we were not happy with this recommendation from michelin.

the food was good, though not overly memorable and a bit overpriced. however, it was the service that really spoiled the whole experience. i had to actively get someone’s attention to take our initial order for food and wine, despite the restaurant being empty. after we ordered, the service improved during the course of the meal. the pigeon was my favourite of the 6 courses. we didn’t bother with dessert. but once we finished our meal an

fantastic food, first class service.
food was amazing, but my favorite was the squid with shiitake mushroom.
the non-alcoholic champagne added the final touch.

food was good but a bit on the pricey side. i ordered the sea bass which was 47€. fish was tasty and not too salty. chef also gave us a gazpacho starter along with bread. service was great. doesn’t start to get busy until around 9pm.

the dining experience left much to be desired, as the food lacked flavor. the table-setting staff appeared rather unrefined and disinterested, often requiring guests to seek their attention. the presentation of dishes was underwhelming, with stray breadcrumbs and scattered salt detracting from the overall appeal. given the plethora of dining choices in barcelona, it's astonishing that this restaurant received a michelin star in 2021.
amazing food, ambience and service. we had a truly enjoyable dinner there and highly recommend this restaurant

модный и популярный ресторан, нам был рекомендован, как место с современным взглядом на традиционную каталонскую кухню. я как-то не понял: либо взгляд, либо традиции, какие-то блюда интересные, какие-то нет. возможно все-таки ресторан больше рассчитан на местных гурманов. обслуживание отличное, хорошая винная карта, порадовали десерты. но место достаточно дорогое и на мой взгляд соотношение цена/удовольствие не очень.

(translated by google)
a trendy and popular restaurant, it was recommended to

we chanced upon this on our first night in barcelona and didn't expect much. we were blown away.

we had initially wanted to refuse the bread and snack service cos they wanted to charge us five euros for, but we forgot to inform them and man, am i glad we didn't. the snacks were amazing and the food that followed was one of the best we've had in spain. everything from the tapas to the mains was creative and not what one would expect, and we ended up so full and satisfied that we couldn't do the

the food was so tasty but i didn’t like the service at all. we waited more than 5 minutes for a lady to come and show us our table.although we had reservation and there were free tables they forced us to have the table at the entrance. the service was so slow and we couldn’t find them easily to even order the food. they treated friendly but i prefer professional ones who respect and do their job fast.

love it. we were two and we shared some starters: half plate of calamari, half plate of prawns and a coca with foie and caramelized apples, then i had a "favetes with xipirons" and it was really good. my husband ordered "fricandó" and it was also spectacular. for desert we shared a lemon pie, a tatin and a baba and everything was excellent. they have a really good offer of wine . we really enjoyed the dinner, i totally recommend it, we will repeat for sure.

very unique combinations in all of the food plates. everything we ate was fantastic, but the sauce on the veal fricassee was very salty. the service was okay, but i do expect more for a michelin star. a champagne bottle popped and the cork shot off the wall into my face; we didn't order the champagne. we also had multiple meals be served to the wrong person and changing the silverware after was awkward.

gastronomie catalunya style. seasonal lunch menu for 65 euro. an unfortunate mix of the highest highs, and the lowest lows.  the two starters were each poetry. subtle, surprising, amazing and fantastic. the artichoke soup was a sunny stroll in the countryside (la garrigue) on a breezy day filled with scents and subtle beauty. then the bad, the rice was insipid and uninspired. maybe someone's grandma cooked it that way but definitely not haute cuisine. another unfortunate surprise, the tuna was o

wow x 10000 !!!! what an incredible experience for our palate 👌 we had their award winning canelón dish, sweet breads, grilled and fried brain… amongst many other exceptional dishes! service also exceptional!!!

love that “dirty rice” which is probably one of  the best delicacies i have ever tasted! must have! octopus is also the must have local delicacy! unfortunately the wine came a bit later than it should, that is why only four stars!

our group had a fantastic 5 course dinner here. we were a party of 20 and the staff was very friendly, professional and speedy. we had the an anchovy salad, the piglet and flavorful desserts. the wines and champagne were also very good.

i’ve been to petit comite for a birthday dinner.
the food was great and we’ve enjoyed all the plates we ordered.
i am giving 1/5 stars due to something unacceptable and rude for a restaurant of this caliber.
when i ordered the “sobrasada con miel” as an entrée, i realized there was a piece of hair in it. i let the server know about it and it was immediately taken away. they brought a new one 10 minutes later but without any apology, or a simple “sorry about that”. i refused to have it as she act

there are many occasions when we waited very long and had to repeat our orders before we got our beverages. the spotlight was very glaring but it was berable. the food is tasty but looks plain on presentation.

i was here 4 years ago.  everything was delicious.  i decided to try again and everything was perfect. service, food, wine list, atmosphere.... i recommend  for business meetings and for family and friends.
the taste of the dish is basically bad, especially the servers are too short of service for customers. it calls for urgent improvement.

25 euros for this salad? just three bad taste shrimp and few lettuce……i have been to most michelin restaurant, this one i will definitely not back back again. btw, 5 euros per person service fee, sorry i don’t buy it
from arriving to the end of great food, service, and atmosphere; we’re truly satisfied. great team in place here, and you will be enjoying a great experience.

excellent menu and food but the service was poor. i ordered a white wine it did not arrive till half of our main course was done because the waiter forgot about it. he also took the wrong order and forgot about one dish. in the end it was all fine but it wasn’t the service i was expecting for. the staffs are not very friendly when they serve the dishes. there is no explanation of each dish so we were left to figure out what it was or had to ask constantly. this is very strange considering this i

fantastic food and fantastic service. huge menu and great elegant selection. this restaurant is more elegant that it seems based on previous reviews but it’s absolutely fabulous. loved every dish and enjoyed the wine menu. wish we could’ve tried the desserts but we’re absolutely stuffed. will be back. 😍
great service and wonderful menu. 60% charge for half portions is genius !  let’s you taste even more of the great food

over priced and very slow. the seafood is fresh, but the servings are small (despite the waiter insisting they are huge) and the preparations were relatively simple. it took them 10+ minutes to get the check. definitely would not recommend it.
below average food, ambience and service. lovely people but no attention to detail. overpriced, salty and uninspiring unfortunately.

recently visited barcelona and had the pleasure of visiting this wonderful restaurant!  the artichokes are to die for!!!  the shrimp and grilled fish were  flavorful, beautifully presented and cooked to perfection.  nice wine selection with a knowledgeable sommelier.  i will be back!

great intimate place for a romantic dinner, the staff and service are really top notch, great recommendations and great twist for the catalan cuisine. their wine selection is huge and their desserts are really delicious.

something good:
the good was tasty with good presentation. nice interior decoration.
the waiter was attentive when serving meals.

something not so good:
we arrived at the reservation time, and waited at the table with a menu for more than 20minutes before my partner asked the waiter if someone will take our order. we were then told only the lady (the chef’s wife) can take order and she was busy taking order with another large table. we wish we were told about this on our arrival that we are pre

had so many hi expectations !!
one of the worst gourmet dinners i have ever had.
ordered shrimp carpaccio that had a weird smell. the  main dish alone cost  over 30€ and was composed of 3 lonely scallops badly cooked with no taste over a small triangle carrot and  1 mushroom cut in 4 pieces.
a restaurant i don’t recommend with so many wonderful places to eat amazing food in barcelona at almost half the price.

service was a bit strange, as we were seated twice, first at a bad location and then manager moved us to a better table. the beverage person ignored us after opening the bottle while attending to other guests attentively. food was good. recommended place, but maybe too busy for tourists.
the roasted suckling pig tastes very good. overall good experience.
amazing catalunya cuisine with nice selection of wine. particularly i loved calcots.

so bad service! we were sitting at the table for like 20 mins with no one coming to take order. waiters were all standing oddly in the other area but no one in ours. asking for waiter twice were both ignored. it turned out that there is only one lady in the restaurant can take orders no matter how many tables are waiting, ridiculous!
not cheap but great panorama of high end catalan cuisine. service is so good that you feel that all they care is you and there is nobody else. congrats
can’t say a word. super good food!

amazing service with very friendly staff. we got the seasonal menu. the portions seemed small but ended up being so perfect. definitely recommend the duck and prawns. the prawns were so delicious. i ended up having some kind of caramel meringue and that tastes amazing. very light, airy and sweet.

very good food. the full experience was a bit faulty, though. we were made to wait at the reception while the receptionist was on the phone and the sliding door was opening constantly letting the cold enter. the sitting at the table was more of a "yeah go there" and the couch was stained. most of the waiters were nice and polite, especially the youngest one but others were just bored to be there. i mean, i am not so picky in general, but since it's a restaurant with a michelin start, i have high

a very satisfying experience. traditional catalan food well prepared, professionally served, a good wine list and a delightful dessert trolley. decent value. an unusual variety of dishes, including a top-notch pig's ear salad. try it!

the food was not bad but average.
i ate the tasting menu and it was nothing really special. starters were good but the following dishes were boring.
the price for the menu was too high for what was offered.
the service was okay but still could be improved.
i think this restaurant is highly overrated and there are many better locations in barcelona which offers better food with a lower price.

the food was extremely good.  the atmosphere too. the wine list is a mini bible of gems. as for the staff, extremely friendly and helpful both in english and castilian. a very good spot with exquisite talents behind the kitchen.  a must try

worth every cent! if you are looking for a way fancier (and more expensive), but still local cuisine, this is the place! had starters, mains and dessert: not simply one of the best i ever had, but a true experience from course to course!

i have ordered the " best olives stuffed with anchovies" name on menu. and black ink paella.
i liked the olives.
they bring like a fish ball as part of the starter (you can opt out) to was around 5€ per person.
my main dish was black ink dish which was nice and new taste to me.

why i took out a star. because we were 4 plus a child of 4 yrs old and they charged us 5 for the bread and olive oil (!?)...of course i asked them to fix the bill, plus they never served bread but they made sure to pour
the best dishes we had were the jamon, the croquettes, the octopus, an the monk fish. service was nice and accommodating. we enjoyed it very much.

the menu was so so, the wine selection great. the service was not optimal: rushed through the menu without explanation, had to ask for everything and serve ourselves with wine etc. at that price i would expect more.

one of the best restaurant experiences we’ve had. the servers were periodically bringing out snacks from the chef to try, and it was all paired well with our wine of choice. the food was fresh and delicious in a very romantic environment.

it isn't the high price or the stuffed atmosphere that made me rank this place so low. nor is it the tiny size of the dishes (i may have ordered half portions, but even for a half that was rather small). fine dinning should be about experience not a hearty meal. and this kind of experience often comes with a price. i was prepared. but what i was not prepared for was to have three dishes that were so... bland. it wasn't inedible or disquasting, it was just... bland. well, at least they didn't rui

wonderful place with quality service, good selection of wines, great quality and presentation of food. moreover, the desserts are astonishing! simple ingredients prepared and presented in a way you have not seen/tried before!  this restaurant is a must visit in barcelona!
amazing modern catalonian food!

didn’t meet our expectations. you pay for the atmosphere inside it seems: we were unfortunately disappointed. first of all the waitresses (3 served us)didn’t  understand english (might be expected in such a location) and brought the wrong drinks. then there was a starter that we didn’t want nor eat (pig ear might be a specialty but nothing for us). then the food arrived which was good and tasty! so that was a bonus and good. like the other reviews say. then the bill arrived. we paid for service,

service was really bad. one of the worst. slow. unhappy waiters. sad. barely explained what we were being served. asked us if we were interested in desert before our main course arrived. mixed up the order. so disappointing the overall experience. food was good but the overall experience ruined by the service and ambience they created.

nice ambiance on the contemporary cosy side. staff very helpful and let us taste a few wines before ordering. some dishes such as the veal fricassé was quite small but fine if you start with tapas. trendy families and fashionable couples in 40's crowd. cost around 50 euros per person with wine.
excellent dining experience. food is of high quality and reasonably priced. the price of the wine is a bit exaggerated considering the offer.
the best place we have been in barcelona

i found this restaurant through google and absolutly amazing. supper friendly staff, perfectly cooked meals. just a little confused on the drink menu but overall very nice! deliciois homemade desserts. most amazing olive oil ive ever tried.

hi all, as finding new places in barcelona starts to be hard after some living here. i suggest this place if you are looking for some texture and quality meal. i really liked alcachofas, but also chipirones with sweet peas where just perfect. if you fancy foie, highly recommend, but the dish is just one bite for 2 to share.
as for dessert we tried cheesecake de cabra (keep in mind they have 2 different versions)

for the slow experience, i got so used to it... but the waiters where coming freque
well one of the best places i visited in barcelona. on top of really authentic cuisine and excellent wines, we enjoyed a fast and helpful service. reservation needed. definitely recommend.

great and friendly staff that were attentive and interested. the price is not the cheapest, but this place is not for those seeking bargains--plenty of other places that come offer that. you get a quality and well prepared food here with good setting and ambience. once again, the service here was excellent!

excellent experience on this place. food is amazing with several options of true local cuisine. rice dishes, mussels, tortillas are all excellent choices. service is very good with staff attentive to details.
service was a bit confused but food was excellent, particularly the cannelloni.

amazing food and great, friendly service from the staff who always had a smile on their face and were happy to help with the menu and make recommendations. highly recommend for catalan cuisine within a nice atmosphere!

the restaurant is located on a small lane way off the trendy passeig de gracia,it offers contemporary catalan cuisine surrounded with a modern look on an ample and comfortable space.
for starters we had the grilled artichokes,the sobreasada with honey( an ingenious twist on a classic )and marinated anchovies fillets.
that was followed by mains from which the highlight for me was the suckling pig,nice crackling on top and super tender meat inside.
i finished it off with a fantastic tarte tatin,re
service was a bit confused but food was excellent, particularly the cannelloni.

amazing food and great, friendly service from the staff who always had a smile on their face and were happy to help with the menu and make recommendations. highly recommend for catalan cuisine within a nice atmosphere!

the restaurant is located on a small lane way off the trendy passeig de gracia,it offers contemporary catalan cuisine surrounded with a modern look on an ample and comfortable space.
for starters we had the grilled artichokes,the sobreasada with honey( an ingenious twist on a classic )and marinated anchovies fillets.
that was followed by mains from which the highlight for me was the suckling pig,nice crackling on top and super tender meat inside.
i finished it off with a fantastic tarte tatin,re

цены реально не оправдывают содержимое, заказали 2 блюда, принесли в начале пару закусок и воду, хотя мы их не заказывали. ну думаем как и во всех нормальных заведениях - типа презента)) но в конце оказалось, что это было за отдельную плату, хотя бы сказали бы... в общем не советую сие заведение, хотя подача и сервировка на уровне.

(translated by google)
the prices really don't justify the contents, we ordered 2 dishes, they brought a couple of snacks and water at the beginning, although we did

menu was an interesting modern twist on local dishes; knowledgable and attentive service and good value. we tried to turn up without a reservation on saturday evening - it was full - so booked for sunday and were delighted!

nice ambience and very tasty appetizers. sadly the main course was lacking, bland, undercooked and served barely warm. the  service was not professional. didn't care if everything was fine, but got offended when we didn't tip.
good service but dishes were regular.  nothing special for the price they are charging. we were with 4 persons and everybody ordered a different dish.  we all shared the same opinion

yummy yummy food .. no options for veggies at all 😂 ended up having octupous ... very fresh.  lovely change from all the “trendy” yet noisy restaurants in barcelona - a taste of quiet, elegant catalan charm.

really disappointed, overpriced, the portions are really small, nothing special for the price you pay, payed 100e for 2 persons, main dish, 3 glases of wine, one water, desert for one person... if you are looking just for a “gourmet”restaurant is the perfect place! you will get some extra starter but you have to pay for it, it is written very small in the menu!

the service was basic and they spoke english which was convenient however, the portions  were kiddy meal sized; i was expecting a toy and a clown as entertainment following my meal. the meal lasted no more than twista reciting the alphabet.

p.s. anorexics would love this place.  🤙🏿
excellent place and service for catalan cuisine. very intimate and well-served. price round 50€ p/p. booking via el tenedor gives a 30% discount until sept. 11th 2012.
everything was amazing! thank you!

one of the finer meal in barcelona.   if one is tired of prepared food of tapas, comite is highly recommend.   the maitre d melanie knew how to put together a best meal based on wishes of patron and the what the restaurant has to offer.

amazing food! one of the best restaurants i have ever been to :) i asked for recommendations of food, and everything was just succulent and tasty! great service as well. i highly recommend this place.
very good restaurant, delicious food with good service
amazing food. amazing service. very detailed and friendly oriented service. careful if you are offered the huge steak for 2, it's a lot of food. it's a must.
we were not sure if we should go, as there were a few negative comments, but the experience was amazing. the food was so delicious and the service was really good. definitely want to go back soon.
food was ok. the staff are a little slow with the drinks.
we really enjoyed this restaurant, even if as brits we were the first in at around 8pm...the food was really excellent and the service terrific. i really like the ambience of the place.
good food good wine. interesting use of good local products with a little twist. maybe a little noisy for business discussions but certainly a place to try and enjoy.
food may be ok, but service appalling.  we never tasted food but walked out after 20 to 30 minutes   of being ignored. restaurant over the road was extremely good!
fantastic food, bit pricy and wine list needs to get dialed up and not be a massive book for 50 bottles. a better btg would be nice as well.
traditional catalan dishes presented in a very refined way. also, great sommelier!
amazing food, one of the best foie gras i've ever had. took one star because of a lack of organization and discipline from the waiters.
the food is outstanding, the service excellent, the wine list amazing, the decor beautiful... you pay for it! but it's worth it!
lovely ambiance and very friendly staff. a bit pricey but the tapas are great! perfect for a romantic séjour in barcelona!
excellent place. if you are in barcelona don't miss it

it is generally friendly, but there is no explanation for the food and glass wine selection is not possible. they are left indifferent in busy times. especially, you are alone. the connection between the foods is also unnatural.
it is good but i am.always a little bit desappointing. not lots of space between the table and the food is nothing that special. service is excellent

pretty cool pub with a nice atmosphere, the drinks are pretty affordable and is near to several night bus stations that run all night. you can have pretty good shots for as little as one euro or have large glasses for five euros
chupitos recommended here, if you're thinking of hanging out with friends for a while and then moving on somewhere else.
good prices bad quality drinks, perfect place if not minding to get drunk with highly probable hangover.
pretty cool spot with very cheap drinking

i went there with several friends to have a drink, the place has doormen at the entrance, tables with a somewhat rustic style, the bar and two foosball tables. from my point of view, the place was not well lit, although i know that's partly what they're looking for, there wasn't a bad atmosphere in the place, the chairs were very uncomfortable and the bar took a long time to serve. the size of the cubatas is quite large, although it should be noted that in the first one i did see the size and n

very good bar to go with a group of friends, both for previews and to hang out on a saturday night, the doormen are very friendly and pleasant. very affordable prices, i almost always order cubes to share with the group.my only drawback is the bathrooms, one of them does not have a door, there is never paper in any of the bathrooms and they are almost always dirty, i would say that it is "essence of the raven" and i will not stop going for anything in the world hahaha.you walk into the raven an

the atmosphere would improve substantially with soft music, since the fact that you can talk calmly is an added value, but i will definitely keep coming back. the prices make drinking on the premises considerably better than drinking on the street, although the toilets leave a lot to be desired in any sense.

for me the best bar in all of barcelona, ​​drinks at a very good price, staff 10/10 and the atmosphere is very good especially if you are not looking for something too rowdy. very good bar to go with friends 😃
to have something quick, good prices but everything in plastic cups and good service
good atmosphere to do the pre before going to razz or wolf. cubaliters at 7 euros and shots from 1 euro to 3.

comfortable although the service was a little late (understandable due to the number of waiters when there is so much clientele) and the prices are very decent indeed.the only thing that seemed to me that could be improved is the amount of alcohol in the vats, but that depends on taste and for the price it's not that bad either.good place, i would like to return the truth 👍🏻
apart from the fact that they don't play music and the crowds of people, it's great, air conditioning and you can breathe and affordable prices for drinkers like me✨
the place is dirty and the sink even more so, the service and the drinks are great and cheap

very good place. the place is affordable and has a very focused community. the foosball table is in good condition and is a well-located place to do some previews before going to the club. however, if you want to go and have a good time, the closing time is not a problem. silly details like the pikachu shot make it have a curious touch. although there are similar bars, this one has a community, there are people who know each other there and who you can later hang out with. my experience is posi

a place where you literally go for €1 shots and cheap drinks, many things could be done, which have already been said but he highlighted them, a place without music and with destroyed toilets, at least if you ask for paper at the bar to go they kindly give it to you in the bathroom.

pay what you get. cheap but there is space for groups of 20 or more people. a little dirty (or it seems) and it always takes you half an hour or more to catch anything. everyone shouting loudly but hey, it's a party and marina.
well-ambient place, good music and table football. the cubatas are at a good price… i ordered a jagger red bull for €4

alcohol at a good price, good place to go for a drink to warm up the night, but there are only two mixed toilets made of caldo and the chairs are beer boxes, it's not a big deal if you're looking for the place itself.
a classic on the marina bar route, cigars, beer and shots at a good price.the very nice boss ✨they have table football.

good place to go with colleagues, there is no music so you can "talk" cubaliters are very cheap although they taste a little like water, and the problem i see is that they close early. in short, it's not bad

the place has no secret, it is a bar that is aesthetically garbage, the chairs are boxes of beer, and there are two bathrooms, the same for men and women, and one does not even have a door, as the night progresses these end each time worse.despite all the bad things, i give it 4 stars and it is because we have already been there more than once and so far the good vibes of the others (there are a couple of security guards who calm the atmosphere, and collect the used glasses) and the its afforda

the prices are very good, €5 for a cubata. €1 a shot.lots of atmosphere. for my taste it lacks music, at least in the background, because every now and then you hear someone screaming.good security, and good baristas.
all the staff is very good, a well-appointed place to go with your group of friends, drinks at a good price and the doorman is great.
good quality and good prices, we will return, thank you
very good prices; i recommend the 'orgasm' (we took it because we laughed a lot and we liked it to our surprise) it is a shot. i came on the recommendation of a friend and i will return.

the traditional bar, with its simple charm, with good people and a friendly atmosphere! the waitress berta served me with a lot of love and speed, i recommend you order cubatas from her!thank you, we will always come back 💋
local with a good atmosphere, the only thing it needs is to improve one for the cubates, which are always either very loaded or not very good

depends on the day. the bar is great, somewhat small but cozy and with super friendly waiters.but sometimes, not always, there is a doorman who chases you until you are more than four blocks away from the place, when you don't even make a sound. i understand that they do it when there are buildings where the neighbors want to sleep (even if you are not making any kind of sound) but when you are already next to an open field, it is too much.otherwise fantastic.

it is a quiet, spacious place with good prices, like almost all the marina establishments. notable things: it has table football and the bathrooms do not have doors.what perhaps fails a little is that it is a bit far from the center, so if you are a large group of people it is great, but if you are a couple or three it may be better to go somewhere else.

the stay at the bar was disappointing, i ordered a pineapple cubata and black vodka and more than cubata it was pure pineapple juice, if at least it was still natural juice, but paying €7 for a miserable juice from mercadona seems a shame to me
very cheap drinks, currently the atmosphere is not quite my style, it was better when they played music

super crappy brand drink at a gold price, terrible heat and a wait to order that you'll die from!!! if you're lucky you can get a case of beer to sit down but that means smelling asses because it's so full of people standing, the only good thing is the guy at the entrance control who is a charm

the place is great, there is more space than it seems if you come with a large group, it has very good prices and even table football.it is always a must stop when i go out to party with my group of friends.of course, the bathroom is fucking hell.

i have gone many times with friends and the truth is that i have never had any problems. the staff is super friendly and pleasant, it has a very good atmosphere and a great variety of alcohol at a very reasonable price!!it is my favorite place without a doubt.

very affordable prices, but i didn't like the place itself. there are no chairs as such, since they are beer crates, and the bathroom leaves something to be desired.the atmosphere is not bad, but it closes around 3 in the morning.

it's very pretty, cheap alcohol, they put little metal (lml) and the crowd sits on boxes of beer which is pretty cool in my opinion. the only bad thing is that at 3 or so they kick you out, but hey, like any bar, right???
of the 2 toilets there are, only 1 has a door. you have to watch the other one so they don't get in because it doesn't have a latch. no light. no paper. piss all over the floor, that's what he has.

i know why alcohol is cheap. because it's a jug and because they don't spend money on cleaning. i recommend not going to the bathroom and not leaning too much on the bar or anywhere. i prefer cleaner and higher quality places

raven is a place focused almost entirely on young people looking to drink cheap alcohol regardless of the quality of the drink.the place usually gets quite crowded, sometimes to stressful points, especially when you want to go to the bar to order something since getting served is not easy. luckily, the waiters at the place do an excellent job serving such a large number of customers at the same time.the floor of the establishment, quite similar to the bar, ends up covered with a sticky layer an
very good place i don't give it 5 stars because it doesn't have music
a perfect place to go before the party, ask marianela for the surprise shot😈

alcohol is cheap and plentiful, but in there there is a constant smell of sweaty otaku mixed with the humidity of the amazon, to the point where it stings your eyes. in short, if you go early and stay inside for a couple of hours there is no problem, but if not, prepare to catch an std just by breathing once inside.
it's okay, there is always a good atmosphere, but the water tastes like chlorine
there is no music, but it is cheap (chupitos €1, cubatas €3-4), young, and there is foosball.
good bar, quality/price is one of the best you will find, but if you want decent alcohol get away hahahaha.

in that bar i left my most toxic ex-girlfriend, and for that alone, she deserves my praise.and that there are arch people, but although it may seem like a lie, that fact does not detract from the place one bit.
good place to drink and have a good time with friends. metal and rock music plays. my favorite in the entire area!update: i lower the rating because they no longer play music!
good prices and attention.lots of people, no music and the bathrooms leave a lot to be desired
cheap alcohol, very good atmosphere and good music. do you have problems? the smell of closed from 1 sometimes, but that is because of the customers.
it is a legendary place at marina night, an alternative atmosphere with cheap drinks and ultimately a place where people go to drink and chat. good atmosphere for those who like the vibe.
cheap alcohol, good atmosphere. how bad it is, when it's full there's nowhere to sit and a lot of noise from people. the rest are all pros i would say.
there aren't many chairs but sitting on a case of beer is a good fit if you are blind at so many hours in the morning.
best marina place without a doubt! good treatment, great prices and variety. although there are not always 4 "bartenders" serving at the same time, but when it is, the place is ideal.

one of the best bars in the marina. maybe a lot of people crowding at the entrance but without a doubt. the drinks, shots and the waiters make up for it with their great service. without a doubt the best airbar in all of barcelona
one of the best bars in marina, good service and good price for cubatas
it's a pretty good place for cheap alcohol. that's if the charm of the place is more the people than anything else.
everything ordered has been very good, we will definitely return, thank you
very good prices and quality, we will return
friendly waiters and low prices. every time i have gone to this bar i have left with a good impression. one of the bars in poblenou that i most recommend for going out with friends.
quiet atmosphere and good quality of service
large place with tables for large groups. it has a cool atmosphere but at least the day i went i didn't have music.
the only place to drink imported beers if you go out to poblenou. there is not much atmosphere. maybe with less light and adequate glasses it improved.
a very pleasant atmosphere

it is a club without style, and with the music too weak, everything dark, and expensive, there is no point in going there other than for the pleasure of meeting your friends, there are many, many better places in barcelona for that reason.
they should let kids +16 pass because non-alcoholic cocktails exist for a reason and it's a pub, not a nightclub.
good place to have a good time but the hygiene leaves a lot to be desired.
the former owners made the place a wonderful place to enjoy metal and imported beers.now they have tried to keep it but it is not what it was, at least they have gulden draak.
a very good place to spend the night with friends and drink together. a shame about the capacity because of the covid
good prices and good atmosphere. the music is not heard and can be a little difficult to find. they are generous when serving.
good atmosphere, affordable drinks, good location and good security. ideal to go with friends.
the waiters are very patient and it's a lot of fun
one of the best bars in marina, the bad thing is that they put a lot of ice in the drinks and little content, the minimum 500ml cubaliliter is water.
great assortment and quality, we will return, thank you
the best place to go if you want to have a drink with your friends. the treatment of the bartenders is the best, they are very friendly and serve great. ✊🏻
a large bar in the marina area where rock abounds. drink at a good price although lately it has been frequented a lot by those under 20 years old
good place to have a drink with friends and makes games with shots, in addition to good service and affordable prices for any pocket.
jose knows how to run a business. the playlist contains the best of the genre. they have to play jeremy from pearl jam more times.
it smells terrible, but the shots are great (like in the rest of the bars in the area)very good treatment by the waiters
the best bar in the world to get a good cogorza🙌😬 bar theme? no idea, i always remember to enter but not leave 😂
very good local as before, but always with too many people
good prices and great quality, we will return
good quality and good atmosphere, i will return
a spectacular treatment and a brutal atmosphere!! i've been going there for 4 years and will continue for many more!!
good rock bar, quite young atmosphere and complements well with the other rock venues, in a more classic style
very good atmosphere to be among friends, although without background music.
cheap to consume but has no music
very good atmosphere and very affordable prices. excellent treatment and friendly security.
the bad thing is that if you don't go in time there is no place to sit, like in many other establishments of this style.
nice place with good rock music and unbeatable service
this is the place for you if you want good flavor and good prices. don't miss out on their menu - highly recommended!

great food for an amazing price. the quality of food is spot on. i enjoyed every plate here. totally recommend to everyone.
one of the best restaurant in the neighborhood. don't miss it.

nice space, nice atmosphere. the personnel was kind and i really enjoyed the pastry. it seems a nice place to go and have a meal or just a cafe con leche with a friend or even alone. i will definitely go back!

sat at the table for 40 mins waiting to order food, when we finally got someones attention we were told we had to wait to see what they have left on the menu del dia. finally someone came and they only had a few items available. terrible service. don’t recommend!
***edited as they didn’t charge us for our drinks.
the food was very delicious, i tasted the 🐐 salad 🥗 and the  lubina fish and the dessert of coffee was very good,  the cocktail mosku mule really new for me i really enjoyed it, thanks so much
delicious food amazing service, i’ll repeat! 👌🏾
great for private parties and events! the staff were really friendly and the drinks are cheap :)
great service and food. thanks
average... the menu is small in quantity... reasonable price... they usually take a long time to serve...
small place in the heart of 22@ where its main attraction is the daily menu.for less than €12.50 they offer quality and diversity of dishes.recommendable.

we came across this establishment by chance. the welcome was very good (smiles, availability, water and treats offered to our dog) as well as the menu which has a very advantageous quality-price ratio.the dishes are tasty and very well presented.i work not far away and i will come back with pleasure.
very good menu, great service! the decoration is very nice! we will definitely return on another trip to bcn.

a very cozy place and very nice decoration. a quiet place to have a coffee. the deal very good staff. the only bad thing is the bathroom, it was a bit neglected. otherwise i totally recommend it. it also has a large terrace if you prefer to sunbathe while drinking coffee.

today i can say that i have eaten one of the best tripe of my life. thank you for this!the attention is always excellent.the dishes well served and with taste.the desserts are homemade and made with passion.the coffee is excellent.💯 recommended

i had breakfast on a saturday morning. a normal ensaimada cost almost €3 and was dry and hard, the coffee normal. they should review and remove days-old pasta, or sell them as hard pieces just like in bakeries, but not as ensaimada. it was crunchy and fell apart.
the place is nice and the daily menu from time to time is good. it depends which dishes are better than others. portions are not very abundant.

interesting discovery, breakfast offer with ideas, good decoration and above all very good coffee, if i have to put a but the sandwich bread is a little hot it would be perfect but it is just a suggestion

in my opinion, one of the best places in poblenou to have a first-class coffee. the waiters are very friendly and the food is great. they have a menu from monday to friday and, generally, groups of co-workers go. there is a terrace too. for a coffee, very early, it is ideal. the music and the atmosphere make you feel very comfortable. it is one of my favorite places in poblenou. 🙏🏻 be careful: during meal times, it gets quite crowded.
the food was very good. it is a menu of good and varied homemade dishes. i recommend it without hesitation.
magnificent place to eat, very good menus, very good prices and outstanding service. we will be back
good service, good food and you can also eat on the outside terrace.health!🎗️
great breakfasts and meals. very good service and very good coffee with surpriseand they allow dogs
perfect establishment, very friendly service, extensive menu and very reasonable prices!! highly recommended 👌
good place with a midday menu for lunch.
excellent, impeccable service, friendliness, very good price quality..totally recommended.
for lunch we got dry fries and a rubbery steak that was impossible to chew.
this place is super nice, i entered with doubts since it was too early to eat but after listening to the music, the atmosphere, the people and the attention i will definitely return. recommended!
menu of the day of notable quality, price and service.
will not disappoint you. good atmosphere. the waiters are polite and friendly. varied menu.

we stopped one day to make a nap menu. we were with the dog and they were super friendly and let us in as adults. we were surprised by the menu, original, good, well presented. it was a familiar atmosphere with all the customers who entered.very good option for the area!
healthy food, friendly staff. better to reserve
i sat on the terrace to have a coffee but no one ever came to serve me until a group of foreigners arrived, they preferred to serve them rather than the people who live in the neighborhood.
exceptional treatment, good portions and quality food.more than nice atmosphere at lunchtime.i love it!!(in the photo, typical dish of the house: "yoghurt with ice", the sea of ​​fun!!!!!)

every time i can with my family, we give ourselves the opportunity to go to eat somewhere in barcelona with many setbacks but i forget everything when we eat in a place like bar roca. excellent service and quality of products. everything is wonderful!! 👌🏽👌🏽👍🏽 10 ⭐️
super price and quality. fast and friendly
very delicious food. the daily menus are very good, they vary depending on the day and are well priced.
good midday menu!!
very good quality-price and very clean.
lunch menu of correct quality and price
this restaurant is very cozy, i regularly have a coffee with milk in the mornings, very quiet with good music and they serve you very well.

optimal!! varied and high quality menu. the place is welcoming and the staff is very helpful. when i'm in poblenou i always try to stop by to have a coffee or something to eat. i also recommend it for dinners as a couple or to have a drink with friends. completely satisfied!
we ate the lunch menu for €11, very good in terms of preparation and quality, the service was very fast and the place was very nice and well decorated. all perfect

we ate the menu of the day and it was excellent, the attention of the waiter gustavo was unbeatable, very attentive and helpful. without a doubt we will return. a 10 for the food and a 10 for the attention 👌👏👏👏.
i loved the food, the daily menu was very delicious and affordable. very good atmosphere, good music and first-class service. anyway, i'll be back for more.

5 euros for a coke and an aquarius and they still dare to post reviews that it is very welcoming. if it weren't for the friends...but in truth, no one should go to these thieves in the hoteliers to their establishment because of thieves and that they eat the money invested.kerer buy a chalet in the bahamas at our expense instead of a small apartment....you have to be stupid to go there while passing through or just for the terrace to pay 10 euros to say hello.what a bunch of sausages they are m
close and pleasant attention. appetizing food. i feel very comfortable there.i recommend it.

it is a family bar-restaurant, menu only, for weekdays. it is eaten very well, very delicious with homemade food.the people is so kind.it is recommended to go on thursday, which is paella day. the locals already know it, and it fills up quickly.you should also try their baked artichokes.

the lunch menu super good. they have a lot of variety and have very original and at the same time super homemade dishes. fast and friendly service. highly recommended!!and the breakfast offer is also very good. the place is very welcoming.
we often come for lunch.very varied daily menu with very good cuisine.highly recommended
super good value for money. the food on the menu is delicious, the place very cozy and the service charming! what more can you ask for?
good lunch menu. excellent food at a reasonable price.
nice place to have a coffee or eat. very spacious
family bar. it has a fairly cheap lunch menu. the sandwiches are not bad, but they are nothing out of this world (until now they stood out for their affordable price, but they have raised them).

it is a very nice place, friendly staff, delicious homemade food, from the first courses to the desserts!!! they respect safety regulations in these times of pandemic that we are experiencing. i recommend!
small restaurant ideal for eating on weekdays. cheap menu and correct food and service. i recommend it.
very hip(ster) place but with very good views, design and a very complete menu. good and fast service, pleasant food although the portions are not very large. overall great.
good food at a good price. the staff is friendly and wait times are reasonable. a recommendable restaurant.
quality products, more than affordable prices, and friendly and fun treatment
a truly welcoming place, not only for the venue but above all for the staff! delicious cuisine and dishes. i recommend it to anyone who lives in barcelona or who is just passing through.
good food, friendly service and good price. delicious friday drinks and cocktails. 100% recommendable.
casalana cuisine, traditional. their menu is highly recommended, especially the paella on thursdays and for those who like tripe, they are the most requested. the unbeatable treatment
very good food, excellent value for money and efficient and very attentive service.totally recommendable.
excellent service and very good food, highly recommended, we will repeat!
a fantastic place. the best bar to start a nice friday or saturday evening party...excellent fresh cerveca...top

the roca bar is the bar that the roca brothers have in barcelona. if your finances do not allow you to go to celler de can roca, you can always stop by the roca bar and taste some of the dishes that these brothers have prepared for people visiting barcelona. the bar is not very well known so you can always find a table. the prices are very popular and the food is excellent. i recommend the curried chicken rocadillo
good restaurant bar where you can eat a good menu at a more than reasonable price, good balance between quality and price
oh dear. we eat well and not expensive at all.

eye! it is not the brothers' bar. rock.if that is what you are looking for, it is inside the omm hotel (carrer del roselló 265)don't let it happen to you like it did to me when i realized when i was almost there.
good food, good atmosphere of working people, diligent and friendly waiters, charming owner
the food is correct but they are super slow and inefficient when it comes to serving the tables
good breakfast and affordable price. very friendly waiters. it's worth a try
nice place to have a good coffee. friendly staff.
very good coffee among the best in the poblenou neighborhood, the apple pie is also good
good coffee and sandwiches for breakfast!
very good price/value ratio
good service, quality and price and above all very clean
a pretty decent restaurant for a daily menu !!!
fantastic service and food!! highly recommended!
good prices and good service. they struggle with the air conditioning.
good midday menu
the service and food is of a high standard. you eat like at home.
economical menu for life. recommended
very complete daily menu at a more than reasonable price.
economical, good homemade food and very pleasant service
excellent treatment by a team of true professionals!!!
friendly, clean, good place
arrive at menu time. deathly silence. uncomfortable.
economical menu and good atmosphere

amazing little place - i hadn't tried some of the things on the menu before and our server patiently explained and suggested and was generally very warm and welcoming. the food was fantastic - all three things we ordered were delicious. the weather was pleasant so we got outdoor seating and it was quite nice. overall, highly recommended! 👍

lovely little restaurant with seating inside or outside. there’s no menu but the options were explained in detail. the staff were very welcoming and the food was delicious. we loved the local beer options including a gluten free one.

really great place with exceptionally friendly staff and great food. we stumbled in here by accident, but really enjoyed everything. make sure to pay this place a visit and don't let the simple interieur fool you. these guys know what's what!
i had lunch at restaurante cantero and wanted to experience food from venezuela. the service was great, so was the food . i tried the cachapa pabellon criollo and it was delicious
recommonded place. foods are fantastic, for  a good price. staff is very polite and helpfull.
love places that you never heard of but you see great bunch of locals enjoying food. the menu is centralized around arepas and cachapas. also great spot in the sun. 🙌🏻
amazing little restaurant! staff was super friendly. waiter explained all the things from the menu to us. and the food was delicious. definitely recommend this place.

uniquely perfect!  we really enjoyed sitting outside in the terrace, sipping on glasses of wine and being presented with incredibly delicious, homemade dishes.  it was so nice sitting among the locals, all enjoying themselves as much as we were. located a short throw from barcelona's city-centre, i would encourage you to make your way here for an authentic venezuelan experience.  special thanks to nelson for taking such good care of us.  see you again most definitely! 🇻🇪👏

it was great! it tastes like home! arepas looked very great too! tequeño didn’t get deep fried enough tho. two of them were cold inside, but the sauce for the tequeño was amazing !!!
one tip: don’t order any vegetarian or vegan food there tho

super friendly service, decent price point (especially for breakfast). that really wasn’t what i was expecting from a reina pepiada in terms of authenticity but it was still delicious. tequeños and accompanying sauce on point. would definitely go back :)

extraordinary place for lunch and dinner or hangout spot for beers and catching up with friends. it is one of the best venezuelan restaurants i know with excellent quality of dishes and moderate menu price and for me i rate 10/10 for hospitality and service
i tried “la cachapa vegetariana” (great if you want to skip meat) and it was delicious! add some “tequeños” to the mix and you’ll be set for success. def. coming back for more 👍🏼

such a lovely bar! great venezuelan food and other spanish tapas, super friendly service and very correct prices. also, good selection of beers... perfect terrace to stay for hours the empanadas de queso are to die for! not easy to have vegan choices though.

what an excellent place! found it thanks to the high rating on google maps (see it does work!) and spent a bit of time talking to the owner about what to eat and what was in all the food (i’ve never had venezuelan food and i don’t speak spanish as well as being a cheese hating freak), and he was so patient and friendly and even offered to put something together to suit my tastes.

great beer, great food, a really awesome owner somehow seeming to do everything himself (have a little patience) and
great place for arepas, very tasty and with great service. they didn't have a few things we wanted to order, but the things they did have were very good.
very easy going staff and were able to customize the food and make it vegetarian friendly! it was delicious 🤤

delicious food. make sure to try tequeños.
very friendly staff, always there to patiently explain everything about the food with a big smile.

i highly recommend this place!
really nice to try venezuela food. surprisingly good. i definitely recommend this lovely place. great service and low price. perfect. thank you 🙏🏻

a hidden gem, off the beaten track serving amazing venezuelan dishes.  the place is very friendly and the staff extremely accomodating.  they also have a good selection of bottled ale from around the world and many spirits.

if you are in barcelona and want something a little different and something genuine then come to restaurante cantero we did and will come back before we go home

great restaurant for arepas and other traditional venezuelan fare. lived in colombia and mexico, and this is better than any venezuelan restaurant i’ve had in either country.

very great service as well. fast, attentive, customer centric
very good food, excelente service and a fair price. recommended

lekker！totally agree with the 4.6 stars! i give 5. this is the restaurant i am looking for during all these days-- local, fresh, tasty and inexpensive.

we ordered "beef, beans and rice" and "pasta many", both are enough amount and include a drink and dessert. the bill is 20.70€.  accept card and cash.

they are really cozy, perfect for both alone and group. they don't have paper menu because they decide menu by the materials they have in the morning. how amazing it it!  owners are properly enth
the best cachapas i ever had! i can also highly recommend the tequeños and the arepas. manuel is amazing and cantero is a great place to try food from venezuela.
they have amazing food and delicious tequeños!
great food, great service and prices are more than fair. not only would go here again, but definitely will go. made me want to go to venezuela!
amazing venezuelan restaurant. excellent food, super friendly staff, and terrific atmosphere.  eat here.  they won't disappoint you.
love their arepas! very friendly service and a nice terassa for eating outside on beautiful days. quick for take away and consistent quality (i eat here a lot! :)
super friendly service.  we had the beef, rice beans and plantains dish and loved it.  good prices too!
very authentic venezuelan food yummy

we were staying close by and wanted to try something new - definitely not disappointed! the owner was very friendly and patiently explained to us the meals. the flavours were delicious, the food was filling and the price point optimal. i'd like to visit again when i'm in barcelona!
it was my first time trying this type of food, i do think they serve good food even if i did not like it, and the only negative is there's barely anything to choose in the menu

delicious food and excellent service. a fairly inconspicuous restaurant that you might miss, but should definitely try if you are nearby. my first taste of venezuelan food and everything recommended to me has been delicious, especially tequenoes and cachapa pabellon (excuse my spelling). ive been 4 or 5 times in the past month and would strongly recommend

went for drinks and tequeños. the tequeños were really good. the food looked amazing, i didn't get to try it though.

the service is really good as well. too bad it's not open on the weekends as well.
so so so delicious & really enjoyed the service too. i love that they have vegan options. highly recommend!

showed up 1 hour and half before it closes and server denied services. we had 8 people in our party, he said no room for 8. he had several tables open and no one around. not worth if that’s how they treat people.

went to it due to google recommendation. great choice as it was a proper local restaurant. as it was lunch time it was only servicing standard menus (limited options), but the food was great and normal prices. the owner was great, he took the time to explain/translate the lunch menu. i'll definitely try to come back for a dinner!
friendly staff, great service, and great food

our meal was really nice & tasteful.
the service was friendly & he explained to us the meals & the ingredients!
coming back for try and the other plates.

thanks✌🏻

we stumbled upon the restaurant because it was close to our hotel. the owner is super welcoming and nice, the venezualian food is great and very cheap comparing to central restaurants. the place is cozy and small. we highly recommend it!

we can only agree with the comments we read. very friendly service, we felt really welcomed. good advise received about the food which we followed... without regret. very tasteful and well prepared.
put this reataurant on your "to visit" list if you are over for a holiday or a city trip in barcelona.
and all this for a very good price.
top!
cosy bar with friendly staff with nice tapas. the staff very helpful and polite.
absolutely love this place. the food is delicious and the staff are lovely. the owner is super friendly and gives amazing recommendations. you have to try the tequenos and the cachapas.

outstanding restaurant, original venezuelan food !! amazing service !! all you need in your neighborhood !! in conclusion... best place ever for venezuelan food in barna !!
kudos to manuel and karina
true heroes from the venezuelan tradicional food !!
awesome service and excellent food. get the cachapas! nice little find in the neighborhood and good area to sit outside and have lunch. would come back.
great place, very tasty food and very friendly waiters! enjoy going there regularly :)
don’t say you’re open till 11 just to tell us more than half an hour before that they won’t take orders anymore. at least waiter was nice.
the homemade food (rice, meat, beans) is simple and just perfect for a supper. great beers, perfect sangria and a very nice host. definitely a place to visit!
i just love it there, there's an interesting selection of beers (the list is being updated quite frequently), and the owners are fantastic. very nice home-made food if you're hungry too!
food incredible, staff extremely flexible and helpful. 5 stars well deserved.
just stumbled upon this restaurant because it was in the area of my hotel. came back again during my stay in barcelona. the food is amazing and the people are great. highly appreciated!
best vegan arepas in all my life
the owner is super friendly, speaks english very well, and is btw an incredible chef. the food was amazing! highly recommend the corn bread with pollo, cheese, and avocado.
new unexpected taste for me. very delicious venesualian food and warm welcome!
amazing food! loved it. super friendly owner, i felt very welcome. i definitely recommend this place!
best tequenos in barcelona. amazing food and friendly staff
you have to try the sangria of cava and their palitos the queso ! the service is more than great =) prices are good and the terrase is super cozy! one of my favourite spots in bcn.
the food was awesome!! the owner very friendly! the price was also great! i would recommend it to someone who’s new to barcelona!👌🏿👍🏿
the meat, rice and beans will was delicious and very filling. and the owner was a super nice guy! i highly recommend this place.
tue foos was really good. and the owner was handsome and kind. my son who is really picky also enjoyed the food.
their arepas are *amazing* and the tequeños are little parcels of love. nice selection of beer. and super-friendly!

i really wanted to try food and ordered through just eat but after almost 2 hours and 8 calls to the phone number the food did not arrive.
super disappointing and especially because no one bothered to contact us.
excellent choices and value for money.really different food.and cool atmosphere all the locals seem to cone here.

great spot. amazing arepas. lovely host.
